atk-s0506a:2324_4: paṭhanti, ādavaṃ yāvadavaṃ yāvadeva davatthaṃ madhuraṃ pivāmīti attho.
atk-s0506a:2325_0: 849. Puññakkhettānamākarāti sadevakassa lokassa puññakkhettabhūtānaṃ ariyānaṃ maggaphalaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2325_1: ariyasaṅghassa ākarā uppattiṭṭhānaṃ tathāgatā. Yathāti yasmiṃ puññakkhette. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:2326_0: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno attanā ca devatāya ca pavattitaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ manussalokaṃ
atk-s0506a:2326_1: āgantvā bhagavato ārocesi. Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya
atk-s0506a:2326_2: dhammaṃ desesi. Sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0506a:2335_0: Mahārathavagge ko me vandati pādānīti maṇḍūkadevaputtavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti?
atk-s0506a:2335_1: Bhagavā campāyaṃ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre. So paccūsavelāyaṃ buddhāciṇṇaṃ
atk-s0506a:2335_2: mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya veneyyabandhave satte volokento addasa
atk-s0506a:2335_3: “ajja mayi sāyanhasamaye dhammaṃ desente eko maṇḍūko mama sare nimittaṃ gaṇhanto
atk-s0506a:2335_4: parūpakkamena maritvā devaloke nibbattitvā mahatā devaparivārena mahājanassa passantasseva
atk-s0506a:2335_5: āgamissati, tattha bahūnaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī”ti disvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0506a:2335_6: pattacīvaramādāya mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ campānagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā,
atk-s0506a:2335_7: bhikkhūnaṃ sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā katabhattakicco vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhikkhūsu vattaṃ
atk-s0506a:2335_8: dassetvā, attano attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gatesu gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā phalasamāpattisukhena
atk-s0506a:2335_9: divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā, sāyanhasamaye catūsu parisāsu sannipatitāsu surabhigandhakuṭito
atk-s0506a:2335_10: nikkhamitvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena pokkharaṇitīre dhammasabhāmaṇḍapaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0506a:2335_11: alaṅkatavarabuddhāsane nisinno manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto achambhītakesarasīho
atk-s0506a:2335_12: viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmassaraṃ nicchārento acinteyyena buddhānubhāvena anupamāya
atk-s0506a:2336_0: Tasmiñca khaṇe eko maṇḍūko pokkharaṇito āgantvā “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti dhammasaññāya
atk-s0506a:2336_1: sare nimittaṃ gaṇhanto parisapariyante nipajji. Atheko vacchapālo taṃ padesaṃ āgato
atk-s0506a:2336_2: satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ parisañca paramena upasamena dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā taggatamānaso
atk-s0506a:2336_3: daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto maṇḍūkaṃ anoloketvā tassa sīse sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi. So
atk-s0506a:2336_4: dhammasaññāya pasannacitto tāvadeva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike
atk-s0506a:2336_5: kanakavimāne nibbattitvā suttappabuddho viya tattha accharāsaṅghaparivutaṃ attānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2336_6: disvā “kuto nu kho idha ahaṃ nibbatto”ti āvajjento purimajātiṃ disvā “ahampi nāma
atk-s0506a:2336_7: idha uppajjiṃ, īdisañca sampattiṃ paṭilabhiṃ, kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ akāsi”nti upadhārento
atk-s0506a:2336_8: aññaṃ na addasa aññatra bhagavato sare nimittaggāhā. So tāvadeva saha vimānena āgantvā
atk-s0506a:2336_9: vimānato otaritvā, mahājanassa passantasseva mahatā parivārena mahantena dibbānubhāvena
atk-s0506a:2336_10: upasaṅkamitvā, bhagavato pāde sirasā vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:2336_11: Atha naṃ bhagavā jānantova mahājanassa kammaphalaṃ buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṃ kātuṃ –
atk-s0506a:2338: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2340_0: Pucchi. Tattha koti devanāgayakkhamanussādīsu ko, katamoti attho. Meti mama. Pādānīti
atk-s0506a:2340_1: pāde. Iddhiyāti imāya īdisāya deviddhiyā. Yasasāti iminā īdisena parivārena paricchedena
atk-s0506a:2340_2: ca. Jalanti vijjotamāno. Abhikkantenāti ativiya kantena kamanīyena sundarena. Vaṇṇenāti
atk-s0506a:2341: Atha devaputto attano purimajātiādiṃ āvi karonto imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi –
atk-s0506a:2347: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me.
atk-s0506a:2349: “Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama;
atk-s0506a:2350: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti.
atk-s0506a:2351_0: 858. Tattha pureti purimajātiyaṃ. Udaketi idaṃ tadā attano uppattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2351_1: Udake maṇḍūkoti etena uddhumāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0506a:2351_2: Gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gocaro viyāti gocaro, ghāsesanaṭṭhānaṃ. Vāri udakaṃ
atk-s0506a:2351_3: gocaro etassāti vārigocaro. Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi hotīti “vārigocaro”ti
atk-s0506a:2351_4: visesetvā vuttaṃ. Tava dhammaṃ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā desentassa
atk-s0506a:2351_5: tava dhammaṃ “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa, anādare cetaṃ
atk-s0506a:2351_6: sāmivacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Avadhī vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama
atk-s0506a:2351_7: samīpaṃ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbhitvā tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṃ sannirumbhitvā maṃ māresi.
atk-s0506a:2352_0: 859. Muhuttaṃ cittapasādassāti tava dhamme muhuttamattaṃ uppannassa cittapasādassa
atk-s0506a:2352_1: hetubhūtassa iddhinti samiddhiṃ, dibbavibhūtinti attho. Yasanti parivāraṃ. Ānubhāvanti
atk-s0506a:2353_0: 860. Yeti ye sattā. Ca-saddo byatireke. Teti tava. Dīghamaddhānanti bahuvelaṃ. Assosunti
atk-s0506a:2353_1: suṇiṃsu. Gotamāti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati. Acalaṭṭhānanti nibbānaṃ. Ayañhettha
atk-s0506a:2353_2: attho – gotama bhagavā ahaṃ viya ittarameva kālaṃ asuṇitvā ye pana katapuññā ciraṃ
atk-s0506a:2353_3: kālaṃ tava dhammaṃ assosuṃ sotuṃ labhiṃsu, te dīgharattaṃ saṃsārabyasanābhibhūtā
atk-s0506a:2353_4: ime sattā yattha gantvā na soceyyuṃ, taṃ asokaṃ sassatabhāvena acalaṃ santipadaṃ
atk-s0506a:2353_5: pattā eva, na tesaṃ tassa pattiyā antarāyoti.
atk-s0506a:2354_0: Athassa bhagavā sampattaparisāya ca upanissayasampattiṃ oloketvā vitthārena dhammaṃ
atk-s0506a:2354_1: desesi. Desanāpariyosāne so devaputto sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2354_2: dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Devaputto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0506a:2354_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca añjaliṃ katvā saha parivārena devalokameva gatoti.
atk-s0506a:2357_0: Uṭṭhehi revate supāpadhammeti revatīvimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0506a:2357_1: viharati isipatane migadāye. Tena samayena bārāṇasiyaṃ saddhāsampannassa kulassa
atk-s0506a:2357_2: putto nandiyo nāma upāsako ahosi saddhāsampanno dāyako dānapati saṅghupaṭṭhāko. Athassa
atk-s0506a:2357_3: mātāpitaro sammukhagehato mātuladhītaraṃ revatiṃ nāma kaññaṃ ānetukāmā ahesuṃ. Sā
atk-s0506a:2357_4: pana assaddhā adānasīlā, nandiyo taṃ na icchi. Tassa mātā revatiṃ āha “amma, tvaṃ
atk-s0506a:2357_5: imaṃ gehaṃ āgantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritena gomayena upalimpitvā
atk-s0506a:2357_6: āsanāni paññāpehi, ādhārake ṭhapehi, bhikkhūnaṃ āgatakāle vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0506a:2357_7: nisīdāpetvā dhamakaraṇena pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā bhuttakāle pattāni dhovāhi, evaṃ me
atk-s0506a:2357_8: puttassa ārādhikā bhavissasī”ti. Sā tathā akāsi. Atha naṃ “ovādakkhamā jātā”ti puttassa
atk-s0506a:2357_9: ārocetvā tena “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchite divasaṃ ṭhapetvā āvāhaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0506a:2358_0: Atha naṃ nandiyo āha “sace bhikkhusaṅghaṃ mātāpitaro ca me upaṭṭhahissasi, evaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0506a:2358_1: gehe vasituṃ labhissasi, appamattā hohī”ti. Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā kiñci kālaṃ
atk-s0506a:2358_2: saddhā viya hutvā bhattāraṃ anavattentī dve putte vijāyi. Nandiyassa mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu.
atk-s0506a:2358_3: Gehe sabbissariyaṃ tassā eva ahosi. Nandiyopi mahādānapati hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0506a:2358_4: dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi, kapaṇaddhikādīnampi gehadvāre pākavattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Isipatanamahāvihāre
atk-s0506a:2358_5: catūhi gabbhehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ catusālaṃ kāretvā mañcapīṭhādīni attharāpetvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0506a:2358_6: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā tathāgatassa hatthe dakkhiṇodakaṃ pātetvā niyyādesi,
atk-s0506a:2358_7: saha dakkhiṇodakadānena tāvatiṃsabhavane āyāmato ca vitthārato ca samantā dvādasayojaniko
atk-s0506a:2359_0: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno devacārikaṃ caranto taṃ pāsādaṃ disvā attānaṃ vandituṃ āgate
atk-s0506a:2359_1: devaputte pucchi “kassāyaṃ pāsādo”ti? “Imassa, bhante, pāsādassa sāmiko manussaloke
atk-s0506a:2359_2: bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyo nāma kuṭumbiyaputto saṅghassa isipatanamahāvihāre catusālaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0506a:2359_3: tassāyaṃ nibbatto pāsādo”ti āhaṃsu. Pāsāde nibbattadevaccharāyopi theraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0506a:2359_4: “bhante, mayaṃ bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyassa nāma upāsakassa paricārikā bhavituṃ idha nibbattā,
atk-s0506a:2359_5: tassa evaṃ vadetha “tuyhaṃ paricārikā bhavituṃ nibbattā, devatāyo tayi cirāyante
atk-s0506a:2359_6: ukkaṇṭhitā, devalokasampatti nāma mattikābhājanaṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇabhājanassa gahaṇaṃ
atk-s0506a:2359_7: viya atimanāpa’nti vatvā idhāgamanatthāya tassa vadethā”ti āhaṃsu. Thero “sādhū”ti
atk-s0506a:2359_8: paṭissuṇitvā sahasā devalokato āgantvā catuparisamajjhe bhagavantaṃ pucchi “nibbattati
atk-s0506a:2359_9: nu kho, bhante, katapuññānaṃ manussaloke ṭhitānaṃyeva dibbasampattī”ti? “Nanu te,
atk-s0506a:2359_10: moggallāna, nandiyassa devaloke nibbattā dibbasampatti sāmaṃ diṭṭhā, kasmā maṃ pucchasī”ti?
atk-s0506a:2359_11: “Evaṃ, bhante, nibbattatī”ti. Athassa satthā “yathā ciraṃ vippavasitvā āgataṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0506a:2359_12: mittabandhavā abhinandanti sampaṭicchanti, evaṃ katapuññaṃ puggalaṃ ito paralokaṃ
atk-s0506a:2359_13: gataṃ sakāni puññāni sampattihatthehi sampaṭicchanti paṭiggaṇhantī”ti dassento –
atk-s0506a:2365: Puññāni paṭiggaṇhanti, piyaṃ ñātīva āgata”nti. – gāthā abhāsi;
atk-s0506a:2366_0: Nandiyo taṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya dānāni deti, puññāni karoti, so vaṇijjāya gacchanto
atk-s0506a:2366_1: revatiṃ āha “bhadde, mayā paṭṭhapitaṃ saṅghassa dānaṃ anāthānaṃ pākavattañca tvaṃ
atk-s0506a:2366_2: appamattā pavatteyyāsī”ti. Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇi. So pavāsagatopi yattha yattha
atk-s0506a:2366_3: vāsaṃ kappeti, tattha tattha bhikkhūnaṃ anāthānañca yathāvibhavaṃ dānaṃ detiyeva.
atk-s0506a:2366_4: Tassa anukampāya khīṇāsavā dūratopi āgantvā dānaṃ sampaṭicchanti. Revatī pana tasmiṃ
atk-s0506a:2366_5: gate katipāhameva dānaṃ pavattetvā anāthānaṃ bhattaṃ upacchindi, bhikkhūnampi bhattaṃ
atk-s0506a:2366_6: kaṇājakaṃ bilaṅgadutiyaṃ adāsi. Bhikkhūnaṃ bhuttaṭṭhāne attanā bhuttāvasesāni sitthāni
atk-s0506a:2366_7: macchamaṃsakhaṇḍamissakāni calakaṭṭhikāni ca pakiritvā manussānaṃ dasseti “passatha
atk-s0506a:2366_8: samaṇānaṃ kammaṃ, saddhādeyyaṃ nāma evaṃ chaḍḍentī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2367_0: Atha nandiyo vohārakasiddhi yathālābho āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā revatiṃ gehato
atk-s0506a:2367_1: nīharitvā gehaṃ pāvisi. Dutiyadivase buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2367_2: pavattetvā niccabhattaṃ anāthabhattañca sammadeva pavattesi, attano sahāyehi upanītaṃ
atk-s0506a:2367_3: revatiṃ ghāsacchādanaparamatāya ṭhapesi. So aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane
atk-s0506a:2367_4: attano vimāneyeva nibbatti. Revatī pana sabbaṃ dānaṃ pacchinditvā “imesaṃ vasena
atk-s0506a:2367_5: mayhaṃ lābhasakkāro parihāyī”ti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ akkosantī paribhāsantī vicarati. Atha
atk-s0506a:2367_6: vessavaṇo dve yakkhe āṇāpesi “gacchatha, bhaṇe, bārāṇasinagare ugghosatha “ito sattame
atk-s0506a:2367_7: divase revatī jīvantīyeva niraye pakkhipīyatī’ti”. Taṃ sutvā mahājano saṃvegajāto bhītatasito ahosi.
atk-s0506a:2368_0: Atha revatī pana pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā dvāraṃ thaketvā nisīdi. Sattame divase tassā
atk-s0506a:2368_1: pāpakammasañcoditena vessavaṇena raññā āṇattā jalitakapilakesamassukā cipiṭavirūpanāsikā
atk-s0506a:2368_2: pariṇatadāṭhā lohitakkhā sajaladharasamānavaṇṇā ativiya bhayānakarūpā dve yakkhā
atk-s0506a:2368_3: upagantvā “uṭṭhehi, revate, supāpadhamme”tiādīni vadantā nānābāhāsu gahetvā “mahājano
atk-s0506a:2368_4: passatū”ti sakalanagare vīthito vīthiṃ paribbhamāpetvā ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0506a:2368_5: netvā nandiyassa vimānaṃ sampattiñcassā dassetvā taṃ vilapantiṃyeva ussadanirayasamīpaṃ
atk-s0506a:2368_6: pāpesuṃ. Taṃ yamapurisā ussadaniraye khipiṃsu. Tenāha –
atk-s0506a:2371: Nessāma taṃ yattha thunanti duggatā, samappitā nerayikā dukhenā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2372_0: Tattha uṭṭhehīti uṭṭhaha, na dānesa pāsādo taṃ nirayabhayato rakkhituṃ sakkoti, tasmā
atk-s0506a:2372_1: sīghaṃ uṭṭhahitvā āgacchāhīti attho. Revateti taṃ nāmena ālapati. Supāpadhammetiādinā
atk-s0506a:2372_2: uṭṭhānassa kāraṇaṃ vadati. Yasmā tvaṃ ariyānaṃ akkosanaparibhāsanādinā suṭṭu lāmakapāpadhammā,
atk-s0506a:2372_3: yasmā ca apārutaṃ dvāraṃ nirayassa tava pavesanatthaṃ, tasmā uṭṭhehīti. Adānasīleti
atk-s0506a:2372_4: kassaci kiñci na dānasīle kadariye maccharinī, idampi uṭṭhānasseva kāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2372_5: Yasmā dānasīlānaṃ amaccharīnaṃ tava sāmikasadisānaṃ sugatiyaṃ nivāso, tādisānaṃ pana
atk-s0506a:2372_6: adānasīlānaṃ maccharīnaṃ niraye nivāso, tasmā uṭṭhehi, muhuttamattampi tava idha
atk-s0506a:2372_7: ṭhātuṃ na dassāmīti adhippāyo. Yattha thunanti duggatāti dukkhagatattā duggatā. Nerayikāti
atk-s0506a:2372_8: nirayadukkhena samappitā samaṅgībhūtā yasmiṃ niraye thunanti, yāva pāpakammaṃ na
atk-s0506a:2372_9: byanti hoti, tāva nikkhamituṃ alabhantā nitthunanti, tattha taṃ nessāma nayissāma
atk-s0506a:2374: “Icceva vatvāna yamassa dūtā, te dve yakkhā lohitakkhā brahantā;
atk-s0506a:2375: Paccekabāhāsu gahetvā revataṃ, pakkāmayuṃ devagaṇassa santike”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2377_0: Tattha icceva vatvānāti iti eva “uṭṭhehī”tiādinā vatvā, vacanasamanantaramevāti attho.
atk-s0506a:2377_1: Yamassa dūtāti appaṭisedhaniyatassa yamassa rañño dūtasadisā. Vessavaṇena hi te pesitā.
atk-s0506a:2377_2: Tathā hi te tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ nayiṃsu. Keci “na yamassa dūtā”ti na-kāraṃ “yamassā”ti
atk-s0506a:2377_3: padena sambandhitvā “vessavaṇassa dūtā”ti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yujjati. Na hi na
atk-s0506a:2377_4: yamadūtatāya vessavaṇassa dūtāti sijjhati. Yajanti tattha baliṃ upaharantīti yakkhā.
atk-s0506a:2377_5: Lohitakkhāti rattanayanā. Yakkhānañhi nettāni atilohitāni honti. Brahantāti mahantā.
atk-s0506a:2377_6: Paccekabāhāsūti eko ekabāhāyaṃ, itaro itarabāhāyanti paccekaṃ bāhāsu. Revatanti revatiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2377_7: Revatātipi tassā nāmameva. Tathā hi “revate”ti vuttaṃ. Pakkāmayunti pakkāmesuṃ, upanesunti
atk-s0506a:2378: Evaṃ tehi yakkhehi tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā nandiyavimānassa avidūre ṭhapitā revatī taṃ sūriyamaṇḍalasadisaṃ ativiya pabhassaraṃ disvā –
atk-s0506a:2384: Taṃ dissati suriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, ko modati saggapatto vimāne”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2387: “Bārāṇasiyaṃ nandiyo nāmāsi, upāsako amaccharī dānapati vadaññū;
atk-s0506a:2391: Taṃ dissati sūriyasamānavaṇṇaṃ, so modati saggapatto vimāne”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2393: 868. Tattha candanasāralittāti sārabhūtena candanagandhena anulittasarīrā. Ubhato vimānanti vimānaṃ ubhato anto ceva bahi ca saṅgītādīhi upecca sobhayanti.
atk-s0506a:2397: Bhattu vimāne ramissāmi dānahaṃ, na patthaye nirayaṃ dassanāyā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2398_0: Āha. Tattha agārinīti gehasāminī. “Bhariyā sagāminī”tipi paṭhanti, bhariyā sahagāminīti
atk-s0506a:2398_1: attho. Sabbakulassa issarā bhattūti mama bhattu nandiyassa sabbakuṭumbikassa issarā
atk-s0506a:2398_2: sāminī ahosiṃ, tasmā idānipi vimāne issarā bhavissāmīti āha. Vimāne ramissāmi dānahanti
atk-s0506a:2398_3: evaṃ palobhetumeva hi taṃ te tattha nesuṃ. Na patthaye nirayaṃ dassanāyāti yaṃ pana
atk-s0506a:2398_4: nirayaṃ maṃ tumhe netukāmā, taṃ nirayaṃ dassanāyapi na patthaye, kuto pavisitunti vadati.
atk-s0506a:2399: Evaṃ vadantimeva “tvaṃ taṃ patthehi vā mā vā, kiṃ tava patthanāyā”ti nirayasamīpaṃ netvā –
atk-s0506a:2401: “Eso te nirayo supāpadhamme, puññaṃ tayā akataṃ jīvaloke;
atk-s0506a:2402: Na hi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyata”nti. –
atk-s0506a:2403_0: Gāthamāhaṃsu. Tassattho – eso tava nirayo, tayā dīgharattaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavitabbaṭṭhānabhūto.
atk-s0506a:2403_1: Kasmā? Puññaṃ tayā akataṃ jīvaloke, yasmā manussaloke appamattakampi tayā puññaṃ
atk-s0506a:2403_2: nāma na kataṃ, evaṃ akatapuñño pana tādiso satto maccharī attano sampattinigūhanalakkhaṇena
atk-s0506a:2403_3: maccharena samannāgato, paresaṃ rosuppādanena rosako, lobhādīhi pāpadhammehi samaṅgībhāvato
atk-s0506a:2403_4: pāpadhammo saggūpagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ sahabhāvaṃ na labhatīti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:2404: Evaṃ pana vatvā te dve yakkhā tatthevantaradhāyiṃsu. Taṃsadise pana dve nirayapāle saṃsavake nāma gūthaniraye pakkhipituṃ ākaḍḍhante passitvā –
atk-s0506a:2412: Tasmiṃ kathite tattha attano nibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ pucchantī –
atk-s0506a:2414: “Kiṃ nu kāyena vācāya, manasā dukkaṭaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0506a:2415: Kena saṃsavako laddho, gambhīro sataporiso”ti. – āha;
atk-s0506a:2418: Musāvādena vañcesi, taṃ pāpaṃ pakataṃ tayā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2419: Tassā taṃ kammaṃ kathetvā puna te –
atk-s0506a:2423: Āhaṃsu. Tattha saṃsavako nāmāti niccakālaṃ gūthamuttādiasucissa saṃsavanato paggharaṇato saṃsavako nāma.
atk-s0506a:2424: Na kevalaṃ tuyhaṃ idha saṃsavakalābho eva, atha kho ettha anekāni vassasahassāni paccitvā uttiṇṇāya hatthacchedādilābhopīti dassetuṃ –
atk-s0506a:2426: “Hatthepi chindanti athopi pāde, kaṇṇepi chindanti athopi nāsaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2427: Athopi kākoḷagaṇā samecca, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamāna”nti. –
atk-s0506a:2428_0: Tattha laddhabbakāraṇaṃ āhaṃsu. Tattha kākoḷagaṇāti kākasaṅghā. Te kirassā tigāvutappamāṇe
atk-s0506a:2428_1: sarīre anekasatāni anekasahassāni patitvā tālakkhandhaparimāṇehi sunisitaggehi ayomayehi
atk-s0506a:2428_2: mukhatuṇḍehi vijjhitvā vijjhitvā khādanti, maṃsaṃ gahitagahitaṭṭhāne kammabalena
atk-s0506a:2428_3: pūrateva. Tenāha “kākoḷagaṇā samecca, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamāna”nti.
atk-s0506a:2429: Puna sā manussalokaṃ paccānayanāya yācanādivasena taṃ taṃ vippalapi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0506a:2431: “Sādhu kho maṃ paṭinetha, kāhāmi kusalaṃ bahuṃ;
atk-s0506a:2433: Yaṃ katvā sukhitā honti, na ca pacchānutappare”ti.
atk-s0506a:2440: “Ko devalokato manussalokaṃ, gantvāna puṭṭho me evaṃ vadeyya;
atk-s0506a:2442: Na hi maccharī rosako pāpadhammo, saggūpagānaṃ labhati sahabyataṃ.
atk-s0506a:2444: “Sāhaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
atk-s0506a:2455: Na ca dāne pamajjissaṃ, sāmaṃ diṭṭhamidaṃ mayā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2462: Vitathena ca sāmikaṃ vañcayitvā, paccāmahaṃ niraye ghorarūpe”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2463: Osānagāthamāha. Tattha “ahaṃ pure maccharinī”ti gāthā niraye nibbattāya vuttā, itarā anibbattāya evāti veditabbā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyamevāti.
atk-s0506a:2464_0: Bhikkhū revatiyā yakkhehi gahetvā nītabhāvaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā bhagavā
atk-s0506a:2464_1: ādito paṭṭhāya imaṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā upari vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi, desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0506a:2464_2: bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Kāmañcetaṃ revatīpaṭibaddhāya kathāya yebhuyyabhāvato
atk-s0506a:2464_3: “revatīvimāna”nti voharīyati, yasmā pana revatī vimānadevatā na hoti, nandiyassa
atk-s0506a:2464_4: pana devaputtassa vimānādisampattipaṭisaṃyuttañcetaṃ, tasmā purisavimānesveva saṅgahaṃ
atk-s0506a:2467_0: Yo vadataṃ pavaro manujesūti chattamāṇavakavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0506a:2467_1: viharati jetavane. Tena samayena setabyāyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa kicchāladdho
atk-s0506a:2467_2: putto chatto nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo ahosi. So vayappatto pitarā pesito ukkaṭṭhaṃ gantvā
atk-s0506a:2467_3: brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa santike medhāvitāya analasatāya ca na cireneva mante
atk-s0506a:2467_4: vijjāṭṭhānāni ca uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippe nipphattiṃ patto. So ācariyaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0506a:2467_5: “mayā tumhākaṃ santike sippaṃ sikkhitaṃ, kiṃ vo garudakkhiṇaṃ demī”ti āha. Ācariyo
atk-s0506a:2467_6: “garudakkhiṇā nāma antevāsikassa vibhavānurūpā, kahāpaṇasahassamānehī”ti āha. Chattamāṇavo
atk-s0506a:2467_7: ācariyaṃ abhivādetvā setabyaṃ gantvā mātāpitaro vanditvā tehi abhinandiyamāno katapaṭisanthāro
atk-s0506a:2467_8: tamatthaṃ pitu ārocetvā “detha me dātabbayuttakaṃ, ajjeva datvā āgamissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0506a:2467_9: Taṃ mātāpitaro “tāta, ajja vikālo, sve gamissasī”ti vatvā kahāpaṇe nīharitvā bhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0506a:2467_10: bandhāpetvā ṭhapesuṃ. Corā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā chattamāṇavakassa gamanamagge aññatarasmiṃ
atk-s0506a:2467_11: vanagahane nilīnā acchiṃsu “māṇavaṃ māretvā kahāpaṇe gaṇhissāmā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2468_0: Bhagavā paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento chattamāṇavakassa
atk-s0506a:2468_1: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhānaṃ, corehi māritassa devaloke nibbattiṃ, tato saha
atk-s0506a:2468_2: vimānena āgatassa tattha sannipatitaparisāya ca dhammābhisamayaṃ disvā paṭhamatarameva
atk-s0506a:2468_3: gantvā māṇavakassa gamanamagge aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi. Māṇavo ācariyadhanaṃ
atk-s0506a:2468_4: gahetvā setabyato ukkaṭṭhābhimukho gacchanto antarāmagge bhagavantaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā
atk-s0506a:2468_5: upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhāsi. “Kuhiṃ gamissasī”ti bhagavatā vutto “ukkaṭṭhaṃ, bho gotama,
atk-s0506a:2468_6: gamissāmi mayhaṃ ācariyassa pokkharasātissa garudakkhiṇaṃ dātu”nti āha. Atha bhagavā
atk-s0506a:2468_7: “jānāsi pana tvaṃ, māṇava, tīṇi saraṇāni, pañca sīlānī”ti vatvā tena “nāhaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0506a:2468_8: kimatthiyāni panetāni kīdisāni cā”ti vutte “idamīdisa”nti saraṇagamanassa sīlasamādānassa
atk-s0506a:2468_9: ca phalānisaṃsaṃ vibhāvetvā “uggaṇhāhi tāva, māṇavaka, saraṇagamanavidhi”nti vatvā
atk-s0506a:2468_10: “sādhu uggaṇhissāmi, kathetha bhante bhagavā”ti tena yācito tassa ruciyā anurūpaṃ
atk-s0506a:2470: “Yo vadataṃ pavaro manujesu, sakyamunī bhagavā katakicco;
atk-s0506a:2476: “Yattha ca dinna mahapphalamāhu, catūsu sucīsu purisayugesu;
atk-s0506a:2477: Aṭṭha ca puggala dhammadasā te, saṅghamimaṃ saraṇatthamupehī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2479_0: 886. Tattha yoti aniyamitavacanaṃ, tassa “ta”nti iminā niyamanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vadatanti
atk-s0506a:2479_1: vadantānaṃ. Pavaroti seṭṭho, kathikānaṃ uttamo vādīvaroti attho. Manujesūti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso
atk-s0506a:2479_2: yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti. Bhagavā pana devamanussānampi brahmānampi sabbesampi
atk-s0506a:2479_3: sattānaṃ pavaroyeva, bhagavato ca carimabhave manussesu uppannatāya vuttaṃ “manujesū”ti.
atk-s0506a:2479_5: anavasesassa ca ñeyyassa munanato muni cāti sakyamuni. Bhāgyavantatādīhi catūhi kāraṇehi
atk-s0506a:2479_6: bhagavā. Catūhi maggehi kātabbassa pariññādipabhedassa soḷasavidhassa kiccassa katattā
atk-s0506a:2479_7: nipphāditattā katakicco. Pāraṃ sakkāyassa paratīraṃ nibbānaṃ gato sayambhuñāṇena
atk-s0506a:2479_8: adhigatoti pāragato. Asadisena kāyabalena, anaññasādhāraṇena ñāṇabalena, catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyena
atk-s0506a:2479_9: ca samannāgatattā balavīriyasamaṅgī. Sobhanagamanattā, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammā
atk-s0506a:2479_10: gatattā, sammā ca gaditattā sugato. Taṃ sugataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ saraṇatthaṃ saraṇāya
atk-s0506a:2479_11: parāyaṇāya apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhaparittāṇāya upehi upagaccha, ajja paṭṭhāya ahitanivattanena
atk-s0506a:2479_12: hitasaṃvaḍḍhanena “ayaṃ me bhagavā saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ gati paṭisaraṇa”nti
atk-s0506a:2479_13: bhaja seva, evaṃ jānāhi vā bujjhassūti attho.
atk-s0506a:2480_0: 887. Rāgavirāganti ariyamaggamāha. Tena hi ariyā anādikālabhāvitampi rāgaṃ virajjenti.
atk-s0506a:2480_1: Anejamasokanti ariyaphalaṃ. Tañhi ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya avasiṭṭhānañca sokanimittānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2480_2: kilesānaṃ sabbaso paṭippassambhanato “anejaṃ asoka”nti ca vuccati. Dhammanti sabhāvadhammaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2480_3: Sabhāvato gahetabbadhammo hesa yadidaṃ maggaphalanibbānāni, na pariyattidhammo viya
atk-s0506a:2480_4: paññattidhammavasena. Dhammanti vā paramatthadhammaṃ, nibbānanti attho. Samecca sambhuyya
atk-s0506a:2480_5: paccayehi kataṃ saṅkhataṃ, na saṅkhatanti asaṅkhataṃ. Tadeva nibbānaṃ. Natthi ettha
atk-s0506a:2480_6: kiñcipi paṭikūlanti appaṭikūlaṃ. Savanavelāyaṃ upaparikkhaṇavelāyaṃ paṭipajjanavelāyanti
atk-s0506a:2480_7: sabbadāpi iṭṭhamevāti madhuraṃ. Sabbaññutaññāṇasannissayāya paṭibhānasampadāya pavattitattā
atk-s0506a:2480_8: suppavattibhāvato nipuṇabhāvato ca paguṇaṃ. Vibhajitabbassa atthassa khandhādivasena
atk-s0506a:2480_9: kusalādivasena uddesādivasena ca suṭṭhu vibhajanato suvibhattaṃ. Tīhipi padehi pariyattidhammameva
atk-s0506a:2480_10: vadati. Teneva hissa āpāthakāle viya vimaddanakālepi kathentassa viya suṇantassāpi
atk-s0506a:2480_11: sammukhībhāvato ubhatopaccakkhatāya dassanatthaṃ “ima”nti vuttaṃ. Dhammanti yathāvapaṭipajjante
atk-s0506a:2480_12: apāyadukkhapātato dhāraṇatthena dhammaṃ, idaṃ catubbidhassāpi dhammassa sādhāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2480_13: Pariyattidhammopi hi saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhānamattāyapi yathāvapaṭipattiyā
atk-s0506a:2480_14: apāyadukkhapātato dhāreti eva. Imassa ca atthassa idameva vimānaṃ sādhakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2480_15: Sādhāraṇabhāvena yathāvuttadhammassa paccakkhaṃ katvā dassento puna “ima”nti āha.
atk-s0506a:2481_0: 888. Yatthāti yasmiṃ ariyasaṅghe. Dinnanti pariccattaṃ annādideyyadhammaṃ. Dinna
atk-s0506a:2481_1: mahapphalanti gāthāsukhatthaṃ anunāsikalopo kato. Accantameva kilesāsucito visujjhanena
atk-s0506a:2481_2: sucīsu “sotāpanno sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno”tiādinā vuttesu catūsu purisayugesu.
atk-s0506a:2481_3: Aṭṭhāti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhesu yugaḷe akatvā visuṃ visuṃ gahaṇena aṭṭha puggalā. Gāthāsukhatthameva
atk-s0506a:2481_4: cettha “puggala dhammadasā”ti rassaṃ katvā niddeso. Dhammadasāti catusaccadhammassa
atk-s0506a:2481_5: nibbānadhammassa ca paccakkhato dassanakā. Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvena saṅghaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2482_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā tīhi gāthāhi saraṇaguṇasandassanena saddhiṃ saraṇagamanavidhimhi vutte
atk-s0506a:2482_1: māṇavo taṃtaṃsaraṇaguṇānussaraṇamukhena saraṇagamanavidhino attano hadaye ṭhapitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0506a:2482_2: vibhāvento tassā tassā gāthāya anantaraṃ “yo vadataṃ pavaro”tiādinā taṃ taṃ gāthaṃ
atk-s0506a:2482_3: paccanubhāsi. Evaṃ paccanubhāsitvā ṭhitassa pañca sikkhāpadāni sarūpato phalānisaṃsato
atk-s0506a:2482_4: ca vibhāvetvā tesaṃ samādānavidhiṃ kathesi. So tampi suṭṭhu upadhāretvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0506a:2482_5: “handāhaṃ bhagavā gamissāmī”ti vatvā ratanattayaguṇaṃ anussaranto taṃyeva maggaṃ
atk-s0506a:2482_6: paṭipajji. Bhagavāpi “alaṃ imassa ettakaṃ kusalaṃ devalokūpapattiyā”ti jetavanameva agamāsi.
atk-s0506a:2483_0: Māṇavassa pana pasannacittassa ratanattayaguṇaṃ sallakkhaṇavasena “saraṇaṃ upemī”ti
atk-s0506a:2483_1: pavattacittuppādatāya saraṇesu ca, bhagavatā vuttanayena pañcannaṃ sīlānaṃ adhiṭṭhānena
atk-s0506a:2483_2: sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitassa teneva nayena ratanattayaguṇe anussarantasseva gacchantassa
atk-s0506a:2483_3: corā magge pariyuṭṭhiṃsu. So te agaṇetvā ratanattayaguṇe anussarantoyeva gacchati.
atk-s0506a:2483_4: Tañceko coro gumbantaraṃ upanissāya ṭhito visapītena sarena sahasāva vijjhitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0506a:2483_5: pāpetvā kahāpaṇabhaṇḍikaṃ gahetvā attano sahāyehi saddhiṃ pakkāmi. Māṇavo pana kālaṃ
atk-s0506a:2483_6: katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane tiṃsayojanike kanakavimāne suttappabuddho viya accharāsahassaparivuto
atk-s0506a:2484_0: Atha māṇavaṃ kālakataṃ disvā setabyagāmavāsino manussā setabyaṃ gantvā tassa mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0506a:2484_1: ukkaṭṭhagāmavāsino ca ukkaṭṭhaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa kathesuṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0506a:2484_2: sutvā tassa mātāpitaro ñātimittā brāhmaṇo ca pokkharasāti saparivārā assumukhā rodamānā
atk-s0506a:2484_3: taṃ padesaṃ agamaṃsu, yebhuyyena setabyavāsino ca ukkaṭṭhavāsino ca icchānaṅgalavāsino
atk-s0506a:2484_4: ca sannipatiṃsu, mahāsamāgamo ahosi. Atha māṇavassa mātāpitaro maggassa avidūre citakaṃ
atk-s0506a:2485_0: Atha bhagavā cintesi “mayi gate chattamāṇavo maṃ vandituṃ āgamissati, āgatañca taṃ
atk-s0506a:2485_1: katakammaṃ kathāpento kammaphalaṃ paccakkhaṃ kāretvā dhammaṃ desessāmi, evaṃ mahājanassa
atk-s0506a:2485_2: dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī”ti cintetvā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ taṃ padesaṃ
atk-s0506a:2485_3: upagantvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjento. Atha
atk-s0506a:2485_4: chattamāṇavadevaputtopi attano sampattiṃ paccavekkhitvā, tassā kāraṇaṃ upadhārento
atk-s0506a:2485_5: saraṇagamanañca sīlasamādānañca disvā, vimhayajāto bhagavati sañjātapasādabahumāno
atk-s0506a:2485_6: “idānevāhaṃ gantvā bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca vandissāmi, ratanattayaguṇe ca
atk-s0506a:2485_7: mahājanassa pākaṭe karissāmī”ti kataññutaṃ nissāya sakalaṃ taṃ araññapadesaṃ ekālokaṃ
atk-s0506a:2485_8: karonto, saha vimānena āgantvā vimānato oruyha mahatā parivārena saddhiṃ dissamānarūpo
atk-s0506a:2485_9: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatanto abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha ekamantaṃ
atk-s0506a:2485_10: aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ disvā mahājano “ko nu kho ayaṃ devo vā brahmā vā”ti acchariyabbhutajāto
atk-s0506a:2485_11: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ parivāresi. Bhagavā tena katapuññakammaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ –
atk-s0506a:2487: “Na tathā tapati nabhe sūriyo, cando ca na bhāsati na phusso;
atk-s0506a:2488: Yathā atulamidaṃ mahappabhāsaṃ, ko nu tvaṃ tidivā mahiṃ upāgā.
atk-s0506a:2491: Rattimapi yathā divaṃ karoti, parisuddhaṃ vimalaṃ subhaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2503: Yathā ca te adhigatamidaṃ vimānaṃ, tadanupadaṃ avacāsi iggha puṭṭho”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2505_0: 886. Tattha tapatīti dippati. Nabheti ākāse. Phussoti phussatārakā. Atulanti anupamaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2505_1: appamāṇaṃ vā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā idaṃ tava vimānaṃ anupamaṃ appamāṇaṃ pabhassarabhāvena
atk-s0506a:2505_2: tato eva mahappabhāsaṃ ākāse dippati, na tathā tārakarūpāni dippanti, na cando, tāni
atk-s0506a:2505_3: tāva tiṭṭhantu, nāpi sūriyo dippati, evaṃbhūto ko nu tvaṃ devalokato imaṃ bhūmipadesaṃ
atk-s0506a:2505_4: upagato, taṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā imassa mahājanassa kathehīti.
atk-s0506a:2506_0: 890. Chindatīti vicchindati, pavattituṃ adento paṭihanatīti attho. Raṃsīti rasmiyo.
atk-s0506a:2506_1: Pabhaṅkarassāti sūriyassa. Tassa ca vimānassa pabhā samantato pañcavīsati yojanāni
atk-s0506a:2506_2: pharitvā tiṭṭhati. Tenāha “sādhikavīsatiyojanāni ābhā”ti. Rattimapi yathā divaṃ karotīti
atk-s0506a:2506_3: attano pabhāya andhakāraṃ vidhamantaṃ rattibhāgampi divasabhāgaṃ viya karoti. Parisamantato
atk-s0506a:2506_4: anto ceva bahi ca suddhatāya parisuddhaṃ. Sabbaso malābhāvena vimalaṃ. Sundaratāya subhaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2507_1: Setakamalaṃ padumaṃ, rattakamalaṃ puṇḍarīkanti vadanti. Vokiṇṇaṃ kusumehīti aññehi
atk-s0506a:2507_2: ca nānāvidhehi pupphehi samokiṇṇaṃ. Nekacittanti mālākammalatākammādinānāvidhavicittaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2507_3: Arajavirajahemajālachannanti sayaṃ apagatarajaṃ virajena niddosena kañcanajālena chāditaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2508_0: 892. Rattambarapītavāsasāhīti rattavatthāhi ceva pītavatthāhi ca. Ekā hi rattaṃ dibbavatthaṃ
atk-s0506a:2508_1: nivāsetvā pītaṃ uttariyaṃ karoti, aparā pītaṃ nivāsetvā rattaṃ uttariyaṃ karoti.
atk-s0506a:2508_3: piyaṅgumālāhi candanagandhehi ca ussadāhi, ussannadibbāgarugandhādikāhīti attho.
atk-s0506a:2509_0: 893. Bahuketthāti bahukā ettha. Anekavaṇṇāti nānārūpā. Kusamavibhūsitābharaṇāti visesato
atk-s0506a:2509_1: surabhivāyanatthaṃ dibbakusumehi alaṅkatadibbābharaṇā. Etthāti etasmiṃ vimāne. Sumanāti
atk-s0506a:2509_2: sundaramanā pamuditacittā. Anilapamuñcitā pavanti surabhinti anilena pamuñcitagandhānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2509_3: pupphānaṃ vāyunā vimuttapattapuṭaṃ viya vibandhatāya vikasitatāya ca sugandhaṃ pavāyanti.
atk-s0506a:2509_4: “Anilapadhūpitā”tipi paṭhanti, vātena mandaṃ āvuyhamānā hemamayapupphāti attho. Kanakacīrakādīhi
atk-s0506a:2509_5: veṇiādīsu otatatāya tapaniyavitatā. Yebhuyyena kañcanābharaṇehi acchāditasarīratāya
atk-s0506a:2509_6: suvaṇṇachannā. Naranāriyoti devaputtā devadhītaro ca bahukā ettha tava vimāneti dasseti.
atk-s0506a:2510: 894. Iṅghāti codanatthe nipāto puṭṭhoti pucchito imassa mahājanassa kammaphalapaccakkhabhāvāyāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:2514: Tava ratanavarassa dhammaṃ sutvā, karissāmīti ca bravittha chatto.
atk-s0506a:2517: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2520: Na hi pāṇesu asaññataṃ avaṇṇayiṃsu sappaññā;
atk-s0506a:2521: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2524: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2526: “Mā ca parajanassa rakkhitāyo, parabhariyā agamā anariyametaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2527: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2529: “Mā ca vitathaṃ aññathā abhāṇi, na hi musāvādaṃ avaṇṇayiṃsu sappaññā;
atk-s0506a:2530: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2532: “Yena ca purisassa apeti saññā, taṃ majjaṃ parivajjayassu sabbaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2533: Noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhante, pacchā te vacanaṃ tathevakāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2535: “Svāhaṃ idha pañca sikkhā karitvā, paṭipajjitvā tathāgatassa dhamme;
atk-s0506a:2536: Dvepathamagamāsiṃ coramajjhe, te maṃ tattha vadhiṃsu bhogahetu.
atk-s0506a:2538: “Ettakamidaṃ anussarāmi kusalaṃ, tato paraṃ na me vijjati aññaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2539: Tena sucaritena kammunāhaṃ, uppanno tidivesu kāmakāmī.
atk-s0506a:2542: Jalamiva yasasā samekkhamānā, bahukāmaṃ pihayanti hīnakammā.
atk-s0506a:2544: “Passa katipayāya desanāya, sugatiñcamhi gato sukhañca patto;
atk-s0506a:2545: Ye ca te satataṃ suṇanti dhammaṃ, maññe te amataṃ phusanti khemaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2547: “Appampi kataṃ mahāvipākaṃ, vipulaṃ hoti tathāgatassa dhamme;
atk-s0506a:2548: Passa katapuññatāya chatto, obhāseti pathaviṃ yathāpi sūriyo.
atk-s0506a:2550: “Kimidaṃ kusalaṃ kimācarema, icceke hi samecca mantayanti;
atk-s0506a:2551: Te mayaṃ punareva laddha mānusattaṃ, paṭipannā viharemu sīlavanto.
atk-s0506a:2553: “Bahukāro anukampako ca satthā, iti me sati agamā divā divassa;
atk-s0506a:2554: Svāhaṃ upagatomhi saccanāmaṃ, anukampassu punapi suṇemha dhammaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2556: “Ye cidha pajahanti kāmarāgaṃ, bhavarāgānusayañca pahāya mohaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2557: Na ca te puna mupenti gabbhaseyyaṃ, parinibbānagatā hi sītibhūtā”ti.
atk-s0506a:2558_0: 895. Tattha sayamidha pathe samecca māṇavenāti idha imasmiṃ pathe mahāmagge sayameva
atk-s0506a:2558_1: upagatena māṇavena brāhmaṇakumārena samecca samāgantvā. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi
atk-s0506a:2558_2: sattānaṃ yathārahamanusāsanato satthā bhagavā, tvaṃ yaṃ māṇavaṃ yathādhammaṃ anusāsi
atk-s0506a:2558_3: anukampamāno anuggaṇhanto, tava ratanavarassa aggaratanassa sammāsambuddhassa, taṃ
atk-s0506a:2558_4: dhammaṃ sutvā iti evaṃ karissāmi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjissāmīti, so chatto chattanāmako
atk-s0506a:2559_0: 896. Evaṃ yathāpucchitaṃ kammaṃ kāraṇato dassetvā idāni taṃ sarūpato vibhāgato ca
atk-s0506a:2559_1: dassento satthārā samādapitabhāvaṃ attanā ca tattha pacchā patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0506a:2559_2: “jinavarapavara”ntiādimāha. Tattha noti paṭhamaṃ avocahaṃ bhanteti bhante bhagavā
atk-s0506a:2559_3: “saraṇagamanaṃ jānāsī”ti tayā vutto “no”ti na “jānāmī”ti paṭhamaṃ avocaṃ ahaṃ. Pacchā
atk-s0506a:2559_4: te vacanaṃ tathevakāsinti pacchā tayā vuttaṃ kathaṃ parivattento tava vacanaṃ tatheva
atk-s0506a:2559_5: akāsiṃ paṭipajjiṃ, tīṇipi saraṇāni upagacchinti attho.
atk-s0506a:2560_0: 897. Vividhanti uccāvacaṃ, appasāvajjaṃ mahāsāvajjañcāti attho. Mā carassūti mā akāsi.
atk-s0506a:2560_1: Asucinti kilesāsucimissatāya na suciṃ. Pāṇesu asaññatanti pāṇaghātato avirataṃ. Na
atk-s0506a:2560_2: hi avaṇṇayiṃsūti na hi vaṇṇayanti. Paccūppannakālatthe hi idaṃ atītakālavacanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2560_3: Atha vā “avaṇṇayiṃsū”ti ekadesena sakalassa kālassa upalakkhaṇaṃ, tasmā yathā na
atk-s0506a:2560_4: vaṇṇayiṃsu atītamaddhānaṃ, evaṃ etarahipi na vaṇṇayanti, anāgatepi na vaṇṇayissantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0506a:2561_0: 898-900. Parajanassa rakkhitanti parapariggahitavatthu. Tenāha “adinna”nti. Mā agamāti
atk-s0506a:2561_1: mā ajjhācari. Vitathanti atathaṃ, musāti attho. Aññathāti aññathāva, vitathasaññī
atk-s0506a:2561_2: evaṃ vitathanti jānanto evaṃ mā bhaṇīti attho.
atk-s0506a:2562: 901. Yenāti yena majjena, pītenāti adhippāyo. Apetīti vigacchati. Saññāti dhammasaññā, lokasaññā eva vā. Sabbanti anavasesaṃ, bījato paṭṭhāyāti attho.
atk-s0506a:2563_0: 902. Svāhanti so tadā chattamāṇavabhūto ahaṃ. Idha imasmiṃ maggapadese, imasmiṃ vā
atk-s0506a:2563_1: tava sāsane. Tenāha “tathāgatassa dhamme”ti. Pañca sikkhāti pañca sīlāni. Karitvāti
atk-s0506a:2563_2: ādiyitvā, adhiṭṭhāyāti attho. Dvepathanti dvinnaṃ gāmasīmānaṃ vemajjhabhūtaṃ pathaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2563_3: sīmantarikapathanti attho. Teti te corā. Tatthāti sīmantarikamagge. Bhogahetūti āmisakiñcikkhanimittaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2564: 903. Tatoti yathāvuttakusalato paraṃ upari aññaṃ kusalaṃ na vijjati na upalabbhati, yamahaṃ anussareyyanti attho. Kāmakāmīti yathicchitakāmaguṇasamaṅgī.
atk-s0506a:2565_1: yathādhigatassa phalassa anurūpadhammaṃ paṭipajjamānassa bhagavā passa, tuyhaṃ ovādadhammassa
atk-s0506a:2565_2: vā anurūpāya dhammapaṭipattiyā vuttaniyāmeneva saraṇagamanassa sīlasamādānassa cāti
atk-s0506a:2565_3: attho. Jalamiva yasasāti iddhiyā parivārasampattiyā ca jalantaṃ viya. Samekkhamānāti
atk-s0506a:2565_4: passantā. Bahukāti bahavo. Pihayantīti “kathaṃ nu kho mayaṃ edisā bhaveyyāmā”ti patthenti.
atk-s0506a:2566: 905. Katipayāyāti appikāya. Yeti ye bhikkhū ceva upāsakādayo ca. Ca-saddo byatireke. Teti tava. Satatanti divase divase.
atk-s0506a:2567_0: 906. Vipulanti uḷāraphalaṃ vipulānubhāvaṃ. Tathāgatassa dhammeti tathāgatassa sāsane
atk-s0506a:2567_1: ovāde ṭhatvā katanti yojanā. Evaṃ anuddesikavasena vuttamevatthaṃ attuddesikavasena
atk-s0506a:2567_2: dassento “passā”tiādimāha. Tattha passāti bhagavantaṃ vadati, attānameva vā aññaṃ
atk-s0506a:2568_0: 907. Kimidaṃ kusalaṃ kimācaremāti kusalaṃ nāmetaṃ kiṃsabhāvaṃ kīdisaṃ, kathaṃ vā
atk-s0506a:2568_1: taṃ ācareyyāma. Icceke hi samecca mantayantīti evameke samecca samāgantvā pathaviṃ
atk-s0506a:2568_2: parivattentā viya sineruṃ ukkhipantā viya ca sudukkaraṃ katvā mantayanti vicārenti,
atk-s0506a:2568_3: mayaṃ pana akiccheneva punapi kusalaṃ ācareyyāmāti adhippāyo. Tenevāha “maya”ntiādi.
atk-s0506a:2569_0: 908. Bahukāroti bahūpakāro, mahāupakāro vā. Anukampakoti kāruṇiko. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro.
atk-s0506a:2569_1: Itīti evaṃ, bhagavato attani paṭipannākāraṃ sandhāya vadati. Me satīti mayi sati
atk-s0506a:2569_2: vijjamāne, corehi avadhite evāti attho. Divā divassāti divasassapi divā, kālassevāti
atk-s0506a:2569_3: attho. Svāhanti so chattamāṇavabhūto ahaṃ. Saccanāmanti “bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādināmehi
atk-s0506a:2569_4: avitathanāmaṃ bhūtatthanāmaṃ. Anukampassūti anuggaṇhāhi. Punapīti bhiyyopi suṇemu,
atk-s0506a:2570_0: Evaṃ devaputto sabbametaṃ kataññutābhāve ṭhatvā satthu payirupāsane ca dhammassavane
atk-s0506a:2570_1: ca atittimeva dīpento vadati. Bhagavā devaputtassa ca tattha sannipatitaparisāya
atk-s0506a:2570_2: ca ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā anupubbikathaṃ kathesi. Atha nesaṃ allacittataṃ ñatvā sāmukkaṃsikaṃ
atk-s0506a:2570_3: dhammadesanaṃ pakāsesi. Desanāpariyosāne devaputto ceva mātāpitaro cassa sotāpattiphale
atk-s0506a:2570_4: patiṭṭhahiṃsu, mahato ca janakāyassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0506a:2571_0: 909. Paṭhamaphale patiṭṭhito devaputto uparimaggesu attano garucittīkāraṃ, tadadhigamassa
atk-s0506a:2571_1: ca mahānisaṃsataṃ vibhāvento “ye cidha pajahanti kāmarāga”nti pariyosānagāthamāha.
atk-s0506a:2571_2: Tassattho – ye idha imasmiṃ sāsane ṭhitā pajahanti anavasesato samucchindanti kāmarāgaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2571_3: na ca te puna upenti gabbhaseyyaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ samucchinnattā. Ye
atk-s0506a:2571_4: ca pana pahāya mohaṃ sabbaso samugghātetvā bhavarāgānusayañca pajahanti, te puna
atk-s0506a:2571_5: upenti gabbhaseyyanti vattabbameva natthi. Kasmā? Parinibbānagatā hi sītibhūtā, te
atk-s0506a:2571_6: hi uttamapurisā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānaṃ gatā evaṃ idheva sabbavedayitānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2572_0: Iti devaputto attano ariyasotasamāpannabhāvaṃ pavedento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0506a:2572_1: desanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghassa apacitiṃ
atk-s0506a:2572_2: dassetvā mātāpitaro āpucchitvā devalokameva gato, satthāpi uṭṭhāyāsanā gato saddhiṃ
atk-s0506a:2572_3: bhikkhusaṅghena. Māṇavassa pana mātāpitaro brāhmaṇo pokkharasāti sabbo ca mahājano
atk-s0506a:2572_4: bhagavantaṃ anugantvā nivatti. Bhagavā jetavanaṃ gantvā sannipatitāya parisāya imaṃ
atk-s0506a:2572_5: vimānaṃ vitthārato kathesi. Sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0506a:2575_0: Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇaṃ vimānanti kakkaṭakarasadāyakavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā
atk-s0506a:2575_1: rājagahe viharati veḷuvane. Tena samayena aññataro bhikkhu āraddhavipassako kaṇṇasūlena
atk-s0506a:2575_2: pīḷito akallasarīratāya vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ nāsakkhi, vejjehi vuttavidhinā bhesajje
atk-s0506a:2575_3: katepi rogo na vūpasami. So bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Athassa bhagavā “kakkaṭakarasabhojanaṃ
atk-s0506a:2575_4: sappāya”nti ñatvā āha “gaccha tvaṃ bhikkhu magadhakhette piṇḍāya carāhī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2576_0: So bhikkhu “dīghadassinā addhā kiñci diṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “sādhu bhante”ti
atk-s0506a:2576_1: bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pattacīvaramādāya magadhakhettaṃ gantvā
atk-s0506a:2576_2: aññatarassa khettapālassa kuṭiyā dvāre piṇḍāya aṭṭhāsi. So ca khettapālo kakkaṭakarasaṃ
atk-s0506a:2576_3: sampādetvā bhattañca pacitvā “thokaṃ vissamitvā bhuñjissāmī”ti nisinno theraṃ disvā
atk-s0506a:2576_4: pattaṃ gahetvā kuṭikāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā kakkaṭakarasabhattaṃ adāsi. Therassa taṃ bhattaṃ
atk-s0506a:2576_5: thokaṃ bhuttassayeva kaṇṇasūlaṃ paṭippassambhi, ghaṭasatena nhāto viya ahosi. So
atk-s0506a:2576_6: sappāyāhāravasena cittaphāsukaṃ labhitvā vipassanāvasena cittaṃ abhininnāmento apariyositeyeva
atk-s0506a:2576_7: bhojane anavasesato āsave khepetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāya khettapālaṃ āha “upāsaka,
atk-s0506a:2576_8: tava piṇḍapātabhojanena mayhaṃ rogo vūpasanto, kāyacittaṃ kallaṃ jātaṃ, tvampi imassa
atk-s0506a:2576_9: puññassa phalena vigatakāyacittadukkho bhavissasī”ti vatvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0506a:2577_0: Khettapālo aparena samayena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike maṇithambhe
atk-s0506a:2577_1: kanakavimāne sattasatakūṭāgārapaṭimaṇḍite veḷuriyamayagabbhe nibbatti, dvāre cassa
atk-s0506a:2577_2: yathūpacitakammasaṃsūcako muttāsikkāgato suvaṇṇakakkaṭako olambamāno aṭṭhāsi. Athāyasmā
atk-s0506a:2577_3: mahāmoggallāno pubbe vuttanayena tattha gato taṃ disvā imāhi gāthāhi pucchi –
atk-s0506a:2580: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.
atk-s0506a:2582: “Tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ;
atk-s0506a:2583: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
atk-s0506a:2585: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
atk-s0506a:2586: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0506a:2588: “Pucchāmi taṃ deva mahānubhāva, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2589: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2593: Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phala”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2598: “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo, tena me idha mijjhati;
atk-s0506a:2599: Uppajjanti ca me bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0506a:2601: “Akkhāmi te bhikkhu mahānubhāva, manussabhūto yamakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2602: Tenamhi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2603: 910. Tattha uccanti accuggataṃ. Maṇithūṇanti padumarāgādimaṇimayathambhaṃ. Samantatoti catūsupi passesu. Rucakatthatāti tassaṃ tassaṃ bhūmiyaṃ suvaṇṇaphalakehi atthatā.
atk-s0506a:2604_0: 911. Pivasi khādasi cāti kālena kālaṃ upayujjamānaṃ gandhapānaṃ sudhābhojanañca sandhāya
atk-s0506a:2604_1: vadati. Pavadantīti pavajjanti. Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañcāti dibbā rasā anappakā
atk-s0506a:2604_2: pañca kāmaguṇā ettha etasmiṃ tava vimāne saṃvijjantīti attho. Suvaṇṇachannāti hemābharaṇavibhūsitā.
atk-s0506a:2605_0: 915. Satisamuppādakaroti satuppādakaro, yena puññakammena ayaṃ dibbasampatti mayā
atk-s0506a:2605_1: laddhā, tattha satuppādassa kārako, “kakkaṭakarasadānena ayaṃ tayā sampatti laddhā”ti
atk-s0506a:2605_2: evaṃ satuppādaṃ karontoti attho. Niṭṭhito jātarūpassāti jātarūpena siddho jātarūpamayo.
atk-s0506a:2605_3: Ekamekasmiṃ passe pañca pañca katvā dasa pādā etassāti dasapādako dvāre kakkaṭako
atk-s0506a:2605_4: ṭhito sobhati. So eva mama puññakammaṃ tādisānaṃ mahesīnaṃ vibhāveti, na ettha mayā
atk-s0506a:2605_5: vattabbaṃ atthīti adhippāyo. Tenāha “tena metādiso vaṇṇo”tiādi. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:2608_0: Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇanti dvārapālakavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā rājagahe viharati
atk-s0506a:2608_1: veḷuvane. Tena ca samayena rājagahe aññataro upāsako cattāri niccabhattāni saṅghassa
atk-s0506a:2608_2: deti. Tassa pana gehaṃ pariyante ṭhitaṃ corabhayena yebhuyyena pihitadvārameva hoti.
atk-s0506a:2608_3: Bhikkhū gantvā kadāci dvārassa pihitattā bhattaṃ aladdhāva paṭigacchanti. Upāsako
atk-s0506a:2608_4: bhariyaṃ āha “kiṃ, bhadde, ayyānaṃ sakkaccaṃ bhikkhā dīyatī”ti? Sā āha “ekesu divasesu
atk-s0506a:2608_5: ayyā nāgamiṃsū”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇa”nti? “Dvārassa pihitattā maññe”ti. Taṃ sutvā upāsako
atk-s0506a:2608_6: saṃvegappatto hutvā ekaṃ purisaṃ dvārapālaṃ katvā ṭhapesi “tvaṃ ajjato paṭṭhāya dvāraṃ
atk-s0506a:2608_7: rakkhanto nisīda, yadā ca ayyā āgamissanti, tadā te pavesetvā paviṭṭhānaṃ nesaṃ pattapaṭiggahaṇaāsanapaññāpanādi
atk-s0506a:2608_8: sabbaṃ yuttapayuttaṃ jānāhī”ti. So “sādhū”ti tathā karonto bhikkhūnaṃ santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0506a:2608_9: sutvā uppannasaddho kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahi, sakkaccaṃ bhikkhū upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0506a:2609_0: Aparabhāge niccabhattadāyako upāsako kālaṃ katvā yāmesu nibbatti. Dvārapālo pana
atk-s0506a:2609_1: sakkaccaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā parassa pariccāge veyyāvaccakaraṇena anumodanena
atk-s0506a:2609_2: ca tāvatiṃsesu uppajji. Tassa dvādasayojanikaṃ kanakavimānantiādi sabbaṃ kakkaṭakavimāne

atk-s0506a:2624_0: 923. Tattha dibbaṃ mamaṃ vassasahassamāyūti yasmiṃ devanikāye sayaṃ uppanno, tesaṃ
atk-s0506a:2624_1: tāvatiṃsadevānaṃ āyuppamāṇameva vadati. Tesañhi manussānaṃ gaṇanāya vassasataṃ eko
atk-s0506a:2624_2: rattidivo, tāya rattiyā tiṃsarattiko māso, tena māsena dvādasamāsiko saṃvaccharo,
atk-s0506a:2624_3: tena saṃvaccharena sahassasaṃvaccharāni āyu, taṃ manussānaṃ gaṇanāya tisso vassakoṭiyo
atk-s0506a:2624_4: saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassāni honti. Vācābhigītanti vācāya abhigītaṃ, “āgacchantu
atk-s0506a:2624_5: ayyā, idaṃ āsanaṃ paññattaṃ, idha nisīdathā”tiādinā, “kiṃ ayyānaṃ sarīrassa ārogyaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2624_6: kiṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ phāsuka”ntiādinā paṭisanthāravasena ca vācāya kathitamattaṃ. Manasā
atk-s0506a:2624_7: pavattitanti “ime ayyā pesalā brahmacārino dhammacārino”tiādinā cittena pavattitaṃ
atk-s0506a:2624_8: pasādamattaṃ, na pana mama santakaṃ kiñci pariccattaṃ atthīti dasseti. Ettāvatāti
atk-s0506a:2624_9: ettakena evaṃ kathanamattena pasādamattenapi. Ṭhassati puññakammoti katapuñño nāma
atk-s0506a:2624_10: hutvā devaloke ṭhassati ciraṃ pavattissati, tiṭṭhanto ca dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgībhūto
atk-s0506a:2624_11: tasmiṃ devanikāye devānaṃ valañjaniyāmeneva dibbehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūto
atk-s0506a:2624_12: samannāgato hutvā indriyāni paricārento viharatīti attho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:2627_0: Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇanti karaṇīyavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati
atk-s0506a:2627_1: jetavane. Tena samayena sāvatthivāsī eko upāsako nhānopakaraṇāni gahetvā aciravatiṃ
atk-s0506a:2627_2: gantvā nhatvā āgacchanto bhagavantaṃ sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0506a:2627_3: vanditvā evamāha “bhante kena nimantitā”ti. Bhagavā tuṇhī ahosi. So kenaci animantitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0506a:2627_4: ñatvā āha “adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā bhattaṃ anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti. Adhivāsesi
atk-s0506a:2627_5: bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena. So bhagavantaṃ attano gehaṃ netvā buddhārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0506a:2627_6: tattha bhagavantaṃ nisīdāpetvā paṇītena annapānena santappesi. Bhagavā katabhattakicco
atk-s0506a:2627_7: tassa anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Sesaṃ anantaravimānasadisaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0506a:2628: 926. “Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇaṃ vimānaṃ…pe… nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
atk-s0506a:2629: 928. “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2637: 933. “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2638: 931. Tattha paṇḍitenāti sappaññena. Vijānatāti attano hitāhitaṃ jānantena. Sammaggatesūti sammāpaṭipannesu, buddhesūti sammāsambuddhesu.
atk-s0506a:2639_0: 932. Atthāyāti hitāya, vuḍḍhiyā vā. Araññāti vihārato, jetavanaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0506a:2639_1: Tāvatiṃsūpagoti tāvatiṃsadevakāyaṃ, tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ vā uppajjanavasena upagato.
atk-s0506a:2642: Sattamavimānaṃ chaṭṭhavimānasadisaṃ. Kevalaṃ tattha upāsakena bhagavato āhāro dinno, idha aññatarassa therassa. Esaṃ vuttanayameva. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0506a:2645: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.
atk-s0506a:2647: “Tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ;
atk-s0506a:2648: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
atk-s0506a:2649: 937. “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatīti.
atk-s0506a:2658: 942. “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2661_0: Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇaṃ vimānanti sūcivimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā rājagahe viharati
atk-s0506a:2661_1: veḷuvane. Tena samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa cīvarakammaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti, attho ca
atk-s0506a:2661_2: hoti sūciyā. So rājagahe piṇḍāya caranto kammārassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ disvā
atk-s0506a:2661_3: kammāro āha “kena, bhante, attho”ti? “Cīvarakammaṃ kātabbaṃ atthi, sūciyā attho”ti.
atk-s0506a:2661_4: Kammāro pasannamānaso katapariyositā dve sūciyo datvā “punapi, bhante, sūciyā atthe
atk-s0506a:2661_5: sati mama ācikkheyyāthā”ti vatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi. Thero tassa anumodanaṃ
atk-s0506a:2661_6: katvā pakkāmi. So aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajji. Atha āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0506a:2661_7: devacārikaṃ caranto taṃ devaputtaṃ imāhi gāthāhi pucchi –
atk-s0506a:2667: “Yaṃ dadāti na taṃ hoti, yañceva dajjā tañceva seyyo;
atk-s0506a:2672_0: 949. Tattha yaṃ dadātīti yādisaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dadāti. Na taṃ hotīti tassa tādisameva
atk-s0506a:2672_1: phalaṃ na hoti. Atha kho khettasampattiyā ca cittasampattiyā ca tato vipulataraṃ
atk-s0506a:2672_2: uḷāratarameva phalaṃ hoti. Tasmā yañceva dajjā tañceva seyyoti yaṃkiñcideva vijjamānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2672_3: dajjā dadeyya, tañceva tadeva seyyo, yassa kassaci anavajjassa deyyadhammassa dānameva
atk-s0506a:2672_4: seyyo, kasmā? Mayā hi sūci dinnā sūcimeva seyyo, sūcidānameva mayhaṃ seyyaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0506a:2675_0: Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇanti dutiyasūcivimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā rājagahe viharati
atk-s0506a:2675_1: veḷuvane. Tena samayena rājagahavāsī eko tunnakārako vihārapekkhako hutvā veḷuvanaṃ
atk-s0506a:2675_2: gato. Tattha aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ veḷuvane katasūciyā cīvaraṃ sibbantaṃ disvā sūcigharena
atk-s0506a:2675_3: saddhiṃ sūciyo adāsi. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:2678: Vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti. – pucchi;
atk-s0506a:2685: Tassa adāsahaṃ sūciṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi.
atk-s0506a:2687: “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2691_0: Susukkakhandhaṃ abhiruyha nāganti nāgavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0506a:2691_1: viharati jetavane. Tena samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva devacārikaṃ
atk-s0506a:2691_2: caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ upagato. Tattha addasa aññataraṃ devaputtaṃ sabbasetaṃ
atk-s0506a:2691_3: mahantaṃ dibbanāgaṃ abhiruyha mahantena parivārena mahatā dibbānubhāvena ākāsena
atk-s0506a:2691_4: gacchantaṃ, sabbā disā cando viya sūriyo viya ca obhāsayamānaṃ. Disvā yena so devaputto
atk-s0506a:2691_5: tenupasaṅkami. Atha so devaputto tato oruyha āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0506a:2693: “Susukkakhandhaṃ abhiruyha nāgaṃ, akācinaṃ dantiṃ baliṃ mahājavaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2694: Abhiruyha gajavaraṃ sukappitaṃ, idhāgamā vehāyasaṃ antalikkhe.
atk-s0506a:2696: “Nāgassa dantesu duvesu nimmitā, acchodakā paduminiyo suphullā;
atk-s0506a:2697: Padumesu ca tūriyagaṇā pavajjare, imā ca naccanti manoharāyo.
atk-s0506a:2700: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2702_0: 961. Tattha susukkakhandhanti suṭṭhu setakhandhaṃ. Kiñcāpi tassa nāgassa cattāro
atk-s0506a:2702_1: pādā, vatthikosaṃ, mukhappadeso, ubho kaṇṇā, vāladhīti ettakaṃ muñcitvā sabbo kāyo
atk-s0506a:2702_2: setova, khandhappadesassa pana sātisayaṃ dhavalataratāya vuttaṃ “susukkakhandha”nti.
atk-s0506a:2702_3: Nāganti dibbaṃ hatthināgaṃ. Akācinanti niddosaṃ, sabalalavaṅkatilakādichavidosavirahitanti
atk-s0506a:2702_4: attho. “Ājānīya”ntipi pāḷi, ājānīyalakkhaṇūpetanti attho. Dantinti vipularuciradantavantaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2702_5: Balinti balavantaṃ mahābalaṃ. Mahājavanti atijavaṃ sīghagāmiṃ. Puna abhiruyhāti ettha
atk-s0506a:2702_6: anunāsikalopo daṭṭhabbo, abhiruyhaṃ ārohanīyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:2703: Evaṃ pana therena puṭṭho devaputto attanā katakammaṃ kathento –
atk-s0506a:2709: Vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti. – imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi;
atk-s0506a:2710_0: Tassattho – ahaṃ pubbe kassapasammāsambuddhassa yojanike kanakathūpe vaṇṭato muccitvā
atk-s0506a:2710_1: gacchamūle patitāni aṭṭha muttapupphāni labhitvā tāni gahetvā pūjanavasena pasannacitto
atk-s0506a:2711_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddhe parinibbute yojanike kanakathūpe ca kārite saparivāro
atk-s0506a:2711_1: kikī kāsirājā ca nāgarā ca negamā ca jānapadā ca divase divase pupphapūjaṃ karonti.
atk-s0506a:2711_2: Tesu tathā karontesu pupphāni mahagghāni dullabhāni ca ahesuṃ. Atheko upāsako mālākāravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0506a:2711_3: vicaritvā ekamekena kahāpaṇena ekamekampi pupphaṃ alabhanto aṭṭha kahāpaṇāni gahetvā
atk-s0506a:2711_4: pupphārāmaṃ gantvā mālākāraṃ āha “imehi aṭṭhahi kahāpaṇehi aṭṭha pupphāni dehī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2711_5: “Natthayyo pupphāni, sammadeva upadhāretvā ocinitvā dinnānī”ti. “Ahaṃ oloketvā gaṇhāmī”ti.
atk-s0506a:2711_6: “Yadi evaṃ, ārāmaṃ pavisitvā gavesāhī”ti. So pavisitvā gavesanto patitāni aṭṭha pupphāni
atk-s0506a:2711_7: labhitvā mālākāraṃ āha “gaṇha, tāta, kahāpaṇānī”ti. “Tava puññena laddhāni, nāhaṃ
atk-s0506a:2711_8: kahāpaṇāni gaṇhāmī”ti āha. Itaro “nāhaṃ mudhā pupphāni gahetvā bhagavato pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0506a:2711_9: kahāpaṇāni tassa purato ṭhapetvā pupphāni gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā pasannacitto
atk-s0506a:2711_10: pūjaṃ akāsi. So aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajjitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0506a:2711_11: ṭhatvā punapi devaloke, punapi devaloketi evaṃ aparāparaṃ devesuyeva saṃsaranto tasseva
atk-s0506a:2711_12: kammassa vipākāvasesena imasmimpi buddhuppāde tāvatiṃsesuyeva uppajji. Taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0506a:2712_0: Taṃ panetaṃ pavattiṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno manussalokaṃ āgantvā bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0506a:2712_1: Bhagavā tamatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya vitthārena dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0506a:2715_0: Mahantaṃ nāgaṃ abhiruyhāti dutiyanāgavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā rājagahe
atk-s0506a:2715_1: viharati veḷuvane. Tena samayena rājagahe aññataro upāsako saddho pasanno pañcasu
atk-s0506a:2715_2: sīlesu patiṭṭhito uposathadivasesu uposathasīlaṃ samādiyitvā purebhattaṃ attano vibhavānurūpaṃ
atk-s0506a:2715_3: bhikkhūnaṃ dānāni datvā sayaṃ bhuñjitvā suddhavatthanivattho suddhuttarāsaṅgo pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0506a:2715_4: yebhuyyena aṭṭha pānāni gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyādetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0506a:2715_5: upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ suṇāti. Evaṃ so sakkaccaṃ dānamayaṃ sīlamayañca bahuṃ sucaritaṃ
atk-s0506a:2715_6: upacinitvā ito cuto tāvatiṃsesu uppajji. Tassa puññānubhāvena sabbaseto mahanto dibbo
atk-s0506a:2715_7: hatthināgo pāturahosi. So taṃ abhiruyha mahantena parivārena mahantena dibbānubhāvena
atk-s0506a:2716_0: Athekadivasaṃ kataññutāya codiyamāno aḍḍharattisamaye taṃ dibbanāgaṃ abhiruyha mahatā
atk-s0506a:2716_1: parivārena “bhagavantaṃ vandissāmī”ti devalokato āgantvā kevalakappaṃ veḷuvanaṃ obhāsetvā
atk-s0506a:2716_2: hatthikkhandhato oruyha bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha ekamantaṃ
atk-s0506a:2716_3: aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ bhagavato samīpe ṭhito āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavato anuññāya imāhi gāthāhi pucchi –
atk-s0506a:2720: Obhāsento disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā.
atk-s0506a:2724: Tatthā pucchito sopi tassa gāthāhi eva byākāsi.
atk-s0506a:2727: Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ”.
atk-s0506a:2730: Pāṇātipātā virato ahosiṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayissaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2732: “Amajjapo no ca musā abhāṇiṃ, sakena dārena ca tuṭṭho ahosiṃ;
atk-s0506a:2733: Annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2737: Tattha apubbaṃ natthi, sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:2740_0: Ko nu dibbena yānenāti tatiyanāgavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā rājagahe viharati
atk-s0506a:2740_1: veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. Tena samayena tayo khīṇāsavattherā gāmakāvāse vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
atk-s0506a:2740_2: Te vutthavassā pavāretvā “bhagavantaṃ vandissāmā”ti rājagahaṃ uddissa gacchantā antarāmagge
atk-s0506a:2740_3: sāyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ gāmake micchādiṭṭhikabrāhmaṇassa ucchukhettasamīpaṃ gantvā ucchupālaṃ
atk-s0506a:2740_4: pucchiṃsu “āvuso, sakkā ajja rājagahaṃ pāpuṇitu”nti. “Na sakkā, bhante, ito aḍḍhayojane
atk-s0506a:2740_5: rājagahaṃ, idheva vasitvā sve gacchathā”ti āha. “Atthettha koci vasanayoggo āvāso”ti?
atk-s0506a:2740_6: “Natthi, bhante, ahaṃ pana vo vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānissāmī”ti. Therā adhivāsesuṃ.
atk-s0506a:2741_0: So ucchūsuyeva yathāṭhitesu sākhāmaṇḍapākārena daṇḍakāni bandhitvā ucchupaṇṇehi chādetvā
atk-s0506a:2741_1: heṭṭhā palālaṃ attharitvā ekassa therassa adāsi, dutiyassa therassa tīhi ucchūhi
atk-s0506a:2741_2: daṇḍakasaṅkhepena bandhitvā tiṇena chādetvā heṭṭhā ca tiṇasantharaṃ katvā adāsi,
atk-s0506a:2741_3: itarassa attano kuṭiyaṃ dve tayo daṇḍake sākhāyo ca nīharitvā cīvarena paṭicchādento
atk-s0506a:2741_4: cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā adāsi. Te tattha vasiṃsu. Atha vibhātāya rattiyā kālasseva bhattaṃ
atk-s0506a:2741_5: pacitvā dantakaṭṭhañca mukhodakañca datvā saha ucchurasena bhattaṃ adāsi. Tesaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0506a:2741_6: anumodanaṃ katvā gacchantānaṃ ekekaṃ ucchuṃ adāsi “mayhaṃ bhāgo bhavissatī”ti. So
atk-s0506a:2741_7: thokaṃ maggaṃ there anugantvā nivattanto attano veyyāvaccañca dānañca ārabbha uḷāraṃ
atk-s0506a:2742_0: Khettasāmiko pana gacchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipathena āgacchanto bhikkhū pucchi “kuto
atk-s0506a:2742_1: vo ucchu laddhā”ti? “Ucchupālakena dinnā”ti. Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo kupito anattamano
atk-s0506a:2742_2: taṭataṭāyamāno kodhābhibhūto tassa piṭṭhito upadhāvitvā muggarena taṃ paharanto ekappahāreneva
atk-s0506a:2742_3: jīvitā voropesi. So attanā katapuññakammameva anussaranto kālaṃ katvā sudhammādevasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0506a:2742_4: nibbatti. Tassa puññānubhāvena sabbaseto mahanto dibbavaravāraṇo nibbatti.
atk-s0506a:2743_0: Ucchupālakassa maraṇaṃ sutvā tassa mātāpitaro ceva ñātimittā ca assumukhā rodamānā
atk-s0506a:2743_1: taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu, sabbe ca gāmavāsino sannipatiṃsu. Tatrassa mātāpitaro sarīrakiccaṃ
atk-s0506a:2743_2: kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe so devaputto taṃ dibbahatthiṃ abhiruhitvā sabbatāḷāvacaraparivuto
atk-s0506a:2743_3: pañcaṅgikena tūriyena pavajjamānena mahantena parivārena mahatiyā deviddhiyā devalokato
atk-s0506a:2743_4: āgantvā tāya parisāya dissamānarūpo ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ tattha paṇḍitajātiko
atk-s0506a:2743_5: puriso imāhi gāthāhi tena katapuññakammaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0506a:2749: Ajānantā taṃ pucchāma, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti.
atk-s0506a:2752: “Nāmhi devo na gandhabbo, nāpi sakko purindado;
atk-s0506a:2753: Sudhammā nāma ye devā, tesaṃ aññataro aha”nti.
atk-s0506a:2756: Kiṃ katvā mānuse kammaṃ, sudhammaṃ upapajjatī”ti – punapi pucchi;
atk-s0506a:2759: Tiṇṇaṃ aññataraṃ datvā, sudhammaṃ upapajjatī”ti. – punapi byākāsi;
atk-s0506a:2760_1: pavajjamānadibbatūriyasaddo. Antalikkhe mahīyatīti ākāse ṭhatvā ākāsaṭṭheneva mahatā
atk-s0506a:2761_0: 977. Devatā nusīti devatā nu asi, kiṃ nu tvaṃ devosīti attho. Gandhabboti gandhabbakāyikadevo
atk-s0506a:2761_1: asīti attho. Adu sakko purindadoti udāhu pure dadātīti “purindado”ti vissuto sakko
atk-s0506a:2761_2: nusi, atha sakko devarājā asīti attho. Ettha ca satipi sakkagandhabbānaṃ devabhāve

atk-s0506a:2762_0: 978. Atha devaputto “vissajjanaṃ nāma pucchāsabhāgena hotī”ti tehi pucchitaṃ devagandhabbasakkabhāvaṃ

atk-s0506a:2763: 979. Puthunti mahantaṃ, paripuṇṇaṃ katvāti attho. Sakkaccakiriyādīpanatthañhetaṃ vuttaṃ.

atk-s0506a:2765_0: Evaṃ so tena pucchi tamatthaṃ vissajjetvā ratanattayaguṇaṃ pakāsento mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ

atk-s0506a:2765_6: bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano gāmaṃ upagantvā ucchupālassa mataṭṭhāne vihāraṃ kārayiṃsūti.
atk-s0506a:2768_0: Daḷhadhammā nisārassāti cūḷarathavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0506a:2768_1: dhātuvibhāgaṃ katvā tattha tattha satthu thūpesu patiṭṭhāpiyamānesu mahākassapattherappamukhesu

atk-s0506a:2768_3: attano attano parisāya saddhiṃ tattha tattha vasantesu āyasmā mahākaccāyano paccantadese
atk-s0506a:2768_4: aññatarasmiṃ araññāyatane viharati. Tena samayena assakaraṭṭhe potalinagare assakarājā
atk-s0506a:2768_5: rajjaṃ kāreti, tassa jeṭṭhāya deviyā putto sujāto nāma kumāro soḷasavassuddesiko
atk-s0506a:2768_6: kaniṭṭhāya deviyā nibandhanena pitarā raṭṭhato pabbājito araññaṃ pavisitvā vanacarake

atk-s0506a:2768_8: puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0506a:2768_9: sugatiyaṃyeva paribbhamanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhagavato abhisambodhito tiṃsavasse
atk-s0506a:2768_10: assakaraṭṭhe assakarañño aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti, “sujāto”tissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0506a:2769_0: Tassa pana mātari kālakatāya rājā aññaṃ rājadhītaraṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sāpi
atk-s0506a:2769_1: aparena samayena puttaṃ vijāyi. Tassā rājā puttaṃ disvā pasanno “bhadde, tayā icchitaṃ
atk-s0506a:2769_2: varaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti varaṃ adāsi. Sā gahitakaṃ katvā ṭhapetvā yadā sujātakumāro soḷasavassuddesiko

atk-s0506a:2769_6: Devī punappunaṃ nibandhanaṃ karontī manaṃ alabhitvā ekadivasaṃ āha “deva, yadi sacce

atk-s0506a:2769_8: vippaṭisārī hutvā sujātakumāraṃ pakkositvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā assūni pavattesi. Kumāro
atk-s0506a:2769_9: pitaraṃ socamānaṃ disvā domanassappatto assūni pavattetvā “anujānāhi, deva, ahaṃ

atk-s0506a:2769_11: vutte kumāro na icchi. “Mama sahāyānaṃ rājūnaṃ santike pesessāmī”ti ca vutte tampi

atk-s0506a:2770_0: So araññaṃ pavisitvā vanacarake nissāya vasanto ekadivasaṃ migavaṃ gato. Tassa samaṇakāle

atk-s0506a:2770_5: tassa pavattiṃ ñatvā anuggaṇhanto ajānanto viya saṅgahaṃ karonto –
atk-s0506a:2773: Khattiyo nusi rājañño, adu luddo vanecaro”ti. –
atk-s0506a:2774_0: Pucchi. Tattha daḷhadhammāti daḷhadhanu. Daḷhadhanu nāma dvisahassathāmaṃ vuccati.

atk-s0506a:2778: Nāmaṃ me bhikkhu te brūmi, sujāto iti maṃ vidū.

atk-s0506a:2783: Taṃ sutvā thero tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto –
atk-s0506a:2789: Rājaputta tato pitvā, santhatasmiṃ upāvisā”ti. – āha;

atk-s0506a:2792: Tato rājakumāro therassa paṭisanthāraṃ sampaṭicchanto āha –
atk-s0506a:2795: Nelā atthavatī vaggu, mantvā atthañca bhāsasi.
atk-s0506a:2797: “Kā te rati vane viharato, isinisabha vadehi puṭṭho;

atk-s0506a:2801: Idāni thero attano sammāpaṭipattiṃ tassa anucchavikaṃ vadanto –
atk-s0506a:2804: Theyyā ca aticārā ca, majjapānā ca ārati.
atk-s0506a:2807: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, dhammā ete pasaṃsiyā”ti. – āha;
atk-s0506a:2808_0: 989. Tattha ārati samacariyā cāti yathāvuttā ca pāpadhammato ārati, paṭivirati kāyasamatādisamacariyā

atk-s0506a:2813: Tattha attānaṃ parimocayāti attānaṃ apāyadukkhato mocehi.
atk-s0506a:2814: Tato kumāro attano muttiyā upāyaṃ pucchanto āha –
atk-s0506a:2816: “Katamaṃ svāhaṃ janapadaṃ gantvā, kiṃ kammaṃ kiñca porisaṃ;

atk-s0506a:2818: Tattha katamaṃ svāhanti katamaṃ su ahaṃ, katamaṃ nūti attho. Kiṃ kammaṃ kiñca porisanti katvāti vacanaseso. Porisanti purisakiccaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2819: Tato thero tassa dhammaṃ desetuṃ imā gāthāyo avoca –
atk-s0506a:2821: “Na vijjate so padeso, kammaṃ vijjā ca porisaṃ;
atk-s0506a:2827: “Yadi te sutā andhakaveṇḍuputtā, sūrā vīrā vikkantappahārino;

atk-s0506a:2834: Ete caññe ca vijjāya, tepi no ajarāmarā.
atk-s0506a:2841: 992. Tattha yattha gantvāti yaṃ padesaṃ gantvā kammaṃ vijjaṃ porisañca kāyapayogena itarapayogena ca upagantvā pāpuṇitvā bhaveyya ajarāmaroti attho.
atk-s0506a:2842_0: 993. Heṭṭhimakoṭiyā koṭisatādiparimāṇaṃ saṃharitvā ṭhapitaṃ mahantaṃ dhanaṃ etesanti

atk-s0506a:2846: 997. Santāti upasantakāyavacīkammantā. Saññatattāti saññatacittā. Tapassinoti tapanissitā.

atk-s0506a:2852: Tato thero taṃ anusāsanto imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –

atk-s0506a:2865: Evaṃ so rājaputto therassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhahi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0506a:2867: “Sace hi buddho tiṭṭheyya, satthā tumhāka mārisa;
atk-s0506a:2870: “Yato ca kho parinibbuto, satthā tumhāka mārisa;
atk-s0506a:2877: Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0506a:2878_0: Evaṃ pana taṃ saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitaṃ thero evamāha “rājakumāra, tuyhaṃ
atk-s0506a:2878_1: idha araññavāsena attho natthi, na ciraṃ tava jīvitaṃ, pañcamāsabbhantare eva kālaṃ

atk-s0506a:2878_3: bhaveyyāsī”ti vatvā attano santike dhātuyo datvā vissajjesi. So gacchanto “ahaṃ,

atk-s0506a:2879_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā saparivāro uyyānaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ āliṅgitvā antepuraṃ netvā abhisiñcitukāmo
atk-s0506a:2879_1: ahosi. Kumāro “deva, mayhaṃ appakaṃ āyu, ito catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena maraṇaṃ bhavissati,

atk-s0506a:2879_3: ca ānubhāvaṃ pavedesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā saṃvegappatto ratanattaye ca there ca pasannamānaso
atk-s0506a:2879_4: mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā mahākaccāyanattherassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi. Theropi rājānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2879_5: mahājanañca anuggaṇhanto āgacchi. Rājā ca saparivāro dūratova paccuggamanaṃ katvā

atk-s0506a:2880_1: pūjaṃ akāsi, tattha mahājano sannipati, theropi saparivāro taṃ padesaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0506a:2880_2: Atha devaputto attanā katakusalakammaṃ oloketvā kataññutāya “gantvā theraṃ vandissāmi,

atk-s0506a:2882: “Sahassaraṃsīva yathāmahappabho, disaṃ yathā bhāti nabhe anukkamaṃ;

atk-s0506a:2889: Yuttā suvaṇṇassa ca rūpiyassa ca, sobhanti assā ca ime manojavā.

atk-s0506a:2893_0: 1007. Tattha sahassaraṃsīti sūriyo. So hi anekasahassaraṃsimantatāya “sahassaraṃsī”ti

atk-s0506a:2895_0: 1009. Sīsanti rathakubbarasīsaṃ. Veḷuriyassa nimmitanti veḷuriyena nimmitaṃ, veḷuriyamaṇimayanti

atk-s0506a:2916_0: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā aparāparaṃ devesuyeva saṃsaranto

atk-s0506a:2920: Uyyānabhūmiṃ abhito anukkamaṃ, purindado bhūtapatīva vāsavo.
atk-s0506a:2922: “Sovaṇṇamayā te rathakubbarā ubho, phalehi aṃsehi atīva saṅgatā;
atk-s0506a:2926: Sunandighoso ca subhassaro ca, virocatī cāmarahatthabāhubhi.
atk-s0506a:2929: Imā ca nābhyo satarājicittitā, sateratā vijjurivappabhāsare.
atk-s0506a:2931: “Anekacittāvatato ratho ayaṃ, puthū ca nemī ca sahassaraṃsiko;
atk-s0506a:2932: Tesaṃ saro suyyati vaggurūpo, pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyamivappavāditaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2934: “Sirasmiṃ cittaṃ maṇicandakappitaṃ, sadā visuddhaṃ ruciraṃ pabhassaraṃ;
atk-s0506a:2935: Suvaṇṇarājīhi atīva saṅgataṃ, veḷuriyarājīva atīva sobhati.
atk-s0506a:2937: “Ime ca vāḷī maṇicandakappitā, ārohakambū sujavā brahūpamā;
atk-s0506a:2938: Brahā mahantā balino mahājavā, mano tavaññāya tatheva siṃsare.
atk-s0506a:2940: “Ime ca sabbe sahitā catukkamā, mano tavaññāya tatheva siṃsare;
atk-s0506a:2941: Samaṃ vahantī mudukā anuddhatā, āmodamānā turagānamuttamā.
atk-s0506a:2943: “Dhunanti vagganti patanti cambare, abbhuddhunantā sukate piḷandhane;
atk-s0506a:2944: Tesaṃ saro suyyati vaggurūpo, pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyamivappavāditaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2946: “Rathassa ghoso apiḷandhanāna ca, khurassa nādo abhihiṃsanāya ca;
atk-s0506a:2947: Ghoso suvaggū samitassa suyyati, gandhabbatūriyāni vicitrasaṃvane.
atk-s0506a:2953: Kule sujātā sutanū sucimhitā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0506a:2956: Vaṭṭaṅguliyo sumukhā sudassanā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0506a:2958: “Aññā suveṇī susu missakesiyo, samaṃ vibhattāhi pabhassarāhi ca;
atk-s0506a:2959: Anubbatā tā tava mānase ratā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā.
atk-s0506a:2962: Anubbatā tā tava mānase ratā, rathe ṭhitā pañjalikā upaṭṭhitā.

atk-s0506a:2967: “Kaṇṭhesu te yāni piḷandhanāni, hatthesu pādesu tatheva sīse;
atk-s0506a:2968: Obhāsayantī dasa sabbaso disā, abbhuddayaṃ sāradikova bhāṇumā.
atk-s0506a:2970: “Vātassa vegena ca sampakampitā, bhujesu mālā apiḷandhanāni ca;
atk-s0506a:2971: Muñcanti ghosaṃ ruciraṃ suciṃ subhaṃ, sabbehi viññūhi sutabbarūpaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2973: “Uyyānabhūmyā ca duvaddhato ṭhitā, rathā ca nāgā tūriyāni ca saro;
atk-s0506a:2974: Tameva devinda pamodayanti, vīṇā yathā pokkharapattabāhubhi.
atk-s0506a:2976: “Imāsu vīṇāsu bahūsu vaggūsu, manuññarūpāsu hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ;
atk-s0506a:2977: Pavajjamānāsu atīva accharā, bhamanti kaññā padumesu sikkhitā.
atk-s0506a:2979: “Yadā ca gītāni ca vāditāni ca, naccāni cimāni samenti ekato;
atk-s0506a:2980: Athettha naccanti athettha accharā, obhāsayantī ubhato varitthiyo.
atk-s0506a:2983: Imāsu vīṇāsu bahūsu vaggūsu, manuññarūpāsu hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ.
atk-s0506a:2985: “Kiṃ tvaṃ pure kammamakāsi attanā, manussabhūto purimāya jātiyā;
atk-s0506a:2986: Uposathaṃ kaṃ vā tuvaṃ upāvasi, kaṃ dhammacariyaṃ vatamābhirocayi.
atk-s0506a:2988: “Nayīdamappassa katassa kammuno, pubbe suciṇṇassa uposathassa vā;
atk-s0506a:2989: Iddhānubhāvo vipulo ayaṃ tava, yaṃ devasaṅghaṃ abhirocase bhusaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2991: “Dānassa te idaṃ phalaṃ, atho sīlassa vā pana;

atk-s0506a:2993_0: 1015. Tattha sahassayuttanti sahassena yuttaṃ, sahassaṃ vā yuttaṃ yojitaṃ etasminti
atk-s0506a:2993_1: sahassayuttaṃ. Kassa panetaṃ sahassanti? “Hayavāhana”nti anantaraṃ vuccamānattā hayānanti
atk-s0506a:2993_2: ayamattho viññāyateva. Hayā vāhanaṃ etassāti hayavāhanaṃ. Keci pana “sahassayuttahayavāhana”nti
atk-s0506a:2993_3: anunāsikalopaṃ ekameva samāsapadaṃ katvā vaṇṇenti, etasmiṃ pakkhe hayavāhanaṃ viya
atk-s0506a:2993_4: vāhananti attho yujjati. Hayavāhanasahassayuttaṃ yuttahayavāhanasahassanti hi attho.
atk-s0506a:2993_5: Apare pana “sahassayuttanti sahassadibbājaññayutta”nti vadanti. Sandananti rathaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2993_6: Nekacittanti anekacittaṃ nānāvidhavicittavantaṃ. Uyyānabhūmiṃ abhitoti uyyānabhūmiyā
atk-s0506a:2993_7: samīpe. “Abhito”ti hi padaṃ apekkhitvā sāmiatthe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Keci pana “uyyānabhūmyā”tipi
atk-s0506a:2993_8: paṭhanti, te saddanayampi anupadhārentā paṭhanti. Anukkamanti gacchanto purindado
atk-s0506a:2994_0: 1016. Sovaṇṇamayāti suvaṇṇamayā. Teti tava. Rathakubbarā ubhoti rathassa ubhosu passesu
atk-s0506a:2994_1: vedikā. Yo hi rathassa sobhanatthañceva upari ṭhitānaṃ guttatthañca ubhosu passesu
atk-s0506a:2994_2: vedikākārena parikkhepo karīyati, tassa purimabhāge ubhosu passesu yāva rathīsā,
atk-s0506a:2994_3: tāva hatthehi gahaṇayoggo rathassa avayavaviseso, idha so eva kubbaroti adhippeto.
atk-s0506a:2994_4: Tenevāha “ubho”ti. Aññattha pana rathīsā kubbaroti vuccati. Phalehīti rathūpatthambhassa
atk-s0506a:2994_5: dakkhiṇavāmabhedehi dvīhi phalehi, pariyantāvettha phalāti vuttā. Aṃsehīti kubbaraphale
atk-s0506a:2994_6: patiṭṭhitehi heṭṭhimaaṃsehi. Atīva saṅgatāti ativiya suṭṭhu saṅgatā suphassitā nibbivarā.
atk-s0506a:2994_7: Idañca sippiviracite kittimarathe labbhamānavisesaṃ tattha āropetvā vuttaṃ. So pana
atk-s0506a:2994_8: aporisatāya akittimo sayaṃjāto kenaci aghaṭitoyeva. Sujātagumbāti susaṇṭhitathambhakasamudāyā.
atk-s0506a:2994_9: Ye hi vedikāya nirantaraṃ ṭhitā susaṇṭhitaghaṭakādiavayavavisesavanto thambhakasamudāyā,
atk-s0506a:2994_10: tesaṃ vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ “sujātagumbā”ti. Naravīraniṭṭhitāti sippācariyehi niṭṭhāpitasadisā.
atk-s0506a:2994_11: Sippācariyā hi attano sarīrakhedaṃ acintetvā vīriyabalena sippassa suṭṭhu vicāraṇato
atk-s0506a:2994_12: naresu vīriyavantoti idha “naravīrā”ti vuttā. Naravīrāti vā devaputtassa ālapanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2994_13: Niṭṭhitāti pariyositā paripuṇṇasobhātisayā. “Naravīranimmitā”ti vā pāṭho, naresu
atk-s0506a:2994_14: dhitisampannehi nimmitasadisāti attho. Evaṃvidhakubbaratāya ayaṃ tava ratho virocati.
atk-s0506a:2994_15: Kiṃ viya? Pannaraseva cando, sukkapakkhe pannarasiyaṃ paripuṇṇakāle candimā viya.
atk-s0506a:2995_1: pāṭho, gavacchitoti attho. Bahūhīti anekehi. Nānāratanehīti padumarāgaphussarāgādinānāvidharatanehi.
atk-s0506a:2995_2: Sunandighosoti suṭṭhu nanditabbaghoso, savanīyamadhuraninnādoti attho. Sunandighosoti
atk-s0506a:2995_3: vā suṭṭhu katanandighoso, naccanādīnaṃ dassanādīsu pavattitasādhukārasaddādivasena
atk-s0506a:2995_4: katapamodaninnādoti attho, “kālena kālaṃ āsīvādanavasena suṭṭhu payuttanandighoso”ti
atk-s0506a:2995_5: ca vadanti. Subhassaroti suṭṭhu ativiya obhāsanasabhāvo, tattha vā pavattamānānaṃ
atk-s0506a:2995_6: devatānaṃ sobhanena gītavāditassarena subhassaro. Cāmarahatthabāhubhīti cāmarahatthayuttabāhūhi
atk-s0506a:2995_7: ito cito ca bījayamāna cāmarakalāpehi devatānaṃ bhujehi, tathābhūtāhi devatāhi vā virocati.
atk-s0506a:2996_0: 1018. Nābhyoti rathacakkānaṃ nābhiyo. Manasābhinimmitāti “ime īdisā hontū”ti cittena
atk-s0506a:2996_1: nimmitasadisā. Rathassa pādantaramajjhabhūsitāti rathassa pādānaṃ rathacakkānaṃ antena
atk-s0506a:2996_2: neminā nānāratanasamujjalena arānaṃ vemajjhena ca maṇḍitā. Satarājicittitāti anekavaṇṇāhi
atk-s0506a:2996_3: anekasatāhi rājīhi lekhāhi cittitā vicittabhāvaṃ gatā. Sateratā vijjurivāti sateratasaṅkhātavijjulatā
atk-s0506a:2997_1: paṭhanti, soyeva attho, gāthāsukhatthaṃ pana dīghakaraṇaṃ. Puthū ca nemī cāti puthulanemi
atk-s0506a:2997_2: ca, eko ca-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Sahassaraṃsikoti anekasahassaraṃsiko. “Sahassaraṃsiyo”tipi
atk-s0506a:2997_3: pāḷi. Apare pana “natā raṃsiyo”ti ca paṭhanti, tattha natāti ajiyadhanudaṇḍako viya
atk-s0506a:2997_4: oṇatā nemippadesā. Sahassaraṃsiyoti sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ viya vipphurantakiraṇajālā. Tesanti
atk-s0506a:2998_0: 1020. Sirasminti sīse, rathassa sīseti attho. Siro vā asmiṃ rathe. Cittanti vicittaṃ.
atk-s0506a:2998_2: Ruciraṃ pabhassaranti iminā tassa candamaṇḍalasadisataṃyeva vibhāveti, sadā visuddhanti
atk-s0506a:2998_3: iminā panassa candamaṇḍalatopi visesaṃ dasseti. Suvaṇṇarājīhīti antarantarā vaṭṭākārena
atk-s0506a:2998_4: saṇṭhitāhi suvaṇṇalekhāhi. Saṅgatanti sahitaṃ. Veḷuriyarājīvāti antarantarā suvaṇṇarājīhi
atk-s0506a:2998_5: khacitamaṇimaṇḍalattā veḷuriyarājīhi viya sobhati. “Veḷuriyarājīhī”ti ca paṭhanti.
atk-s0506a:2999_0: 1021. Vāḷīti vāḷavanto sampannavāḷadhino, asse sandhāya vadati. “Vājī”ti vā pāṭho.
atk-s0506a:2999_2: ceva tadanurūpapariṇāhā ca, ārohapariṇāhasampannāti attho. Sujavāti sundarajavā javavanto
atk-s0506a:2999_3: mahājavā, sobhanagatikāti attho. Brahūpamāti brahā viya paminitabbā, attano pamāṇato
atk-s0506a:2999_4: adhikā viya paññāyantāti attho. Brahāti vuḍḍhā pavaḍḍhasabbaṅgapaccaṅgā. Mahantāti

atk-s0506a:2999_6: sīghavegā. Mano tavaññāyāti tava cittaṃ ñatvā. Tathevāti cittānurūpameva. Siṃsareti
atk-s0506a:3000_0: 1022. Imeti yathāvuttaasse sandhāyāha. Sabbeti sahassamattāpi. Sahitāti samānajavatāya
atk-s0506a:3000_1: samānagamanatāya ca gatiyaṃ sahitā, aññamaññaṃ anūnādhikagamanāti attho. Catūhi pādehi

atk-s0506a:3001_0: 1023. Dhunantīti cāmarabhāraṃ kesarabhāraṃ vāladhiñca vidhunanti. Vaggantīti kadāci
atk-s0506a:3001_1: pade padaṃ nikkhipantā vagganena gamanena gacchanti. Patantīti kadāci pavattanti,

atk-s0506a:3001_3: sukate suṭṭhu nimmite khuddakaghaṇṭādiassālaṅkāre abhiuddhunantā adhikaṃ uddhunantā.
atk-s0506a:3002_0: 1024. Rathassa ghosoti yathāvutto rathanigghoso. Apiḷandhanāna cāti a-kāro nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3002_1: Piḷandhanānaṃ ābharaṇānaṃ. Apiḷandhananti ca ābharaṇapariyāyoti vā vadanti, rathassānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3002_2: ābharaṇānañcaghosoti attho. Khurassanādoti turaṅgānaṃ khuranipātasaddo. Kiñcāpi assā

atk-s0506a:3010_0: 1033. Uyyānabhūmyāti uyyānabhūmiyaṃ. Duvaddhatoti dvīhi addhapassehi. “Dubhato ca
atk-s0506a:3010_1: ṭhitā”tipi paṭhanti, soyevattho. Rathāti rathe. Nāgāti nāge. Upayogatthe hi etaṃ

atk-s0506a:3012_0: 1035. Imānīti idaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ “imāni gītāni, imāni vāditāni, imāni naccāni
atk-s0506a:3012_1: cā”ti. Samenti ekatoti ekajjhaṃ samarasāni honti. Atha vā samenti ekatoti ekato ekajjhaṃ
atk-s0506a:3012_2: samāni samarasāni karonti, tantissaraṃ gītassarena, gītassarañca tantissarena saṃsandantiyo
atk-s0506a:3012_3: naccanena yathādhigate hassādirase aparihāpentiyo samenti samānentīti attho. Atthettha
atk-s0506a:3012_4: naccanti athettha accharā obhāsayantīti evaṃ gītādīni samarase karontiyo atha aññā
atk-s0506a:3012_5: ekaccā accharā ettha etasmiṃ tava rathe naccanti, atha aññā varitthiyo uttamitthiyo
atk-s0506a:3012_6: naccaṃ passantiyo attano sarīrobhāsena ceva vatthābharaṇaobhāsena ca ettha etasmiṃ
atk-s0506a:3012_7: padese ubhato dvīsu passesu dasapi disā kevalaṃ obhāsayanti vijjotayantīti attho.
atk-s0506a:3013: 1036. Soti so tvaṃ evaṃbhūto. Tūriyagaṇappabodhanoti dibbatūriyasamūhena katapītipabodhano. Mahīyamānoti pūjīyamāno. Vajirāvudhorivāti indo viya.
atk-s0506a:3014_0: 1037. Uposathaṃ kaṃ vā tuvaṃ upāvasīti aññehipi uposatho upavasīyati, tvaṃ kaṃ vā

atk-s0506a:3014_2: Vatanti vatasamādānaṃ. Abhirocayīti abhirocesi, ruccitvā pūresīti attho. “Abhirādhayī”tipi

atk-s0506a:3025: Disvāna taṃ khippamahuṃ sucīmano, tameva disvāna subhāsitaddhajaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3027: “Tamannapānaṃ athavāpi cīvaraṃ, suciṃ paṇītaṃ rasasā upetaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3028: Pupphābhikiṇṇamhi sake nivesane, patiṭṭhapesiṃ sa asaṅgamānaso.
atk-s0506a:3030: “Tamannapānena ca cīvarena ca, khajjena bhojjena ca sāyanena ca;
atk-s0506a:3031: Santappayitvā dvipadānamuttamaṃ, so saggaso devapure ramāmahaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3033: “Etenupāyena imaṃ niraggaḷaṃ, yaññaṃ yajitvā tividhaṃ visuddhaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3034: Pahāyahaṃ mānusakaṃ samussayaṃ, indūpamo devapure ramāmahaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3036: “Āyuñca vaṇṇañca sukhaṃ balañca, paṇītarūpaṃ atikaṅkhatā muni;
atk-s0506a:3039: “Nayimasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ vā pana, buddhena seṭṭho va samo va vijjati;
atk-s0506a:3041_0: 1041. Tattha jitindriyanti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ bodhimūleyeva aggamaggena jitattā
atk-s0506a:3041_1: nibbisevanabhāvassa katattā jitindriyaṃ. Abhiññeyyādīnaṃ abhiññeyyādibhāvato anavasesato
atk-s0506a:3041_3: vīriyassa catubbidhasammappadhānassa ca pāripūriyāti attho. Naruttamanti narānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3041_4: uttamaṃ dvipaduttamaṃ. Kassapanti bhagavantaṃ gottena vadati. Avāpurantaṃ amatassa
atk-s0506a:3041_5: dvāranti koṇāgamanassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānato pabhuti pihitaṃ nibbānamahānagarassa
atk-s0506a:3041_6: dvāraṃ ariyamaggaṃ vivarantaṃ. Devātidevanti sabbesampi devānaṃ atidevaṃ. Satapuññalakkhaṇanti
atk-s0506a:3042_0: 1042. Kuñjaranti kilesapaṭisattunimmaddanena kuñjarasadisaṃ, mahānāganti attho. Catunnaṃ
atk-s0506a:3042_1: oghānaṃ saṃsāramahoghassa taritattā oghatiṇṇaṃ. Suvaṇṇasiṅgīnadabimbasādisanti siṅgīsuvaṇṇajambunadasuvaṇṇarūpasadisaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3042_2: kañcanasannibhattacanti attho. Disvāna taṃ khippamahuṃ sucīmanoti taṃ kassapasammāsambuddhaṃ
atk-s0506a:3042_3: disvā khippaṃ tāvadeva “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”ti pasādavasena kilesamalāpagamanena
atk-s0506a:3042_4: sucimano visuddhamano ahosiṃ, tañca kho tameva disvāna taṃ disvā eva. Subhāsitaddhajanti dhammaddhajaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3043_0: 1043. Tamannapānanti tamhi bhagavati annañca pānañca. Athavāpi cīvaranti atha cīvarampi.
atk-s0506a:3043_1: Rasasā upetanti rasena upetaṃ sādurasaṃ, uḷāranti attho. Pupphābhikiṇṇamhīti ganthitehi

atk-s0506a:3045_2: muttacāgatāya ca niraggaḷaṃ, tīsupi kālesu tīhi dvārehi karaṇakārāpanānussaraṇavidhīhi

atk-s0506a:3045_5: khettavatthucittānaṃ uḷāratāya antarantarā anussaraṇena attano pākaṭaṃ āsannaṃ paccakkhaṃ
atk-s0506a:3046_0: 1046. Evaṃ devaputto attanā katakammaṃ therassa kathetvā idāni tādisāya sampattiyā

atk-s0506a:3046_2: “āyuñca vaṇṇañcā”tiādinā gāthādvayamāha. Tattha abhikaṅkhatāti icchantena. Munīti theraṃ ālapati.
atk-s0506a:3047_0: 1047. Nayimasmiṃ loketi devaputto attano paccakkhabhūtaṃ lokaṃ vadati. Parasminti
atk-s0506a:3047_1: tato aññasmiṃ. Etena sabbepi sadevake loke dasseti. Samo ca vijjatīti seṭṭho tāva
atk-s0506a:3047_2: tiṭṭhatu, samo eva na vijjatīti attho. Āhuneyyānaṃ paramāhutiṃ gatoti imasmiṃ loke
atk-s0506a:3047_3: yattakā āhuneyyā nāma, tesu sabbesu paramāhutiṃ paramaṃ āhuneyyabhāvaṃ gato. “Dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3047_4: paramaggataṃ gato”ti vā pāṭho, tattha paramaggatanti paramaṃ aggabhāvaṃ, aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvanti
atk-s0506a:3047_5: attho. Kesanti āha “puññatthikānaṃ vipulapphalesina”nti, puññena atthikānaṃ vipulaṃ

atk-s0506a:3047_7: Keci pana “āhuneyyānaṃ paramaggataṃ gato”ti paṭhanti, soyevattho.

atk-s0506a:3055_0: Yathā vanaṃ cittalataṃ pabhāsatīti agāriyavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā rājagahe
