atk-s0506a:3095_0: Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇanti phaladāyakavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā rājagahe viharati
atk-s0506a:3095_1: veḷuvane. Tena samayena rañño bimbisārassa akāle ambaphalāni paribhuñjituṃ icchā
atk-s0506a:3095_2: uppajji. So ārāmapālaṃ āha – “mayhaṃ kho, bhaṇe, ambaphalesu icchā uppannā, tasmā
atk-s0506a:3095_3: ambāni me ānetvā dehī”ti. “Deva, natthi ambesu ambaphalaṃ, apicāhaṃ tathā karomi,
atk-s0506a:3095_4: sace devo kiñci kālaṃ āgameti, yathā ambā na cirasseva phalaṃ gaṇhantī”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0506a:3095_5: bhaṇe, tathā karohī”ti. Ārāmapālo ārāmaṃ gantvā ambarukkhamūlesu paṃsuṃ apanetvā
atk-s0506a:3095_6: tādisaṃ paṃsuṃ ākiri, tādisañca udakaṃ āsiñci, yathā na cirasseva ambarukkhā sacchinnapattā
atk-s0506a:3095_7: ahesuṃ. Atha naṃ paṃsuṃ apanetvā phārusakakasaṭamissakaṃ pākatikaṃ paṃsuṃ ākiritvā
atk-s0506a:3095_8: sādhukaṃ udakaṃ adāsi. Tadā ambarukkhā na cireneva korakitā pallavitā kuṭamalakajātā
atk-s0506a:3095_9: hutvā pupphiṃsu, atha salāṭukajātā hutvā phalāni gaṇhiṃsu. Tatthekasmiṃ ambarukkhe
atk-s0506a:3095_10: paṭhamataraṃ cattāri phalāni manosilācuṇṇapiñjaravaṇṇāni sampannagandharasāni pariṇatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0506a:3096_0: So tāni gahetvā “rañño dassāmī”ti gacchanto antarāmagge āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3096_1: piṇḍāya caramānaṃ disvā cintesi “imāni ambāni aggaphalabhūtāni imassa ayyassa dassāmi,
atk-s0506a:3096_2: kāmaṃ maṃ rājā hanatu vā pabbājetu vā, rañño hi dinne diṭṭhadhamme pūjāmattaṃ appamattakaṃ
atk-s0506a:3096_3: phalaṃ, ayyassa dinne pana diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi aparimāṇaṃ phalaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3096_4: Evaṃ pana cintetvā tāni phalāni therassa datvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā rañño tamatthaṃ
atk-s0506a:3096_5: ārocesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā rājapurise āṇāpesi “vīmaṃsatha tāva, bhaṇe, yathāyaṃ āhā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3096_6: Thero pana tāni phalāni bhagavato upanāmesi. Bhagavā tesu ekaṃ sāriputtattherassa,
atk-s0506a:3096_7: ekaṃ mahāmoggallānattherassa, ekaṃ mahākassapattherassa datvā ekaṃ attanā paribhuñji.
atk-s0506a:3097_0: Rājā taṃ sutvā “dhīro vatāyaṃ puriso, yo attano jīvitampi pariccajitvā puññapasuto
atk-s0506a:3097_1: ahosi, attano parissamañca ṭhānagatameva akāsī”ti tuṭṭhacitto tassa ekaṃ gāmavaraṃ
atk-s0506a:3097_2: vatthālaṅkārādīni ca datvā “yaṃ tayā bhaṇe ambaphaladānena puññaṃ pasutaṃ, tato me
atk-s0506a:3097_3: pattiṃ dehī”ti āha. So “demi, deva, yathāsukhaṃ pattiṃ gaṇhāhī”ti avoca. Ārāmapālo

atk-s0506a:3296_4: ropeti, jalāsayesu mattikaṃ uddharitvā te puthulagambhīre karoti, titthe sampādeti,
atk-s0506a:3296_5: yathāvibhavaṃ dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ rakkhati. So aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu dvādasayojanike
atk-s0506a:3296_6: kanakavimāne nibbatti. Taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero upasaṅkamitvā imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi –
atk-s0506a:3299: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.
atk-s0506a:3301: “Tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ;
atk-s0506a:3302: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇacchannā.
atk-s0506a:3304: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo…pe…vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3309: “Ahaṃ manussesu manussabhūto, vivane pathe saṅkamanaṃ akāsiṃ;
atk-s0506a:3310: Ārāmarukkhāni ca ropayissaṃ, piyā ca me sīlavanto ahesuṃ;
atk-s0506a:3311: Annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ.
atk-s0506a:3313: “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe…vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3314: 1131. Tattha vivaneti araññe. Ārāmarukkhāni cā ārāmabhūte rukkhe, ārāmaṃ katvā tattha rukkhe ropesinti attho. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:3317_0: Sovaṇṇamaye pabbatasminti suvaṇṇavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā andhakavinde
atk-s0506a:3317_1: viharati. Tena samayena aññataro upāsako saddho pasanno vibhavasampanno tassa gāmassa
atk-s0506a:3317_2: avidūre aññatarasmiṃ muṇḍakapabbate sabbākārasampannaṃ bhagavato vasanānucchavikaṃ
atk-s0506a:3317_3: gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā tattha bhagavantaṃ vasāpento sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi, sayañca niccasīle
atk-s0506a:3317_4: patiṭṭhito suvisuddhasīlasaṃvaro hutvā kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti. Tassa
atk-s0506a:3317_7: Taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno devacārikaṃ caranto disvā imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi –
atk-s0506a:3340: “Dānassa te idaṃ phalaṃ, atho sīlassa vā pana;
atk-s0506a:3341: Atho añjalikammassa, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0506a:3346: Vihāraṃ satthu kāresiṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi.
atk-s0506a:3350: Tena mayhaṃ idaṃ laddhaṃ, vasaṃ vattemi nandane.
atk-s0506a:3354: 1134. Tattha sabbatopabhanti sabbabhāgehi pabhāsantaṃ pabhāmuñcanakaṃ. Kiṅkiṇijālakappitanti kappitakiṅkiṇikajālaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3355_0: 1135. Sabbe veḷuriyāmayāti sabbe thambhā veḷuriyamaṇimayā. Tattha pana ekamekāya
atk-s0506a:3355_1: aṃsiyāti aṭṭhaṃsesu thambhesu ekamekasmiṃ aṃsabhāge. Ratanā satta nimmitāti sattaratanakammanimmitā,
atk-s0506a:3356_1: veḷuriyena ca suvaṇṇena ca nimmitā, citrāti vā yojanā. Karaṇatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3356_2: Phalikā rūpiyassa cāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Masāragallamuttāhīti kabaramaṇīhi. Lohitaṅgamaṇīhi cāti rattamaṇīhi.
atk-s0506a:3357_0: 1137. Na tatthuddhaṃsatī rajoti maṇimayabhūmikattā na tasmiṃ vimāne rajo uggacchati.
atk-s0506a:3357_1: Gopānasīgaṇāti gopānasīsamūhā. Pītāti pītavaṇṇā, suvaṇṇamayā ceva phussarāgādimaṇimayā
atk-s0506a:3357_2: cāti attho. Kūṭaṃ dhārentīti sattaratanamayaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ dhārenti.
atk-s0506a:3358: 1138-9. Nānāratanagabbhehīti nānāratanamayehi ovarakehi. Vediyāti vedikā. Catassoti catūsu disāsu catasso. Tenāha “samantā caturo disā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3359: 1140. Mahappabhoti mahājutiko. Udayantoti uggacchanto. Bhāṇumāti ādicco.
atk-s0506a:3360_0: 1143. Sehi pāṇibhīti kāyasāraṃ puññaṃ pasavanto attano pāṇīhi taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ karonto
atk-s0506a:3360_1: vihāraṃ satthu kāresinti yojanā. Atha vā sehi pāṇibhīti tattha andhakavindasmiṃ gandhañca
atk-s0506a:3360_2: mālañca paccayañca vilepanañca pūjāvasena. Yathā kathaṃ? Vihārañca vippasannena cetasā
atk-s0506a:3360_3: satthuno adāsiṃ pūjesiṃ niyyādesiṃ cāti evamettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0506a:3361: 1144. Tenāti tena yathāvuttena puññakammena kāraṇabhūtena. Mayhanti mayā. Idanti idaṃ puññaphalaṃ, idaṃ vā dibbaṃ ādhipateyyaṃ. Tenāha “vasaṃ vattemī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3362_0: 1145. Nandaneti nandiyā dibbasamiddhiyā uppajjanaṭṭhāne imasmiṃ devaloke, tatthāpi
atk-s0506a:3362_1: visesato nandane vane ramme, evaṃ ramaṇīye imasmiṃ nandane vane ramāmīti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:3363_0: Evaṃ devatāya attano puññakamme āvikate thero saparivārassa tassa devaputtassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0506a:3363_1: desetvā bhagavato tamatthaṃ nivedesi. Bhagavā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya
atk-s0506a:3363_2: dhammaṃ desesi. Sā desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0506a:3366_0: Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇanti ambavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane.
atk-s0506a:3366_1: Tena samayena rājagahe aññataro duggatapuriso paresaṃ bhattavetanabhato hutvā ambavanaṃ
atk-s0506a:3366_2: rakkhati. So ekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ gimhasamaye sūriyātapasantatte uṇhavālikānippīḷite
atk-s0506a:3366_3: vipphandamānamarīcijālavitthate bhūmippadese tassa ambārāmassa avidūrena maggena
atk-s0506a:3366_4: sedāgatena gattena gacchantaṃ disvā sañjātagāravabahumāno upasaṅkamitvā evamāha “mahā
atk-s0506a:3366_5: ayaṃ, bhante, ghammapariḷāho, ativiya parissantarūpo viya dissati, sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0506a:3366_6: ayyo imaṃ ambārāmaṃ pavisitvā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā addhānaparissamaṃ paṭivinodetvā
atk-s0506a:3366_7: gacchatha anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti. Thero visesato tassa cittappasādaṃ paribrūhetukāmo
atk-s0506a:3366_8: taṃ ārāmaṃ pavisitvā aññatarassa ambarukkhassa mūle nisīdi.
atk-s0506a:3367_0: Puna so puriso āha “sace, bhante, nhāyitukāmattha, ahaṃ ito kūpato udakaṃ uddharitvā
atk-s0506a:3367_1: tumhe nhāpessāmi, pānīyañca dassāmī”ti. Theropi adhivāsesi tuṇhībhāvena. So kūpato
atk-s0506a:3367_2: udakaṃ uddharitvā parissāvetvā theraṃ nhāpesi, nhāpetvā ca hatthapāde dhovitvā nisinnassa
atk-s0506a:3367_3: pānīyaṃ upanesi. Thero pānīyaṃ pivitvā paṭippassaddhadaratho tassa purisassa udakadāne
atk-s0506a:3367_4: ceva nhāpane ca anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. Atha so puriso “ghammābhitattassa vata
atk-s0506a:3367_5: therassa ghammapariḷāhaṃ paṭippassambhesiṃ, bahuṃ vata mayā puññaṃ pasuta”nti uḷārapītisomanassaṃ
atk-s0506a:3367_6: paṭisaṃvedesi. So aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajji. Taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0506a:3370: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.
atk-s0506a:3372: “Tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ;
atk-s0506a:3373: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
atk-s0506a:3388: Sādhu taṃ bhante nhāpeyyaṃ, yaṃ mamassa sukhāvahaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3398: Iti so pītiyā kāyaṃ, sabbaṃ pharati attano.
atk-s0506a:3406_0: 1151. Tattha gimhānaṃ pacchime māseti āsāḷhimāse. Patapanteti ativiya dippante, sabbaso
atk-s0506a:3406_1: uṇhaṃ vissajjenteti attho. Divaṅkareti divākare, ayameva vā pāṭho. Asiñcatīti siñcati,
atk-s0506a:3406_2: -kāro nipātamattaṃ, siñcati ambarukkhamūlesu dhuvaṃ jalasekaṃ karotīti attho. “Asiñcathā”ti
atk-s0506a:3406_3: ca pāṭho, siñcitthāti attho. “Asiñcaha”nti ca paṭhanti, paresaṃ bhatako poso hutvā
atk-s0506a:3407_0: 1152. Tenāti yena disābhāgena so ambārāmo, tena agamā agañchi. Akilantova cetasāti
atk-s0506a:3407_1: cetodukkhassa maggeneva pahīnattā cetasā akilantopi samāno kilanturūpo kāyena tena
atk-s0506a:3408: 1153-4. Avocaṃ ahaṃ tadā ambasiñcako hutvāti yojanā. Ekacīvaroti nhāyitukāmoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:3409_0: 1156. Itīti evaṃ “ambo ca sitto, samaṇo ca nhāpito, mayā ca puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappakaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3409_1: ekeneva payogena tividhopi attho sādhito”ti iminākārena pavattāya pītiyā so puriso
atk-s0506a:3409_2: attano sabbaṃ kāyaṃ pharati, nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ karotīti yojanā. Atītatthe cetaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ, pharīti attho.
atk-s0506a:3410: 1157. Tadeva ettakaṃ kammanti taṃ ettakaṃ evaṃ pānīyadānamattakaṃ kammaṃ akāsiṃ, tāya tassaṃ jātiyaṃ aññaṃ nānussarāmīti adhippāyo. Tesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:3413_0: Disvāna devaṃ paṭipucchi bhikkhūti gopālavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā rājagahe
atk-s0506a:3413_1: viharati veḷuvane. Tena samayena rājagahavāsī aññataro gopālako pātarāsatthāya pilotikāya
atk-s0506a:3413_2: puṭabaddhaṃ kummāsaṃ gahetvā nagarato nikkhamitvā gāvīnaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ gocarabhūmiṃ
atk-s0506a:3413_3: sampāpuṇi. Taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno “ayaṃ idāneva kālaṃ karissati, mayhañca kummāsaṃ
atk-s0506a:3413_4: datvā tāvatiṃsesu uppajjissatī”ti ca ñatvā tassa samīpaṃ agamāsi. So velaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0506a:3413_5: therassa kummāsaṃ dātukāmo ahosi. Tena ca samayena gāviyo māsakkhettaṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0506a:3413_6: Atha so gopālo cintesi “kiṃ nu kho therassa kummāsaṃ dadeyyaṃ, udāhu gāviyo māsakkhettato
atk-s0506a:3413_7: nīhareyya”nti. Athassa etadahosi “māsasāmikā maṃ yaṃ icchanti, taṃ karontu, there
atk-s0506a:3413_8: pana gate kummāsadānantarāyo me siyā, handāhaṃ paṭhamaṃ ayyassa kummāsaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0506a:3413_9: taṃ therassa upanesi. Paṭiggahesi thero anukampaṃ upādāya.
atk-s0506a:3414_0: Atha naṃ gāviyo nivattetuṃ parissayaṃ anoloketvā vegena upadhāvantaṃ pādena phuṭṭho
atk-s0506a:3414_1: āsīviso ḍaṃsi. Theropi taṃ anukampamāno taṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ārabhi. Gopālakopi
atk-s0506a:3414_2: gāviyo nivattetvā āgato theraṃ kummāsaṃ paribhuñjantaṃ disvā pasannacitto uḷāraṃ
atk-s0506a:3414_3: pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi. Tāvadevassa sakalasarīraṃ visaṃ ajjhotthari.
atk-s0506a:3414_4: Muhuttameva vege muddhapatte kālamakāsi, kālakato ca tāvatiṃsesu dvādasayojanike
atk-s0506a:3414_5: kanakavimāne nibbatti. Taṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno disvā imāhi gāthāhi paṭipucchi –
atk-s0506a:3416: “Disvāna devaṃ paṭipucchi bhikkhu, ucce vimānamhi ciraṭṭhitike;
atk-s0506a:3417: Āmuttahatthābharaṇaṃ yasassiṃ, dibbe vimānamhi yathāpi candimā.
atk-s0506a:3420: Āmuttahatthābharaṇo yasassī, dibbe vimānamhi yathāpi candimā.
atk-s0506a:3422: “Dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ; Aṭṭhaṭṭhakā sikkhitā sādhurūpā;
atk-s0506a:3423: Dibbā ca kaññā tidasacarā uḷārā, naccanti gāyanti pamodayanti.
atk-s0506a:3430: “Ahaṃ manussesu manussabhūto, saṅgamma rakkhissaṃ paresaṃ dhenuyo;
atk-s0506a:3431: Tato ca āgā samaṇo mamantike, gāvo ca māse agamaṃsu khādituṃ.
atk-s0506a:3433: “Dvayajja kiccaṃ ubhayañca kāriyaṃ, iccevahaṃ bhante tadā vicintayiṃ;
atk-s0506a:3434: Tato ca saññaṃ paṭiladdha yoniso, ‘dadāmi bhante’ti khipiṃ anantakaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3436: “So māsakhettaṃ turito avāsariṃ, purā ayaṃ bhañjati yassidaṃ dhanaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3437: Tato ca kaṇho urago mahāviso, aḍaṃsi pāde turitassa me sato.
atk-s0506a:3439: “Svāhaṃ aṭṭomhi dukkhena pīḷito, bhikkhu ca taṃ sāmaṃ muñcitvānantakaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3440: Ahāsi kummāsaṃ mamānukampayā, tato cuto kālakatomhi devatā.
atk-s0506a:3442: “Tadeva kammaṃ kusalaṃ kataṃ mayā, sukhañca kammaṃ anubhomi attanā;
atk-s0506a:3443: Tayā hi bhante anukampito bhusaṃ, kataññutāya abhivādayāmi taṃ.
atk-s0506a:3445: “Sadevake loke samārake ca, añño muni natthi tayānukampako;
atk-s0506a:3446: Tayā hi bhante anukampito bhusaṃ, kataññutāya abhivādayāmi taṃ.
atk-s0506a:3448: “Imasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ vā pana, añño munī natthi tayānukampako;
atk-s0506a:3449: Tayā hi bhante anukampito bhusaṃ, kataññutāya abhivādayāmi ta”nti.
atk-s0506a:3450_0: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno attanā ca devatāya ca kathitaniyāmeneva taṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0506a:3450_1: Satthā tamatthaṃ paccanubhāsitvā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ
atk-s0506a:3451_0: 1159. Tattha devanti gopāladevaputtaṃ. Bhikkhūti āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0506a:3451_1: satthā vadati. So hi sabbaso bhinnakilesatāya bhikkhu. Vimānassa bahukālāvaṭṭhāyitāya
atk-s0506a:3451_2: kappaṭṭhitikatāya eva vā “ciraṭṭhitike”ti vuttaṃ, “ciraṭṭhitika”ntipi keci paṭhanti.
atk-s0506a:3451_3: Tañhi “deva”nti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ. Sopi hi saṭṭhisatasahassādhikā tisso vassakoṭiyo
atk-s0506a:3451_4: tattha avaṭṭhānato “ciraṭṭhitike”ti vattabbataṃ labhati. Yathāpi candimāti yathā
atk-s0506a:3451_5: candimā devaputto kantasītalamanoharakiraṇajālasamujjale attano dibbe vimānamhi virocati,
atk-s0506a:3452: 1160. Alaṅkatotiādi tassa devaputtassa therena pucchitākāradassanaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
atk-s0506a:3453: 1164. Saṅgammāti saṅgametvā, saṅgammāti vā saṅgahetvā. Hetvatthopi hi idha antonīto, bahū ekato hutvāti attho. Āgāti āgañchi. Māseti māsasassāni.
atk-s0506a:3454_0: 1165. Dvayajjāti dvayaṃ ajja etarahi kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ubhayañca kāriyanti vuttassevatthassa
atk-s0506a:3454_1: pariyāyavacanaṃ. Saññanti dhammasaññaṃ. Tenāha “yoniso”ti paṭiladdhāti paṭilabhitvā.
atk-s0506a:3454_2: Khipinti paniggāhāpanavasena hatthe khipiṃ. Anantakanti nantakaṃ kummāsaṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0506a:3454_3: bandhitvā ṭhapitaṃ pilotikaṃ. A-kāro cettha nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3455_0: 1166. Soti so ahaṃ. Turitoti turito sambhamanto. Avāsarinti upagacchi, pāvisiṃ vā.
atk-s0506a:3455_1: Purā ayaṃ bhañjati yassidaṃ dhananti yassa khettasāmikassa idaṃ māsasassaṃ dhanaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3455_2: taṃ ayaṃ gogaṇo bhañjati purā tassa bhañjanato, āmaddanato puretaramevāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3455_3: Tatoti tattha. Turitassa me satoti sambhamantassa me samānassa, sahasā gamanena magge
atk-s0506a:3456_0: 1167. Aṭṭomhi dukkhena pīḷitoti tena āsīvisaḍaṃsanena aṭṭo aṭṭito upadduto maraṇadukkhena
atk-s0506a:3456_1: bādhito bhavāmi. Ahāsīti ajjhohari, paribhuñjīti attho. Tato cuto kālakatomhi devatāti
atk-s0506a:3456_2: tato manussattabhāvato cuto maraṇakālappattiyā, tattha vā āyusaṅkhārassa khepanasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0506a:3456_3: kālassa katattā kālakato, tadanantarameva ca amhi devatā devattabhāvappattiyā devatā homīti attho.
atk-s0506a:3457: 1169. Tayāti tayā sadiso añño muni moneyyaguṇayutto isi natthi. Tayāti vā nissakke idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:3460_0: Puṇṇamāse yathā candoti kaṇḍakavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati
atk-s0506a:3460_1: jetavane. Tena ca samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva devacārikaṃ
atk-s0506a:3460_2: caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gato. Tasmiṃ khaṇe kaṇḍako devaputto sakabhavanato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0506a:3460_3: dibbayānaṃ abhiruhitvā mahantena parivārena mahatiyā deviddhiyā uyyānaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0506a:3460_4: āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ disvā sañjātagāravabahumāno sahasā yānato oruyha theraṃ
atk-s0506a:3460_5: upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ thero –
atk-s0506a:3472: Kūṭāgārā subhā rammā, pāsādo te sumāpito.
atk-s0506a:3492: “Dibbā te vividhā rūpā, dibbā saddā atho rasā;
atk-s0506a:3493: Gandhā ca te adhippetā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā.
atk-s0506a:3498: “Dānassa te idaṃ phalaṃ, atho sīlassa vā pana;
atk-s0506a:3499: Atho añjalikammassa, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3503: Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ”.
atk-s0506a:3509: So maṃ mudūhi pāṇīhi, jālitambanakhehi ca.
atk-s0506a:3514: “Taṃ me giraṃ suṇantassa, hāso me vipulo ahu;
atk-s0506a:3521: Mamaṃ channañca ohāya, anapekkho so apakkami.
atk-s0506a:3527: Alatthaṃ garukābādhaṃ, khippaṃ me maraṇaṃ ahu.
atk-s0506a:3532: “Yañca me ahuvā hāso, saddaṃ sutvāna bodhiyā;
atk-s0506a:3535: “Sace hi bhante gaccheyyāsi, satthu buddhassa santike;
atk-s0506a:3536: Mamāpi naṃ vacanena, sirasā vajjāsi vandanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3540_0: Sopi attanā katakammaṃ kathesi. Ayañhi anantare attabhāve amhākaṃ bodhisattena sahajāto
atk-s0506a:3540_1: kaṇḍako assarājā ahosi. So abhinikkhamanasamaye abhiruḷho teneva rattāvasesena tīṇi
atk-s0506a:3540_2: rajjāni mahāpurisaṃ atikkamāpetvā anomānadītīraṃ sampāpesi. Atha so mahāsattena sūriye
atk-s0506a:3540_3: uggate ghaṭikāramahābrahmunā upanītāni pattacīvarāni gahetvā pabbajitvā channena
atk-s0506a:3540_4: saddhiṃ kapilavatthuṃ uddissa vissajjito. Sinehabhārikena hadayena mahāpurisassa
atk-s0506a:3540_5: pāde attano jivhāya lehitvā pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā yāva dassanapathā olokento
atk-s0506a:3540_6: dassanūpacāraṃ pana atikkante lokanāthe “evaṃvidhaṃ nāma lokagganāyakaṃ mahāpurisaṃ
atk-s0506a:3540_7: ahaṃ vahiṃ, saphalaṃ vata me sarīraṃ ahosī”ti pasannamānaso hutvā puna cirakālaṃ
atk-s0506a:3540_8: saṅgatassa pemassa vasena viyogadukkhaṃ asahanto bhāviniyā dibbasampattiyā vasena
atk-s0506a:3540_9: dhammatāya codiyamāno kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0506a:3541_0: 1171. Tattha puṇṇamāseti puṇṇamāsiyaṃ sukkapakkhe pannarasiyaṃ. Tārakādhipatīti tārakānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3541_1: adhipati. Sasīti sasalañchanavā. “Tārakādhipa dissatī”ti keci paṭhanti, tesaṃ tārakādhipāti
atk-s0506a:3541_2: avibhattikaniddeso, tārakānaṃ adhipo hutvā dissati anupariyāti cāti yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0506a:3542_0: 1172. Dibbaṃ devapuramhi cāti devapurasmimpi dibbaṃ. Yathā manussānaṃ ṭhānato devapuraṃ
atk-s0506a:3542_1: uttamaṃ, evaṃ devapurato cāpi idaṃ tava vimānaṃ uttamanti dasseti. Tenāha “atirocati
atk-s0506a:3542_2: vaṇṇena, udayantova raṃsimā”ti, uggacchanto sūriyo viyāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3543: 1173. Veḷūriyasuvaṇṇassāti veḷuriyena suvaṇṇena ca idaṃ byamhaṃ nimmitanti vacanasesena yojanā. Phalikāti phalikamaṇinā.
atk-s0506a:3545: 1177-8. Tassāti tassā pokkharaṇiyā. Vanagumbāti uyyāne supupphagacche sandhāya vadati. Devarājaṃvāti sakkaṃ viya. Upatiṭṭhantīti upaṭṭhānaṃ karonti.
atk-s0506a:3546: 1179. Sabbābharaṇasañchannāti sabbehi itthālaṅkārehi paṭicchāditā, sabbaso vibhūsitasarīrāti attho. Vasavattīvāti vasavattidevarājā viya.
atk-s0506a:3547_0: 1180. Bherisaṅkhamudiṅgāhīti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, bherīhi ca saṅkhehi ca mudiṅgehi
atk-s0506a:3547_1: cāti yojanā. Ratisampannoti dibbāya ratiyā samaṅgībhūto. Naccagīte suvāditeti nacce
atk-s0506a:3547_2: ca gīte ca sundare vādite ca, naccane ca gāyane ca sundare vādite ca hetubhūte. Nimittatthe
atk-s0506a:3547_3: hi etaṃ bhummaṃ, pavattiteti vā vacanaseso.
atk-s0506a:3548_0: 1181. Dibbā te vividhā rūpāti devalokapariyāpannā nānappakārā cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā
atk-s0506a:3548_1: tuyhaṃ adhippetā yathādhippetā manoramā vijjantīti kiriyāpadaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3549: 1185. Kaṇḍako sahajo ahanti ettha ahanti nipātamattaṃ. “Ahū”ti keci paṭṭhanti, kaṇḍako nāma assarājā mahāsattena saha ekasmiṃyeva divase jātattā sahajo ahosinti attho.
atk-s0506a:3550_0: 1186. Aḍḍharattāyanti aḍḍharattiyaṃ, majjhimayāmasamayeti attho. Bodhāya mabhinikkhamīti
atk-s0506a:3550_1: ma-kāro padasandhikaro, abhisambodhiatthaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamīti attho. Mudūhi
atk-s0506a:3550_2: pāṇīhīti muduhatthataṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ vadati. Jālitambanakhehīti jālavantehi
atk-s0506a:3550_3: abhilohitanakhehi. Tena jālahatthataṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ tambanakhataṃ anubyañjanañca dasseti.
atk-s0506a:3551_0: 1187. Satthi nāma jaṅghā, idha pana satthino āsannaṭṭhānabhūto ūruppadeso “satthī”ti
atk-s0506a:3551_1: vutto. Ākoṭayitvānāti appoṭhetvā. “Vaha sammā”ti cabravīti “samma kaṇḍaka, ajjekarattiṃ
atk-s0506a:3551_2: maṃ vaha, mayhaṃ opavuyhaṃ hohī”ti ca kathesi. Vahane pana payojanaṃ tadā mahāsattena
atk-s0506a:3551_3: dassitaṃ vadanto “ahaṃ lokaṃ tārayissaṃ, patto sambodhimuttama”nti āha. Tena “ahaṃ
atk-s0506a:3551_4: uttamaṃ anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patto adhigato hutvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ saṃsāramahoghato
atk-s0506a:3551_5: tārayissāmi, tasmā nayidaṃ gamanaṃ yaṃkiñcīti cinteyyāsī”ti gamane payojanassa anuttarabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0506a:3552_0: 1188-9. Hāsoti tuṭṭhi. Vipuloti mahāuḷāro. Abhisīsinti āsisiṃ icchiṃ sampaṭicchiṃ.
atk-s0506a:3552_1: Abhirūḷhañca maṃ ñatvā, sakyaputtaṃ mahāyasanti patthaṭavipulayasaṃ sakyarājaputtaṃ
atk-s0506a:3552_2: mahāsattaṃ maṃ abhiruyha nisinnaṃ jānitvā. Vahissanti nesiṃ.
atk-s0506a:3553_0: 1190-91. Paresanti pararājūnaṃ. Vijitanti desaṃ pararajjaṃ. Ohāyāti vissajjitvā.
atk-s0506a:3553_1: Apakkamīti apakkamituṃ ārabhi. “Paribbajī”ti ca paṭhanti. Parilehisanti parito lehiṃ.
atk-s0506a:3554_0: 1192-3. Garukābādhanti garukaṃ bāḷhaṃ ābādhaṃ, maraṇantikaṃ dukkhanti attho. Tenāha
atk-s0506a:3554_1: “khippaṃ me maraṇaṃ ahū”ti. So hi anekāsu jātīsu mahāsattena daḷhabhattiko hutvā
atk-s0506a:3554_2: āgato, tasmā viyogadukkhaṃ sahituṃ nāsakkhi, “sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ nikkhanto”ti
atk-s0506a:3554_3: pana sutvā nirāmisaṃ uḷāraṃ pītisomanassañca uppajji, tena maraṇānantaraṃ tāvatiṃsesu
atk-s0506a:3554_4: nibbatti, uḷārā cassa dibbasampattiyo pāturahesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “tasseva ānubhāvenā”ti,
atk-s0506a:3554_5: ṭhānagatassa pasādamayapuññassa balena. Devo devapuramhivāti tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko devarājā viya.
atk-s0506a:3555_0: 1194. Yañca me ahuvā hāso, saddaṃ sutvāna bodhiyāti “patto sambodhimuttama”nti paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0506a:3555_1: bodhisaddaṃ sutvā tadā mayhaṃ hāso ahu, yaṃ hāsassa bhavanaṃ sussanaṃ, teneva kusalamūlena
atk-s0506a:3556_0: 1195. Evaṃ devaputto yathādhigatāya anāgatāya bhavasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtaṃ attano
atk-s0506a:3556_1: kusalakammaṃ kathento idāni attanā bhagavato santikaṃ gantukāmopi puretaraṃ therena
atk-s0506a:3556_2: satthu vandanaṃ pesento “sace”ti gāthamāha. Tattha sace gaccheyyāsīti yadi gamissasi.
atk-s0506a:3556_3: “Sace gacchasī”ti keci paṭhanti, so evattho. Mamāpi naṃ vacanenāti na kevalaṃ tava
atk-s0506a:3556_4: sabhāveneva, atha kho mamāpi vacanena bhagavantaṃ. Vajjāsīti vadeyyāsi, mamāpi sirasā vandananti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:3557_0: 1196. Yadipi dāni vandanañca pesemi, pesetvā eva pana na tiṭṭhāmīti dassento āha
atk-s0506a:3557_1: “ahampi daṭṭhuṃ gacchissaṃ, jinaṃ appaṭipuggala”nti. Gamane pana daḷhataraṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0506a:3557_2: dassetuṃ “dullabhaṃ dassanaṃ hoti, lokanāthāna tādina”nti āha.
atk-s0506a:3565_0: 1197. Tattha sutvā giraṃ cakkhumatoti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumato sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0506a:3565_1: vacanaṃ sutvā. Dhammacakkhunti sotāpattimaggaṃ. Visodhayīti adhigacchi. Adhigamoyeva
atk-s0506a:3566_0: 1198. Visodhetvā diṭṭhigatanti diṭṭhigataṃ samugghātetvā. Vicikicchaṃ vatāni cāti
atk-s0506a:3566_2: ca visodhayīti yojanā. Tattha hi saha pariyāyehi tathā pavattā parāmāsā “vatānī”ti
atk-s0506a:3569_0: Anekavaṇṇaṃ darasokanāsananti anekavaṇṇavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0506a:3569_1: viharati jetavane. Tena samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayena devacārikaṃ
atk-s0506a:3569_2: caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ anekavaṇṇo devaputto disvā sañjātagāravabahumāno
atk-s0506a:3574: “Samassamo natthi kuto panuttaro, yasena puññena ca iddhiyā ca;
atk-s0506a:3575: Sabbe ca devā tidasagaṇā samecca, taṃ taṃ namassanti sasiṃva devā;
atk-s0506a:3576: Imā ca te accharāyo samantato, naccanti gāyanti pamodayanti.
atk-s0506a:3586: “Ahaṃ bhadante ahuvāsi pubbe, sumedhanāmassa jinassa sāvako;
atk-s0506a:3587: Puthujjano ananubodhohamasmi, so satta vassāni paribbajissahaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3590: Ratanuccayaṃ hemajālena channaṃ, vanditvā thūpasmiṃ manaṃ pasādayiṃ.
atk-s0506a:3592: “Na māsi dānaṃ na ca matthi dātuṃ, pare ca kho tattha samādapesiṃ;
atk-s0506a:3593: Pūjetha naṃ pūjanīyassa dhātuṃ, evaṃ kira saggamito gamissatha.
atk-s0506a:3598: Na tassa puññassa khayampi ajjhaga”nti. – kathesi;
atk-s0506a:3599_0: Ito kira tiṃsakappasahasse sumedho nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā sadevakaṃ
atk-s0506a:3599_1: lokaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā katabuddhakicco parinibbuto, manussehi ca bhagavato dhātuṃ
atk-s0506a:3599_2: gahetvā ratanacetiye kate aññataro puriso satthu sāsane pabbajitvā satta vassāni
atk-s0506a:3599_3: brahmacariyaṃ caritvā anavaṭṭhitacittatāya kukkuccako hutvā uppabbaji. Uppabbajito
atk-s0506a:3599_4: ca saṃvegabahulatāya dhammacchandavantatāya ca cetiyaṅgaṇe sammajjanaparibhaṇḍādīni
atk-s0506a:3599_5: karonto niccasīlauposathasīlāni rakkhanto dhammaṃ suṇanto aññe ca puññakiriyāya samādapento
atk-s0506a:3599_6: vicari. So āyupariyosāne kālakato tāvatiṃsesu nibbatti. So puññakammassa uḷārabhāvena
atk-s0506a:3599_7: mahesakkho mahānubhāvo sakkādīhi devatāhi sakkatapūjito hutvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0506a:3599_8: ṭhatvā tato cuto aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tasseva
atk-s0506a:3599_9: kammassa vipākāvasesena tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti, “anekavaṇṇo”ti naṃ devatā sañjāniṃsu.
atk-s0506a:3599_10: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “atha naṃ anekavaṇṇo devaputto…pe… na tassa puññassa khayampi
atk-s0506a:3600_1: vividhasaṇṭhānatāya ca nānāvidhavaṇṇaṃ. Darasokanāsananti sītalabhāvena darathapariḷāhānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3600_2: vinodanato manuññatāya dassanīyatāya ca sokassa anokāsato darasokanāsanaṃ. Anekacittanti
atk-s0506a:3601_0: 1200. Samassamoti samo eva hutvā samo, nibbariyāyena sadiso te tuyhaṃ natthi, kuto
atk-s0506a:3601_1: pana kena kāraṇena uttari adhiko ko nāma siyā. Kena pana samatā uttaritaratā cāti
atk-s0506a:3601_2: āha “yasena puññena ca iddhiyā cā”ti. Tattha yasenāti parivārena. Iddhiyāti ānubhāvena.
atk-s0506a:3601_3: Yasenāti vā issariyena, iddhiyāti deviddhiyā. Yasenāti vā vibhavasampattiyā, iddhiyāti
atk-s0506a:3601_4: yathicchi tassa kāmaguṇassa ijjhanena. Yasenāti vā kittighosena, iddhiyāti samiddhiyā.
atk-s0506a:3601_5: Puññenāti tattha tattha vuttāvasiṭṭhapuññaphalena, puññakammeneva vā.
atk-s0506a:3602_0: “Sabbe ca devā”ti sāmaññato gahitamatthaṃ “tidasagaṇā”ti iminā visesetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3602_1: Ekaccassa paccekaṃ nipaccakāraṃ karontāpi pamuditā na karonti, na evametassa. Etassa
atk-s0506a:3602_2: pana pamuditāpi karontiyevāti dassetuṃ “sameccā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ tanti taṃ tvaṃ. Sasiṃva
atk-s0506a:3602_3: devāti yathā nāma sukkapakkhapāṭipadiyaṃ dissamānaṃ sasiṃ candaṃ manussā devā ca
atk-s0506a:3602_4: ādarajātā namassanti, evaṃ taṃ sabbepi tidasagaṇā namassantīti attho.
atk-s0506a:3603_0: 1203. Bhadanteti theraṃ gāravabahumānena samudācarati. Ahuvāsinti ahosiṃ. Pubbeti
atk-s0506a:3603_1: purimajātiyaṃ. Sumedhanāmassa jinassa sāvakoti sumedhoti evaṃ pākaṭanāmassa sammāsambuddassa
atk-s0506a:3603_2: sāsane pabbajitabhāvena sāvako. Puthūjjanoti anariyo. Tatthāpi saccānaṃ anubodhamattassāpi
atk-s0506a:3603_3: abhāvena ananubodho. So satta vassāni paribbajissahanti so ahaṃ satta saṃvaccharāni
atk-s0506a:3604_1: channanti samantato upari ca kañcanajālena paṭicchāditaṃ. Vanditvāti pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0506a:3604_2: tattha tattha paṇāmaṃ katvā. Thūpasmiṃ manaṃ pasādayinti “sabbaññuguṇādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0506a:3604_3: vata dhātuyā ayaṃ thūpo”ti thūpasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādesiṃ.
atk-s0506a:3605_0: 1205. Na māsi dānanti me mayā kataṃ dānaṃ nāsi nāhosi. Kasmā pana? Na ca metthi dātunti
atk-s0506a:3605_1: me mama pariggahabhūtaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na atthi, na kiñci deyyavatthu vijjati, pare
atk-s0506a:3605_2: ca kho satte tattha dāne samādapesiṃ. “Paresañca tattha samādapesi”nti ca paṭhanti,
atk-s0506a:3605_3: tattha paresanti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pūjetha nantiādi samādapanākāradassanaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3605_4: taṃ dhātunti yojanā. Evaṃ kirāti kira-saddo anussavattho.
atk-s0506a:3606_0: 1206. Na tassa puññassa khayampi ajjhaganti tassa tadā sumedhaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa
atk-s0506a:3606_1: katassa puññakammassa parikkhayaṃ nādhigacchiṃ, tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesaṃ paccanubhomīti
atk-s0506a:3606_2: dasseti. Yaṃ panettha na vuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3609_0: Alaṅkato maṭṭhakuṇḍalīti maṭṭhakuṇḍalīvimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0506a:3609_1: viharati jetavane. Tena samayena sāvatthivāsī eko brāhmaṇo addho mahaddhano mahābhogo
atk-s0506a:3609_2: assaddho appasanno micchādiṭṭhiko kassaci kiñci na deti, adānato eva “adinnapubbako”ti
atk-s0506a:3609_3: paññāyittha. So micchādiṭṭhibhāvena ca luddhabhāvena ca tathāgataṃ vā tathāgatasāvakaṃ
atk-s0506a:3609_4: vā daṭṭhumpi na icchati. Maṭṭhakuṇḍalaṃ nāma attano puttañca sikkhāpesi “tāta, tayā
atk-s0506a:3609_5: samaṇo gotamo tassa sāvakā ca na upasaṅkamitabbā na daṭṭhabbā”ti. Sopi tathā akāsi.
atk-s0506a:3609_6: Athassa putto gilāno ahosi, brāhmaṇo dhanakkhayabhayena bhesajjaṃ na kāresi, roge
atk-s0506a:3609_7: pana vaḍḍhiteva vejje pakkositvā dassesi. Vejjā tassa sarīraṃ oloketvā “atekiccho”ti
atk-s0506a:3609_8: taṃ ñatvā apakkamiṃsu. Brāhmaṇo “putte abbhantare mate nīharaṇaṃ dukkha”nti puttaṃ
atk-s0506a:3610_0: Bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento addasa
atk-s0506a:3610_2: kammaṃ katokāsaṃ. “Sace panāhaṃ tattha gamissāmi, so mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā devaloke
atk-s0506a:3610_3: nibbattitvā pitaraṃ āḷāhane rodamānaṃ upagantvā saṃvejessati, evaṃ so ca tassa pitā
atk-s0506a:3610_4: ca mama santikaṃ āgamissati, mahājanakāyo sannipatissati tattha mayā dhamme desite
atk-s0506a:3610_5: mahādhammābhisamayo bhavissatī”ti evaṃ pana ñatvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0506a:3610_6: mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho maṭṭhakuṇḍalīmāṇavassa
atk-s0506a:3610_7: pitu gehasamīpe ṭhatvā chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjesi. Tā disvā māṇavo “kimeta”nti
atk-s0506a:3610_8: ito cito ca vilokento addasa bhagavantaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ dvattiṃsāya mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
atk-s0506a:3610_9: asītiyā anubyañjanehi byāmappabhāya ketumālāya ca vijjotamānaṃ anupamāya buddhasiriyā
atk-s0506a:3610_10: acinteyyena buddhānubhāvena virocamānaṃ. Disvā tassa etadahosi “buddho nu kho bhagavā
atk-s0506a:3610_11: idhānuppatto, yassāyaṃ rūpasampadā attano tejasā sūriyampi abhibhavati, kantabhāvena
atk-s0506a:3610_12: candimaṃ, upasantabhāvena sabbepi samaṇabrāhmaṇe, upasamena nāma ettheva bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3610_13: ayameva ca maññe imasmiṃ loke aggapuggalo, mameva ca anukampāya idhānuppatto”ti buddhārammaṇāya
atk-s0506a:3610_14: pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭasarīro anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento pasannacitto
atk-s0506a:3610_15: añjaliṃ paggayha nipajji. Taṃ disvā bhagavā “alaṃ imassa ettakena saggūpapattiyā”ti pakkāmi.
atk-s0506a:3611_0: Sopi taṃ pītisomanassaṃ avijahantova kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu dvādasayojanike vimāne
atk-s0506a:3611_1: nibbatti. Pitā panassa sarīrasakkāraṃ karitvā dutiyadivase paccūsavelāyaṃ āḷāhanaṃ
atk-s0506a:3611_2: gantvā “hā hā maṭṭhakuṇḍali, hā hā maṭṭhakuṇḍalī”ti paridevamāno āḷāhanaṃ anuparikkamanto
atk-s0506a:3611_3: rodati. Devaputto attano vibhavasampattiṃ oloketvā “kuto nu kho ahaṃ idhāgato kiñca
atk-s0506a:3611_4: kammaṃ katvā”ti upadhārento attano purimattabhāvaṃ ñatvā tattha ca maraṇakāle bhagavati
atk-s0506a:3611_5: pavattitaṃ cittappasādaṃ manoharaṃ añjalikaraṇamattaṃ disvā “aho mahānubhāvā buddhā
atk-s0506a:3611_7: kho kiṃ karotī”ti upadhārento āḷāhane rodamānaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ pubbe bhesajjamattampi
atk-s0506a:3611_8: akatvā idāni niratthakaṃ āḷāhane rodati, handa naṃ saṃvejetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0506a:3611_9: devalokato āgantvā maṭṭhakuṇḍalīrūpena rodamāno “hā hā canda, hā hā sūriyā”ti bāhā
atk-s0506a:3611_10: paggayha kandanto pitu samīpe aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo “ayaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍalī āgato”ti
atk-s0506a:3614: Bāhā paggayha kandasi, vanamajjhe kiṃ dukkhito tuva”nti.
atk-s0506a:3615_0: Tattha alaṅkatoti vibhūsito. Maṭṭhakuṇḍalīti sarīrappadesassa aghaṃsanatthaṃ mālālatādayo
atk-s0506a:3615_1: adassetvā maṭṭhākāreneva katakuṇḍalo. Atha vā maṭṭhakuṇḍalīti visuddhakuṇḍalo, tāpetvā
atk-s0506a:3615_2: jātihiṅgulikāya majjitvā dhovitvā sūkaralomena majjitakuṇḍaloti attho. Māladhārīti
atk-s0506a:3615_3: mālaṃ dhārento, piḷandhitamāloti attho. Haricandanussadoti rattacandanena sabbaso
atk-s0506a:3615_4: anulittagatto. Kinti pucchāvacanaṃ. Dukkhitoti dukkhappatto. Kiṃdukkhitoti vā ekameva
atk-s0506a:3619: Tassa cakkayugaṃ na vindāmi, tena dukkhena jahāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0506a:3623: Ācikkha me bhaddamāṇava, cakkayugaṃ paṭipādayāmi te”ti.
atk-s0506a:3624_0: Taṃ sutvā māṇavo “ayaṃ puttassa bhesajjaṃ akatvā puttapatirūpakaṃ maṃ disvā rodanto
atk-s0506a:3624_1: ‘suvaṇṇādimayaṃ rathacakkaṃ karomī’ti vadati, hotu niggaṇhissāmi na”nti cintetvā
atk-s0506a:3624_2: “kīva mahantaṃ me cakkayugaṃ karissasī”ti vatvā “yāva mahantaṃ ākaṅkhasī”ti vutte
atk-s0506a:3624_3: “candimasūriyehi me attho, te me dehī”ti yācanto –
atk-s0506a:3626: “So māṇavo tassa pāvadi, candasūriyā ubhayettha dissare;
atk-s0506a:3627: Sovaṇṇamayo ratho mama, tena cakkayugena sobhatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3630: “Bālo kho tvaṃ asi māṇava, yo tvaṃ patthayase apatthiyaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3631: Maññāmi tuvaṃ marissasi, na hi tvaṃ lacchasi candasūriye”ti.
atk-s0506a:3632: Atha naṃ māṇavo “kiṃ pana paññāyamānassatthāya rodanto bālo hoti, udāhu apaññāyamānassā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0506a:3635: Peto kālakato na dissati, ko nidha kandataṃ bālyataro”ti.
atk-s0506a:3636: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo “yuttaṃ esa vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā –
atk-s0506a:3638: “Saccaṃ kho vadesi māṇava, ahameva kandataṃ bālyataro;
atk-s0506a:3639: Candaṃ viya dārako rudaṃ, petaṃ kālakatābhipatthayi”nti. –
atk-s0506a:3640: Vatvā tassa kathāya nissoko hutvā māṇavassa thutiṃ karonto imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0506a:3643: Vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ.
atk-s0506a:3649: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇavā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3650_0: 1208-10. Tattha rathapañjaroti rathūpatthaṃ. Na vindāmīti na labhāmi. Bhaddamāṇavāti
atk-s0506a:3650_1: ālapanaṃ. Paṭipādayāmīti sampādetvā dadāmi, mā cakkayugābhāvena jīvitaṃ jahīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:3650_2: Ubhayettha dissareti ubhopi ettha candasūriyā ākāse dissanti. Ya-kāro padasandhikaro,
atk-s0506a:3651_0: 1212. Gamanāgamananti divase divase ogamanuggamanavasena candasūriyānaṃ gamanaṃ āgamanañca
atk-s0506a:3651_1: dissati. “Gamanogamana”ntipi pāḷi, uggamanaṃ ogamanañcāti attho. Vaṇṇadhātūti sītibhāvavisiṭṭhā
atk-s0506a:3651_2: kantabhāvabhāsurā, uṇhabhāvavisiṭṭhā tikkhabhāvabhāsurā ca vaṇṇanibhā. Ubhayatthāti
atk-s0506a:3651_3: cande sūriye cāti dvīsupi vaṇṇadhātu dissatīti yojetabbaṃ. Vīthiyāti pavattanavīthiyaṃ
atk-s0506a:3651_4: ākāse, nāgavīthiyādivīthiyaṃ vā. “Ubhayetthā”tipi pāṭho, ubhaye etthāti padavisandhi.
atk-s0506a:3652_0: 1213. Imaṃ pana kathaṃ sutvā “alabbhanīyavatthuṃ vatāhaṃ patthetvā kevalaṃ sokagginā
atk-s0506a:3652_1: ḍayhāmi, kiṃ me niratthakena anayabyasanenā”ti paṭisaṅkhāne aṭṭhāsi. Atha devaputto
atk-s0506a:3652_2: maṭṭhakuṇḍalīrūpaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā attano dibbarūpeneva aṭṭhāsi. Brāhmaṇo pana taṃ
atk-s0506a:3652_3: anoloketvā māṇavavohāreneva voharanto “saccaṃ kho vadesi māṇavā”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0506a:3652_4: candaṃ viya dārako rudanti candaṃ abhipatthayaṃ rudanto dārako viyāti attho. Kālakatābhipatthayinti
atk-s0506a:3653: 1214-5. Ādittanti sokagginā ādittaṃ. Nibbāpaye daranti nibbāpayi darathaṃ sokapariḷāhaṃ. Abbahīti uddhari.
atk-s0506a:3654: Atha brāhmaṇo sokaṃ vinodetvā attano upadesadāyakaṃ dibbarūpena ṭhitaṃ disvā “ko nāma tva”nti pucchanto –
atk-s0506a:3657: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti. –
atk-s0506a:3660: “Yañca kandasi yañca rodasi, puttaṃ āḷāhane sayaṃ dahitvā;
atk-s0506a:3661: Svāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvā kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3662: Attānaṃ kathesi. Tattha yañca kandasi yañca rodasīti yaṃ tava puttaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍaliṃ uddissa rodasi, assūni muñcasi.
atk-s0506a:3665: “Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā nāddasāma, dānaṃ dadantassa sake agāre;
atk-s0506a:3666: Uposathakammaṃ vā tādisaṃ, kena kammena gatosi devaloka”nti.
atk-s0506a:3671: Buddhaṃ vigatarajaṃ vitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ, addakkhiṃ sugataṃ anomapaññaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3674: Tāhaṃ kusalaṃ karitvāna kammaṃ, tidasānaṃ sahabyataṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0506a:3675_0: 1220-21. Tattha ābādhikoti ābādhasamaṅgī. Dukkhitoti teneva ābādhikabhāvena jātadukkho.
atk-s0506a:3675_1: Gilānoti gilāyamānoti attho. Āturarūpoti dukkhavedanābhitunnakāyo. Vigatarajanti
atk-s0506a:3675_2: vigatarāgādirajaṃ. Vitiṇṇakaṅkhanti sabbaso saṃsayānaṃ samucchinnattā tiṇṇavicikicchaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3675_3: Anomapaññanti paripuṇṇapaññaṃ, sabbaññunti attho. Akarinti akāsiṃ. Tāhanti taṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3676: Evaṃ tasmiṃ kathenteyeva brāhmaṇassa sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā paripūri. So taṃ pītiṃ pavedento –
atk-s0506a:3682_0: Tattha anabhiṇhappavattitāya accharaṃ paharituṃ yogganti acchariyaṃ, abhūtapubbatāya
atk-s0506a:3682_1: abbhutaṃ. Ubhayenapi vimhayāvahataṃyeva dassetvā “ahampi muditamano pasannacitto,
atk-s0506a:3683: Atha naṃ devaputto saraṇagamane sīlasamādāne ca niyojento –
atk-s0506a:3685: “Ajjeva buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ vajāhi, dhammañca saṅghañca pasannacitto;
atk-s0506a:3686: Tatheva sikkhāya padāni pañca, akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyassu.
atk-s0506a:3689: Amajjapo mā ca musā bhaṇāhi, sakena dārena ca hohi tuṭṭho”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3691_0: 1223. Tattha tathevāti yathā pasannacitto “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”ti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0506a:3691_1: vajesi, tatheva “svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti pasannacitto dhammañca
atk-s0506a:3691_2: saṅghañca saraṇaṃ vajāhi. Yathā vā pasannacitto ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ vajesi, tatheva
atk-s0506a:3691_3: “ayaṃ ekaṃsato diṭṭheva dhamme abhisamparāyañca hitasukhāvaho”ti pasannacitto sikkhāya
atk-s0506a:3691_4: adhisīlasikkhāya padāni koṭṭhāsabhūtāni adhicittaadhipaññāsikkhāya vā upāyabhūtāni
atk-s0506a:3691_5: pañcasīlāni avikopanato ca asaṃkilissanato ca akhaṇḍaphullāni samādiyassu, samādāya vattassūti attho.
atk-s0506a:3692: Evaṃ devaputtena saraṇagamane sīlasamādāne ca niyojito brāhmaṇo tassa vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanto –
atk-s0506a:3695: Karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mamā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3702: Amajjapo no ca musā bhaṇāmi, sakena dārena ca homi tuṭṭho”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3704_0: Tato devaputto “kataṃ mayā brāhmaṇassa kattabbayuttakaṃ, idāni sayameva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0506a:3704_1: upasaṅkamissatī”ti tattheva antaradhāyi. Brāhmaṇopi kho bhagavati sañjātapasādabahumāno
atk-s0506a:3704_2: devatāya ca codiyamāno “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamissāmī”ti vihārābhimukho gacchati.
atk-s0506a:3704_3: Taṃ disvā mahājano “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo ettakaṃ kālaṃ tathāgataṃ anupasaṅkamitvā ajja puttasokena
atk-s0506a:3704_4: upasaṅkamati, kīdisī nu kho dhammadesanā bhavissatī”ti taṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0506a:3705_0: Brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā evamāha “sakkā nu kho bho
atk-s0506a:3705_1: gotama kiñci dānaṃ adatvā sīlaṃ vā arakkhitvā kevalaṃ tumhesu pasādamattena sagge
atk-s0506a:3705_2: nibbattitu”nti. “Nanu, brāhmaṇa, ajja paccūsavelāyaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍalinā devaputtena
atk-s0506a:3705_3: attano devalokūpapattikāraṇaṃ tuyhaṃ kathika”nti bhagavā avoca. Tasmiṃ khaṇe maṭṭhakuṇḍalīdevaputto
atk-s0506a:3705_4: saha vimānena āgantvā dissamānarūpo vimānato oruyha bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā añjaliṃ
atk-s0506a:3705_5: paggayha ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha bhagavā tassaṃ parisati tena devaputtena katasucaritaṃ
atk-s0506a:3705_6: kathetvā parisāya cittakallataṃ ñatvā sāmukkaṃsikaṃ dhammadesanaṃ akāsi. Desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0506a:3705_7: devaputto ca brāhmaṇo ca sannipatitaparisā cāti caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0506a:3708_0: Suṇotha yakkhassa ca vāṇijāna cāti serīsakavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0506a:3708_1: āyasmā kumārakassapo pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ setabyanagaraṃ sampatto. Tattha
atk-s0506a:3708_2: pāyāsirājaññaṃ attano santikaṃ upagataṃ viparītaggāhato vivecetvā sammādassane patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0506a:3708_3: So tato paṭṭhāya puññapasuto hutvā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ dānaṃ dento tattha akataparicayatāya
atk-s0506a:3708_4: asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā cātumahārājikabhavane suññe serīsake vimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0506a:3709_0: Atīte kira kassapassa bhagavato kāle eko khīṇāsavatthero aññatarasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya
atk-s0506a:3709_1: caritvā bahigāme devasikaṃ ekasmiṃ padese bhattakiccaṃ akāsi. Taṃ disvā eko gopālako
atk-s0506a:3709_2: “ayyo sūriyātapena kilamatī”ti pasannacitto catūhi sirīsathambhehi sākhāmaṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0506a:3709_3: katvā adāsi, maṇḍapassa samīpe sirīsarukkhaṃ ropesīti ca vadanti. So kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0506a:3709_4: teneva puññakammena cātumahārājikesu nibbatti, tassa purimakammassa sūcakaṃ vimānadvāre
atk-s0506a:3709_5: sirīsavanaṃ nibbatti vaṇṇagandhasampannehi pupphehi sabbakālaṃ upasobhamānaṃ, tena
atk-s0506a:3709_6: taṃ vimānaṃ “serīsaka”nti paññāyittha. So ca devaputto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devesu ceva
atk-s0506a:3709_7: manussesu ca saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde yasattherassa catūsu vimalādīsu gihisahāyesu
atk-s0506a:3709_8: gavampati nāma hutvā bhagavato dhammadesanāya arahatte patiṭṭhito pubbāciṇṇavasena
atk-s0506a:3709_9: taṃ suññavimānaṃ disvā abhiṇhaṃ divāvihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0506a:3710_0: So aparabhāge pāyāsidevaputtaṃ tattha disvā “kosi tvaṃ, āvuso”ti pucchitvā tena “ahaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3710_1: bhante, pāyāsirājañño idhūpapanno”ti vutte “nanu tvaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko viparītadassano
atk-s0506a:3710_2: kathamidhūpapanno”ti āha. Atha naṃ pāyāsidevaputto “ayyenamhi kumārakassapattherena
atk-s0506a:3710_3: micchādassanato vivecito, puññakiriyānaṃ asakkaccakāritāya pana suññe vimāne nibbatto.
atk-s0506a:3710_4: Sādhu, bhante, manussalokaṃ gatakāle mama parijanassa ārocetha ‘pāyāsirājañño asakkaccaṃ
atk-s0506a:3710_5: dānaṃ datvā suññaṃ serīsakavimānaṃ upapanno, tumhe pana sakkaccaṃ puññāni katvā tatrūpapattiyā
atk-s0506a:3710_6: cittaṃ paṇidahathā”ti. Thero tassānukampāya tathā akāsi. Tepi therassa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0506a:3710_7: tathā cittaṃ paṇidhāya puññāni katvā serīsake vimāne nibbattiṃsu. Serīsakadevaputtaṃ
atk-s0506a:3710_8: pana vessavaṇamahārājā marubhūmiyaṃ chāyūdakarahite magge maggapaṭipannānaṃ manussānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3711_0: Atha aparena samayena aṅgamagadhavāsino vāṇijā sakaṭasahassaṃ bhaṇḍassa pūretvā sindhusovīradesaṃ
atk-s0506a:3711_1: gacchantā marukantāre divā uṇhabhayena maggaṃ appaṭipajjitvā rattiṃ nakkhattasaññāya
atk-s0506a:3711_2: maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu. Te maggamūḷhā hutvā aññaṃ disaṃ agamaṃsu. Tesaṃ antare eko upāsako
atk-s0506a:3711_3: ahosi saddho pasanno sīlasampanno arahattappattiyā upanissayasampanno mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0506a:3711_4: upaṭṭhānatthaṃ vaṇijjāya gato. Taṃ anuggaṇhanto serīsakadevaputto saha vimānena attānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3711_5: dassesi. Dassetvā ca pana “kasmā tumhe imaṃ chāyūdakarahitaṃ vālukākantāraṃ paṭipannā”ti
atk-s0506a:3711_6: pucchi. Te cassa tattha attano āgatappakāraṃ kathesuṃ, tadatthadīpanā devaputtassa
atk-s0506a:3711_7: vāṇijānañca vacanapaṭivacanagāthā honti. Ādito pana dve gāthā tāsaṃ sambandhadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0506a:3713: “Suṇotha yakkhassa ca vāṇijāna ca, samāgamo yattha tadā ahosi;
atk-s0506a:3714: Yathā kathaṃ itaritarena cāpi, subhāsitaṃ tañca suṇātha sabbe.
atk-s0506a:3716: “Yo so ahu rājā pāyāsi nāma, bhummānaṃ sahabyagato yasassī;
atk-s0506a:3717: So modamānova sake vimāne, amānuso mānuse ajjhabhāsī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3718_0: 1228-9. Tattha suṇothāti savanāṇattikavacanaṃ. Yaṃ mayaṃ idāni bhaṇāma, taṃ suṇothāti.
atk-s0506a:3718_1: Yakkhassāti devassa. Devo hi manussānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devānañca pūjanīyabhāvato “yakkho”ti
atk-s0506a:3718_2: vuccati. Apica sakkopi cattāro mahārājānopi vessavaṇapārisajjāpi purisopi “yakkho”ti
atk-s0506a:3718_3: vuccati. Tathā hi “atibāḷhaṃ kho ayaṃ yakkho pamatto viharati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ yakkhaṃ
atk-s0506a:3718_5: mahārājāno. “Santi hi, bhante, uḷārā yakkhā bhagavato appasannā”tiādīsu vessavaṇapārisajjā.
atk-s0506a:3718_6: “Ettāvatā yakkhassa suddhī”tiādīsu puriso. Idha pana vessavaṇapārisajjo adhippeto.
atk-s0506a:3718_7: Vāṇijāna cāti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ anunāsikalopaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Samāgamoti samodhānaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3718_8: Yatthāti yasmiṃ vaṇṇupathe. Tadāti tasmiṃ maggamūḷhā hutvā gamanakāle. Itaritarena
atk-s0506a:3718_9: cāpīti itarītarañcāpi, idaṃ yathāti iminā yojetabbaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – serīsakadevaputtassa
atk-s0506a:3718_10: vāṇijānañca tadā yattha samāgamo ahosi, taṃ suṇotha, yathā vāpi tehi aññamaññaṃ subhāsitaṃ
atk-s0506a:3718_11: sulapitaṃ kathaṃ pavattitaṃ, tañca sabbe ohitacittā suṇāthāti. Bhummānanti bhummadevānaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3722: Suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, vaṅkaṃbhayā naṭṭhamanā manussā.
atk-s0506a:3724: “Nayidha phalā mūlamayā ca santi, upādānaṃ natthi kutodha bhakkho;
atk-s0506a:3725: Aññatra paṃsūhi ca vālukāhi ca, tattāhi uṇhāhi ca dāruṇāhi ca.
atk-s0506a:3730: “Atha tumhe kena vaṇṇena, kimāsamānā imaṃ padesañhi;
atk-s0506a:3731: Anupaviṭṭhā sahasā samecca, lobhā bhayā atha vā sampamūḷhā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3732_0: 1230. Tattha vaṅketi saṃsayaṭṭhāne. Yattha paviṭṭhānaṃ “jīvissāma nu kho, marissāma
atk-s0506a:3732_1: nu kho”ti jīvite saṃsayo hoti, tādise araññe. Amanussaṭṭhāneti amanussānaṃ pisācādīnaṃ
atk-s0506a:3732_2: sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne, manussānaṃ vā agocaraṭṭhāne. Kantāreti nirudake iriṇe, kaṃ tārenti
atk-s0506a:3732_3: nayanti etthāti hi kantāro, udakaṃ gahetvā taritabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha “appodake”ti.
atk-s0506a:3732_4: Appa-saddo hettha abhāvattho “appiccho appanigghoso”tiādīsu viya. Vaṇṇupathassa majjheti
atk-s0506a:3732_5: vālukākantāramajjheti attho. Vaṅkaṃbhayāti vaṅkehi bhītā. Vaṅkehi bhayaṃ etesanti
atk-s0506a:3732_7: Idañca vālukākantārapavesanato pubbe tesaṃ uppannabhayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Naṭṭhamanāti
atk-s0506a:3732_8: maggasativippavāsena naṭṭhamānasā, maggamūḷhāti attho. Manussāti tesaṃ ālapanaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3733_0: 1231. Idhāti imasmiṃ marukantāre. Phalāti ambajambutālanāḷikerādiphalāni na santīti
atk-s0506a:3733_1: yojanā. Mūlamayā cāti mūlāniyeva mūlamayā, vallikandādīni sandhāya vadati. Upādānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3733_2: natthīti kiñcāpi kiñci bhakkhaṃ natthi, upādānaṃ vā indhanaṃ, aggissa indhanamattampi
atk-s0506a:3733_3: natthi, kuto kena kāraṇena idha marukantāre bhakkho siyāti attho. Yaṃ pana atthi
atk-s0506a:3734_0: 1232. Ujjaṅgalanti jaṅgalaṃ vuccati lūkhadhūsaro anudako bhūmippadeso, taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3734_1: jaṅgalatopi ukkaṃsena jaṅgalanti āha “ujjaṅgala”nti. Tenāha “tattamivaṃ kapāla”nti,
atk-s0506a:3734_2: tattaṃ ayokapālasadisanti attho. Gāthāsukhatthañcettha sānunāsikaṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3734_3: tattamivaicceva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Anāyasanti natthi ettha āyo sukhanti anāyaṃ, tato eva
atk-s0506a:3734_4: jīvitaṃ sīyati vināsetīti anāyasaṃ. Atha vā na āyasanti anāyasaṃ. Paralokenāti narakena
atk-s0506a:3734_5: tulyaṃ. Narakañhi sattānaṃ ekantānatthatāya parabhūto paṭisattubhūto lokoti visesato
atk-s0506a:3734_6: “paraloko”ti vuccati, samantato ayomayattā āyasañca, idaṃ pana tadabhāvato anāyasaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3734_7: mahato dukkhassa uppattiṭṭhānatāya paralokasadisanti dasseti, “anassaya”nti ca keci
atk-s0506a:3734_8: paṭhanti, sukhassa appatiṭṭhānabhūtanti attho. Luddānamāvāsamidaṃ purāṇanti idaṃ
atk-s0506a:3734_9: ṭhānaṃ cirakālato paṭṭhāya luddānaṃ dāruṇānaṃ pisācādīnaṃ āvāsabhūtaṃ. Abhisattarūpoti
atk-s0506a:3734_10: “evaṃ lūkho ghorākāro hotū”ti porāṇehi isīhi sapitasadiso, dinnasapo viyāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3735_0: 1233. Kena vaṇṇenāti kena kāraṇena. Kimāsamānāti kiṃ paccāsīsantā. Hīti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3735_1: “Padesampī”ti ca paṭhanti, imampi nāma padesanti attho. Sahasā sameccāti sahasā ādīnavānisaṃse
atk-s0506a:3735_2: avicāretvā samavāyena anupaviṭṭhā sappaviṭṭhā. Lobhā bhayā atha vā kenaci anatthakāmena
atk-s0506a:3735_3: palobhitā lobhato kenaci amanussādinā paripātitā bhayā vā. Atha vā sampamūḷhāti maggavippanaṭṭhā
atk-s0506a:3738: “Magadhesu aṅgesu ca satthavāhā, āropayitvā paṇiyaṃ puthuttaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3739: Te yāmase sindhusovīrabhūmiṃ, dhanatthikā uddayaṃ patthayānā.
atk-s0506a:3742: Etena vegena āyāma sabbe, rattiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannā vikāle.
atk-s0506a:3745: Suduggame vaṇṇupathassa majjhe, disaṃ na jānāma pamūḷhacittā.
atk-s0506a:3748: Tatuttariṃ jīvitamāsamānā, disvā patītā sumanā udaggā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3749_0: 1234. Tattha magadhesu aṅgesu ca satthavāhāti magadharaṭṭhe ca aṅgaraṭṭhe ca jātā
atk-s0506a:3749_1: saṃvaḍḍhā taṃnivāsino satthe satthassa ca vāhanakā satthakā ceva satthasāmikā ca.
atk-s0506a:3749_2: Paṇiyanti bhaṇḍaṃ. Teti te mayaṃ. Yāmaseti gacchāma. Sindhusovīrabhūminti sindhudesaṃ
atk-s0506a:3750_0: 1235. Anadhivāsayantāti adhivāsetuṃ asakkontā. Yoggānukampanti goṇādīnaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0506a:3750_1: anuggahaṃ. Etena vegenāti iminā javena, yena tava dassanato pubbe āyāma āgatamha.
atk-s0506a:3750_2: Rattiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannāti rattiyaṃ maggaṃ paṭipannā. Vikāleti akāle avelāyaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3751_0: 1236. Duppayātāti duṭṭhu payātā apathe gatā, tato eva aparaddhamaggā. Andhākulāti
atk-s0506a:3751_1: andhā viya ākulā, maggajānanasamatthassa paññācakkhuno abhāvena andhā, tato eva ākulā,
atk-s0506a:3751_2: vippanaṭṭhā ca maggasammūḷhatāya. Disanti gantabbadisaṃ, yassaṃ disāyaṃ sindhusovīradeso,
atk-s0506a:3752_0: 1237. Tavañcāti tuvañca. Yakkhāti ālapanaṃ. Tatuttariṃ jīvitamāsamānāti yo “ito paraṃ
atk-s0506a:3752_1: amhākaṃ jīvitaṃ natthī”ti jīvitasaṃsayo uppanno, idāni tato uttarimpi jīvitaṃ āsīsantā.
atk-s0506a:3752_2: Disvāti dassanahetu. Patītāti pahaṭṭhā. Sumanāti somanassappattā. Udaggāti udaggāya pītiyā udaggacittā.
atk-s0506a:3753: Evaṃ vāṇijehi attano pavattiyā pakāsitāya puna devaputto dvīhi gāthāhi pucchi –
atk-s0506a:3755: “Pāraṃ samuddassa imañca vaṇṇuṃ, vettācaraṃ saṅkupathañca maggaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3756: Nadiyo pana pabbatānañca duggā, puthuddisā gacchatha bhogahetu.
atk-s0506a:3759: Yaṃ vo sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ, accherakaṃ taṃ vo suṇoma tātā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3760_0: Tassattho – pāraṃ samuddassāti samuddassa paratīraṃ, imañca īdisaṃ, vaṇṇuṃ vaṇṇupathaṃ
atk-s0506a:3760_1: vettalatā bandhitvā ācaritabbato vettācaraṃ maggaṃ, saṅkuke khāṇuke koṭṭetvā gantabbato
atk-s0506a:3760_2: saṅkupathaṃ maggaṃ, nadiyo pana candabhāgādikā, pabbatānañca visamappadesāti evaṃ
atk-s0506a:3760_3: duggā puthuddisā bhoganimittaṃ gacchatha, evaṃ gacchantā ca pakkhandiyāna pakkhanditvā
atk-s0506a:3760_4: anupavisitvā, paresaṃ rājūnaṃ vijitaṃ tattha verajjake videsavāsike manusse pekkhamānā
atk-s0506a:3760_5: gacchatha, evaṃbhūtehi vo tumhehi yaṃ sutaṃ vā atha vā diṭṭhaṃ vā accherakaṃ acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3760_6: taṃ vo santike tātā vāṇijā suṇomāti attano vimānassa acchariyabhāvaṃ tehi kathāpetukāmo pucchati.
atk-s0506a:3763: “Itopi accherataraṃ kumāra, na no sutaṃ vā atha vāpi diṭṭhaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3764: Atītamānusakameva sabbaṃ, disvā na tappāma anomavaṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3767: Dumā cime niccaphalūpapannā, atīva gandhā surabhiṃ pavāyanti.
atk-s0506a:3776: Daḷho ca vaggu ca susaṅgato ca, atīva nijjhānakhamo manuñño.
atk-s0506a:3782: Acintiyo sabbaguṇūpapanno, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷinyā.
atk-s0506a:3788_0: 1240-2. Tattha kumārāti paṭhamavaye ṭhitattā devaputtaṃ ālapati. Sabbanti devaputtaṃ
atk-s0506a:3788_1: tassa vimānapaṭibaddhañca sandhāya vadati. Pokkharaññoti pokkharaṇiyo. Satamussitāseti
atk-s0506a:3788_2: sataratanubbedhā. Silāpavāḷassāti silāya pavāḷassa ca, silāmayā pavāḷamayāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3788_3: Āyataṃsāti dīghaṃsā. Atha vā āyatā hutvā aṭṭhasoḷasadvattiṃsādiaṃsavanto.
atk-s0506a:3789_0: 1242. Tesūparīti tesaṃ thambhānaṃ upari. Sādhumidanti sundaraṃ idaṃ tava vimānaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3789_1: Ratanantaranti ratanantaravantaṃ, bhittithambhasopānādīsu nānāvidhehi aññehi ratanehi
atk-s0506a:3789_2: yuttaṃ. Kañcanavedimissanti suvaṇṇamayāya vedikāya sahitaṃ parikkhittaṃ. Tapanīyapaṭṭehi
atk-s0506a:3789_3: ca sādhuchannanti tapanīyamayehi anekaratanamayehi ca chadanehi tattha tattha suṭṭhu chāditaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3790_0: 1244. Jambonaduttattamidanti idaṃ tava vimānaṃ yebhuyyena uttattajambunadabhāsuraṃ.
atk-s0506a:3790_1: Sumaṭṭho pāsādasopānaphalūpapannoti tassa ca so so padeso sumaṭṭho suṭṭhu majjito,
atk-s0506a:3790_2: tehi tehi anantarapāsādehi sopānavisesehi ramaṇīyehi phalakehi ca yutto. Daḷhoti
atk-s0506a:3790_3: thiro. Vaggūti abhirūpo samuggato. Susaṅgatoti suṭṭhu saṅgatāvayavo aññamaññānurūpapāsādāvayavo.
atk-s0506a:3790_4: Atīva nijjhānakhamoti pabhassarabhāvepi ativiya olokanakkhamo. Manuññoti manoramo.
atk-s0506a:3791_0: 1245. Ratanantarasminti ratanamaye, ratanabhūte vā sārabhūte vimānassa abbhantare.
atk-s0506a:3791_1: Bahuannapānanti pesalaṃ pahūtaṃ annañca pānañca vijjati, upalabbhatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:3791_3: niccaghosito. Abhivanditosīti namassito, thomito vā asi. Tenāha “thūtivandanāyā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3792: 1246. Acintiyoti acinteyyānubhāvo. Naḷinyāti evaṃnāmake kīḷanaṭṭhāne yathā vessavaṇo mahārājā, evaṃ tvaṃ modasīti yojanā.
atk-s0506a:3793: 1247. Āsīti asi bhavasi. Devindoti sakko devarājā. Manussabhūtoti manussesu bhūto manussajātiko. Yakkhoti devādibhāvaṃ pucchitvāpi yakkhabhāvaṃ āsaṅkantā vadanti.
atk-s0506a:3796: “Serīsako nāma ahamhi yakkho, kantāriyo vaṇṇupathamhi gutto;
atk-s0506a:3797: Imaṃ padesaṃ abhipālayāmi, vacanakaro vessavaṇassa rañño”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3798: Āha. Tattha ahamhī yakkhoti ahaṃ yakkho amhi. Kantāriyoti ārakkhaṇatthaṃ kantāre niyutto. Guttoti gopako. Tenāha “abhipālayāmī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3799: Idāni vāṇijā tassa kammādīni pucchantā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0506a:3801: “Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3802: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ manuñña”nti.
atk-s0506a:3803_0: Tattha adhiccaladdhanti adhiccasamuppattikaṃ, yadicchakaṃ laddhanti attho. Pariṇāmajaṃ
atk-s0506a:3803_1: teti niyatisaṅgatibhāvapariṇataṃ, kālapariṇataṃ vā. Sayaṃkatanti tayā sayameva kataṃ,
atk-s0506a:3803_2: deviddhiyā tayā sayameva nibbattitanti attho. Udāhu devehi dinnanti tayā ārādhitehi
atk-s0506a:3804: Idāni devaputto caturopi pakāre paṭikkhipitvā puññameva apadisanto –
atk-s0506a:3806: “Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ na hi devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3807: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ manuñña”nti. –
atk-s0506a:3809: Taṃ sutvā vāṇijā puna “nādhiccaladdha”nti gāthāyaṃ puññādhikameva te caturo pakāre āropetvā puññassa ca sarūpaṃ pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0506a:3811: “Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0506a:3812: Pucchanti taṃ vāṇijā satthavāhā, kathaṃ tayā laddhamidaṃ vimāna”nti.
atk-s0506a:3814: Puna devaputto te paṭikkhipitvā attānaṃ yathūpacitaṃ puññañca dassento –
atk-s0506a:3816: “Mamaṃ pāyāsīti ahu samaññā, rajjaṃ yadā kārayiṃ kosalānaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3817: Natthikadiṭṭhi kadariyo pāpadhammo, ucchedavādī ca tadā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0506a:3819: “Samaṇo ca kho āsi kumārakassapo, bahussuto cittakathī uḷāro;
atk-s0506a:3820: So me tadā dhammakathaṃ abhāsi, diṭṭhivisūkāni vinodayī me.
atk-s0506a:3823: Pāṇātipātā virato ahosiṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayissaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3824: Amajjapo no ca musā abhāṇiṃ, sakena dārena ca ahosiṃ tuṭṭho.
atk-s0506a:3826: “Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0506a:3827: Teheva kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimāna”nti. –
atk-s0506a:3829: Atha vāṇijā devaputtaṃ vimānañcassa paccakkhato disvā kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā attano kammaphale saddhaṃ pavedentā –
atk-s0506a:3831: “Saccaṃ kirāhaṃsu narā sapaññā, anaññathā vacanaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3832: Yahiṃ yahiṃ gacchati puññakammo, tahiṃ tahiṃ modati kāmakāmī.
atk-s0506a:3834: “Yahiṃ yahiṃ sokapariddavo ca, vadho ca bandho ca parikkileso;
atk-s0506a:3835: Tahiṃ tahiṃ gacchati pāpakammo, na muccati duggatiyā kadācī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3836: Gāthādvayaṃ avocuṃ. Tattha sokapariddavoti soko ca paridevo ca. Parikkilesoti vuttā anatthuppatti.
atk-s0506a:3837: Evaṃ tesu kathentesuyeva vimānadvāre sirīsarukkhato paripākena muttabandhanā paripakkā sipāṭikā pati, tena devaputto saparijano domanassappatto ahosi. Taṃ disvā vāṇijā –
atk-s0506a:3840: Janassimassa tuyhañca kumāra, appaccayo kena nu kho ahosī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3841_0: Gāthamāhaṃsu. Tattha sammūḷharūpovāti sokavasena sabbaso mūḷhasabhāvo viya. Janoti
atk-s0506a:3841_1: devajano. Asmiṃ muhutteti imasmiṃ muhuttamatte. Kalalīkatoti kalalaṃ viya kato, kalalanissitaudakībhūto
atk-s0506a:3841_2: viya āviloti adhippāyo. Janassimassa tuyhañcāti imassa tava parijanassa tuyhañca.
atk-s0506a:3844: “Ime ca sirīsavanā tātā, dibbā gandhā surabhī sampavanti;
atk-s0506a:3845: Te sampavāyanti imaṃ vimānaṃ, divā ca ratto ca tamaṃ nihantvā.
atk-s0506a:3848: Mānussakaṃ vassasataṃ atītaṃ, yadagge kāyamhi idhūpapanno.
atk-s0506a:3854_0: 1256. Tattha sirīsavanāti sirīsavipinato. Tātāti vāṇije ālapati. Ime tumhākaṃ mayhañca
atk-s0506a:3854_1: paccakkhabhūtā dibbā gandhā surabhī ativiya sugandhāyeva samantato pavanti pavāyanti.
atk-s0506a:3854_2: Te dibbā gandhā evaṃ vāyantā imaṃ vimānaṃ sampavāyanti sammadeva gandhaṃ gāhāpenti,
atk-s0506a:3854_3: na kevalaṃ sampavāyanameva, atha kho attano pabhāya tamampi nihanti. Tenāha “divā
atk-s0506a:3855_0: 1260-61. Imesanti sirīsānaṃ. Sipāṭikāti phalakuṭṭhilikā. Phalatīti paccitvā vaṇṭato
atk-s0506a:3855_1: muccati, puṭabhedaṃ vā patvā sissati. Mānussakaṃ vassasataṃ atītanti yasmā vassasatassa
atk-s0506a:3855_2: accayena imassa sirīsassa sipāṭikā phalati, ayañca phalitā, tasmā mayhaṃ mānussakaṃ
atk-s0506a:3855_3: vassasataṃ atītaṃ. Yadagge yato paṭṭhāya, kāyamhi idha imasmiṃ devanikāye upapanno
atk-s0506a:3855_4: nibbatto. Mayhañca devagaṇanāya pañca vassasatāni āyu, tasmā khīyati me āyūti sokavasena
atk-s0506a:3855_5: sampamūḷhoti dasseti. Tenāha “disvānahaṃ vassasatāni pañca…pe… teneva sokena pamucchitosmī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3858: “Kathaṃ nu soceyya tathāvidho so, laddhā vimānaṃ atulaṃ cirāya;
atk-s0506a:3859: Ye cāpi kho ittaramupapannā, te nūna soceyyuṃ parittapuññā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3860_0: Āhaṃsu. Tattha yādisehi appāyukehi maraṇaṃ paṭicca socitabbaṃ siyā, tādiso pana evaṃ
atk-s0506a:3860_1: dibbānubhāvasampanno navutivassasatasahassāyuko kathaṃ nu soceyya, na socitabbamevāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:3861: Devaputto tattakeneva samassāsetvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchanto tesañca upadesaṃ dento –
atk-s0506a:3863: “Anucchaviṃ ovadiyañca metaṃ, yaṃ maṃ tumhe peyyavācaṃ vadetha;
atk-s0506a:3864: Tumhe ca kho tātā mayānuguttā, yehicchakaṃ tena paletha sotthi”nti. –
atk-s0506a:3865_0: Gāthamāha. Tattha anucchavinti anucchavikaṃ, tumhākameva taṃ yuttarūpaṃ. Ovadiyañca
atk-s0506a:3865_1: metanti me mayhaṃ tumhehi ovadiyaṃ ovādavasena vattabbametaṃ. Yaṃ yasmā, maṃ mayhaṃ,
atk-s0506a:3865_2: tumhe “kathaṃ nu soceyya”ntiādinā peyyavācaṃ piyavacanaṃ vadetha. Yaṃ vā peyyavācāya
atk-s0506a:3865_3: vadanaṃ kathanaṃ, taṃ tumhākameva anucchavikanti yojanā. Atha vā yaṃ yasmā tumhe
atk-s0506a:3865_4: peyyavācaṃ vadetha, tasmā anucchavikaṃ ovadiyañca ovaditabbaṃ ovādānurūpaṃ kātabbañca
atk-s0506a:3865_5: me mayā kataṃ, kiṃ pana tanti āha “tumhe ca kho tātā”tiādi. Tattha mayānuguttāti
atk-s0506a:3865_6: imasmiṃ amanussapariggahe marukantāre yāva kantārātikkamā mayā anuguttā rakkhitā,
atk-s0506a:3865_7: yenicchakaṃ yathārucitena, sotthiṃ khemena, paletha gacchathāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3870: Gāthamāhaṃsu. Tattha yathāpayogāti idāni katapaṭiññānurūpapayogā. Paripuṇṇacāgāti samattacāgā, uḷārassa mahassa pariyattapariccāgā. Mahanti ussavapūjaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3871: Puna devaputto mahakaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipanto kattabbesu ca te niyojento –
atk-s0506a:3873: “Mā ceva serīsamahaṃ akattha, sabbañca vo bhavissati yaṃ vadetha;
atk-s0506a:3875_0: Gāthamāha. Tattha yaṃ vadethāti yaṃ tumhe khemena sindhusovīradesapattiṃ tattha ca
atk-s0506a:3875_1: vipulaṃ uddayaṃ lābhaṃ paccāsīsantā “gantvā maya”ntiādīni vadatha. Sabbaṃ taṃ vo
atk-s0506a:3875_2: tumhākaṃ tatheva bhavissati, tattha nikkaṅkhā hotha, tumhe pana ito paṭṭhāya pāpāni
atk-s0506a:3875_3: kammāni pāṇātipātādīni vivajjayātha parivajjetha. Dhammānuyoganti dānādikusaladhammassa
atk-s0506a:3875_4: anuyuñjanaṃ. Adhiṭṭhahāthāti anusikkhatha idaṃ serīsakamahanti dasseti.
atk-s0506a:3876: Yaṃ pana upāsakaṃ anuggaṇhanto tesaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaṃ kātukāmo ahosi, tassa guṇaṃ kittetvā taṃ tesaṃ uddisanto imā gāthāyo āha –
atk-s0506a:3879: Saddho ca cāgī ca supesalo ca, vicakkhaṇo santusito mutīmā.
atk-s0506a:3881: “Sañjānamāno na musā bhaṇeyya, parūpaghātāya na cetayeyya;
atk-s0506a:3882: Vebhūtikaṃ pesuṇaṃ no kareyya, saṇhañca vācaṃ sakhilaṃ bhaṇeyya.
atk-s0506a:3885: So mātaraṃ pitarañcāpi jantu, dhammena poseti ariyavutti.
atk-s0506a:3887: “Maññe so mātāpitūnaṃ kāraṇā, bhogāni pariyesati na attahetu;
atk-s0506a:3888: Mātāpitūnañca yo accayena, nekkhammapoṇo carissati brahmacariyaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3890: “Ujū avaṅko asaṭho amāyo, na lesakappena ca vohareyya;
atk-s0506a:3891: So tādiso sukatakammakārī, dhamme ṭhito kinti labhetha dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3893: “Taṃkāraṇā pātukatomhi attanā, tasmā dhammaṃ passatha vāṇijāse;
atk-s0506a:3894: Aññatra teniha bhasmī bhavetha, andhākulā vippanaṭṭhā araññe;
atk-s0506a:3895: Taṃ khippamānena lahuṃ parena, sukho have sappurisena saṅgamo”ti.
atk-s0506a:3896: 1266. Tattha saṅgheti sattasamūhe. Vicakkhaṇoti tattha tattha kattabbatāya kusalo. Santusitoti santuṭṭho. Mutīmāti kammassakatañāṇādinā idhalokaparalokahitānaṃ munanato mutimā.
atk-s0506a:3897: 1267. Sañjānamāno na musā bhaṇeyyāti sampajānamusā na bhāseyya. Vebhūtikanti sahitānaṃ vinābhāvakaraṇato “vebhūtika”nti laddhanāmaṃ pisuṇaṃ, no kareyya na vadeyya.
atk-s0506a:3898: 1268. Sappatissoti patissayo garuṭṭhāniyesu nivātavuttikattā soraccaṃ, saha patissenāti sappatisso. Adhisīleti upāsakena rakkhitabbaadhisīlasikkhāya. Ariyavuttīti parisuddhavutti.
atk-s0506a:3899: 1269. Nekkhammapoṇoti nibbānaninno. Carissati brahmacariyanti pabbajjaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ carissati.
atk-s0506a:3900_0: 1270. Lesakappenāti kappiyalesena. Na ca vohareyyāti māyāsāṭheyyavasena vacanaṃ na
atk-s0506a:3900_1: nicchāreyya. Dhamme ṭhito kinti labhetha dukkhanti evaṃ vuttanayena dhamme ṭhito
atk-s0506a:3900_2: dhammacārī samacārī kinti kena pakārena dukkhaṃ labhetha pāpuṇeyya.
atk-s0506a:3901_0: 1271. Taṃkāraṇāti tannimittaṃ tassa upāsakassa hetu. Pātukatomhi attanāti sayameva
atk-s0506a:3901_1: tumhākaṃ ahaṃ pāturahosiṃ. “Attāna”ntipi pāṭho, mama attānaṃ tumhākaṃ pātvākāsinti
atk-s0506a:3901_2: attho. Tasmāti yasmā ahaṃ dhammaṃ apacāyamāno taṃ rakkhanto tumhepi rakkhāmi, tasmā
atk-s0506a:3901_3: dhammaṃ passatha dhammameva caritabbaṃ katvā oloketha. Aññatra teniha bhasmī bhavethāti
atk-s0506a:3901_4: tena upāsakena vinā ce āgatā, imasmiṃ marukantāre anāthā appaṭisaraṇā bhasmabhāvaṃ
atk-s0506a:3901_5: gaccheyyātha. Khippamānenāti evaṃ khippantena vambhantena pīḷantena. Lahunti sukaraṃ.
atk-s0506a:3901_6: Parenāti adhikaṃ, aññena vā. Tasmā sukho have sappurisena saṅgamoti. So hi khantisoracce
atk-s0506a:3901_7: niviṭṭho kenaci kiñci vuttopi na paṭippharatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:3902: Evaṃ sāmaññato kittitaṃ sarūpato ñātukāmā vāṇijā –
atk-s0506a:3905: Kiṃ nāmadheyyaṃ kiṃ pana tassa gottaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3906: Mayampi naṃ daṭṭhukāmamha yakkha, yassānukampāya idhāgatosi;
atk-s0506a:3907: Lābhā hi tassa yassa tuvaṃ pihesī”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3908_0: Gāthamāhaṃsu. Tattha kiṃ nāma soti nāmato so jantu satto ko nāma. Kiñca karoti kammanti
atk-s0506a:3908_1: kasivaṇijjādīsu kīdisaṃ kammaṃ karoti. Kiṃ nāmadheyyanti mātāpitūhi kataṃ pana “tisso
atk-s0506a:3908_2: phusso”tiādīsu tassa kiṃ nāmadheyyaṃ, “bhaggavo bhāradvājo”tiādīsu kiṃ vā tassa gottaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3908_3: Yassa tuvaṃ pihesīti yaṃ tuvaṃ piyāyasi.
atk-s0506a:3914: Mā kho naṃ hīḷittha supesalo so”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3915_0: Āha. Tattha kappakoti nhāpito. Sambhavanāmadheyyoti sambhavoti evaṃnāmo. Kocchaphalūpajīvīti
atk-s0506a:3915_1: kocchañca phalañca upanissāya jīvanako. Tattha kocchaṃ nāma āḷakādisaṇṭhāpanatthaṃ
atk-s0506a:3918: “Jānāmase yaṃ tvaṃ pavadesi yakkha, na kho naṃ jānāma sa edisoti;
atk-s0506a:3919: Mayampi naṃ pūjayissāma yakkha, sutvāna tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ uḷāra”nti.
atk-s0506a:3920: Tattha jānāmaseti yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi, taṃ mayaṃ sarūpato jānāma. Edisoti guṇato pana yathā tayā kittitaṃ, evaṃ edisoti taṃ na kho jānāma, yathā taṃ aviddasunoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0506a:3921: Idāni devaputto te attano vimānaṃ āropetvā anusāsanatthaṃ –
atk-s0506a:3923: “Ye keci imasmiṃ satthe manussā, daharā mahantā athavāpi majjhimā;
atk-s0506a:3924: Sabbeva te ālambantu vimānaṃ, passantu puññānaṃ phalaṃ kadariyā”ti. –
atk-s0506a:3925: Gāthamāha. Tattha mahantāti vuḍḍhā. Ālambantūti ārohantu. Kadariyāti maccharino adānasīlā.
atk-s0506a:3926: Idāni pariyosāne cha gāthā dhammasaṅgāhakehi vuttā –
atk-s0506a:3928: “Te tattha sabbeva ahaṃ pureti, taṃ kappakaṃ tattha purakkhatvā;
atk-s0506a:3929: Sabbeva te ālambiṃsu vimānaṃ, masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassa.
atk-s0506a:3931: “Te tattha sabbeva ahaṃ pureti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayiṃsu;
atk-s0506a:3932: Pāṇātipātā viratā ahesuṃ, loke adinnaṃ parivajjayiṃsu;
atk-s0506a:3933: Amajjapā no ca musā bhaṇiṃsu, sakena dārena ca ahesuṃ tuṭṭhā.
atk-s0506a:3935: “Te tattha sabbeva ahaṃ pureti, upāsakattaṃ paṭivedayitvā;
atk-s0506a:3936: Pakkāmi sattho anumodamāno, yakkhiddhiyā anumato punappunaṃ.
atk-s0506a:3941: “Gantvāna te saṅgharaṃ sotthivanto, puttehi dārehi samaṅgibhūtā;
atk-s0506a:3942: Ānandī vittā sumanā patītā, akaṃsu serīsamahaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0506a:3946: Ekassa atthāya upāsakassa, sabbeva sattā sukhitā ahesu”nti.
atk-s0506a:3947_0: 1276. Tattha ahaṃ pureti ahaṃ purimaṃ ahaṃ purimanti ahamahaṃkarāti attho. “Te tattha
atk-s0506a:3947_1: sabbevā”ti vatvā puna “sabbeva te”ti vacanaṃ “sabbeva te yathā vimānassa āruhane
atk-s0506a:3947_2: ussukkajātā ahesuṃ, tathā sabbeva taṃ āruhiṃsu, na kassaci āruhane antarāyo ahosī”ti
atk-s0506a:3947_3: dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassāti “masakkasāra”nti ca tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
atk-s0506a:3947_4: vuccati, sabbaṃ vā devabhavanaṃ, idha pana sakkabhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tenāha “masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassā”ti.
atk-s0506a:3948_0: 1277-8. Atha te vāṇijā vimānaṃ passitvā pasannacittā tassa devaputtassa ovāde ṭhatvā
atk-s0506a:3948_1: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya tassa ānubhāvena sotthinā icchitaṃ desaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0506a:3948_2: Tena vuttaṃ “te tattha sabbevā”tiādi. Tattha anumato pakkāmi sattho yakkhiddhiyā
atk-s0506a:3948_3: punappunaṃ anumodamānoti yojanā. Kena pana anumatoti? Yakkhenāti pākaṭoyamattho.
atk-s0506a:3949: 1279. Yathāpayogāti yathāajjhāsayaṃ katapayogā. Paripuṇṇalābhāti samiddhalābhā. Akkhatanti anupaddutaṃ pāṭaliputtaṃ. Akkhatanti vā anābādhaṃ anuppīḷaṃ, anantarāyenāti attho.
atk-s0506a:3950_0: 1280. Saṅgharanti sakaṃ gehaṃ. Sotthivantoti sotthibhāvena yuttā khemino. Ānandītiādīhi
atk-s0506a:3950_1: catūhi padehi somanassitabhāvameva vadati. Serīsakaṃ te pariveṇaṃ māpayiṃsūti kataññutāya
atk-s0506a:3950_2: ṭhatvā paṭissavamocanatthañca devaputtassa nāmena serīsakaṃ nāma paricchedavasena
atk-s0506a:3951_0: 1281. Etādisāti edisī, evaṃ anatthapaṭibāhinī atthasādhikā ca. Mahatthikāti mahāpayojanā
atk-s0506a:3951_1: mahānisaṃsā. Dhammaguṇānanti aviparītaguṇānaṃ. Ekassa sattassa hitatthaṃ sabbeva
atk-s0506a:3951_2: sattā sabbe eva te satthapariyāpannā sattā, sukhitā sukhappattā khemappattā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0506a:3952_0: Sambhavo pana upāsako pāyāsissa devaputtassa tesañca vāṇijānaṃ vacanapaṭivacanavasena
atk-s0506a:3952_1: pavattaṃ gāthābandhaṃ sutaniyāmeneva uggahetvā therānaṃ ārocesi. Pāyāsidevaputto
atk-s0506a:3952_2: āyasmato sambhavattherassa kathesīti apare. Taṃ yasattherappamukhā mahātherā dutiyasaṅgītiyaṃ
atk-s0506a:3952_3: saṅgahaṃ āropesuṃ. Sambhavo pana upāsako mātāpitūnaṃ accayena pabbajitvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0506a:3955_0: Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇaṃ vimānanti sunikkhittavimānaṃ. Tassa kā uppatti? Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0506a:3955_1: viharati jetavane. Tena samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva devacārikaṃ
atk-s0506a:3955_2: caranto tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ upagato. Tasmiñca khaṇe aññataro devaputto attano vimānadvāre
atk-s0506a:3955_3: ṭhito āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ disvā sañjātagāravabahumāno upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0506a:3956_0: So kira atīte kassapasammāsambuddhe parinibbute tassa sarīradhātuyo pakkhipitvā yojanike
atk-s0506a:3956_1: kanakathūpe ca kate catasso parisā kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gandhapupphadhūpādīhi
atk-s0506a:3956_2: cetiye pūjaṃ karonti, tattha aññataro upāsako aññesu pupphapūjaṃ katvā gatesu tehi
atk-s0506a:3956_3: pūjitaṭṭhāne dunnikkhittāni pupphāni disvā tattheva tāni sammadeva ṭhapento sannivesavasena
atk-s0506a:3956_4: dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ vibhattivisesayuttaṃ pupphapūjaṃ akāsi. Katvā ca pana etaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0506a:3956_5: gaṇhanto satthu guṇe anussaritvā pasannacitto taṃ puññaṃ hadaye ṭhapesi.
atk-s0506a:3957_0: So aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā tasseva kammassa ānubhāvena tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike
atk-s0506a:3957_1: kanakavimāne nibbatti, mahānubhāvo mahā cassa parivāro ahosi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0506a:3957_2: “tasmiñca khaṇe aññataro devaputto…pe… aṭṭhāsī”ti. Atha naṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno
atk-s0506a:3960: Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.
atk-s0506a:3962: “Tatthacchasi pivasi khādasi ca, dibbā ca vīṇā pavadanti vagguṃ;
atk-s0506a:3963: Dibbā rasā kāmaguṇettha pañca, nāriyo ca naccanti suvaṇṇachannā.
atk-s0506a:3965: “Kena tetādiso vaṇṇo, kena te idha mijjhati;
atk-s0506a:3966: Uppajjanti ca te bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0506a:3968: “Pucchāmi taṃ deva mahānubhāva, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ;
atk-s0506a:3969: Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3970: Sopi tassa attano katakammaṃ imāhi gāthāhi kathesi. Taṃ dassentā saṅgītikārā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0506a:3973: Pañhaṃ puṭṭho viyākāsi, yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ”.
atk-s0506a:3976: Mahiddhiko camhi mahānubhāvo, dibbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūto.
atk-s0506a:3978: “Tena metādiso vaṇṇo, tena me idha mijjhati;
atk-s0506a:3979: Uppajjanti ca me bhogā, ye keci manaso piyā.
atk-s0506a:3981: “Akkhāmi te bhikkhu mahānubhāva, manussabhūto yamahaṃ akāsiṃ;
atk-s0506a:3982: Tenamhi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī”ti.
atk-s0506a:3983_0: 1287. Tattha dunnikkhittaṃ mālanti cetiye pūjākaraṇaṭṭhāne nirantaraṭṭhapanādinā
atk-s0506a:3983_1: racanāvisesena aṭṭhapetvā yathānikkhittatāya na suṭṭhu nikkhittaṃ, vātena vā paharitvā
atk-s0506a:3983_2: dunnikkhittaṃ pupphaṃ. Sunikkhipitvāti suṭṭhu nikkhipitvā racanāvisesena dassanīyaṃ
atk-s0506a:3983_3: pāsādikaṃ katvā nikkhipiya. Patiṭṭhapetvāti vibhattivisesādivasena pupphaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā.
atk-s0506a:3983_4: Taṃ vā pupphaṃ nikkhipanto satthu cetiyaṃ uddissa mama santāne kusaladhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvāti
atk-s0506a:3983_5: evaṃ ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0506a:3984_0: Evaṃ devaputtena attano sucaritakamme pakāsite thero tassa dhammaṃ desetvā āgantvā
atk-s0506a:3984_1: bhagavato tamatthaṃ nivedesi. Bhagavā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā sampattamahājanassa
atk-s0506a:3984_2: dhammaṃ desesi. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0506a:4000: Yā tattha paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
atk-s0506a:4004: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0506a:4009: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
